Anxious about which of the three dates to go on. Sitting on the sofa, at about 09:30 I thought "sod it", got up in my shorts and T-shirt, grabbed my umbrella, and walked up the hill to the surgery. They give you a numbered sheet and you go in when your number is called. There were four staff giving injections, and the surgery isn't open for normal appointments, so it was really quick, maybe 3-4 minutes waiting and a couple of minutes for the jab. I even had a chat with a lady coming in on my way out. Yet again, the worry took longer than the reality.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake at 04:44 and up at about 07:15. Gashed my foot on a nail on the stair carpet and was treading gouts of blood over the kitchen floor and carpet before I noticed. Nothing serious, but a bit freaked out by it. Feeling low this morning. After-effects of the flu jab, maybe? Anyway, I have food in the house and have cleaned, washed, and put a wash on. The temperature is forecast to be 13 C today. Yuck. It's wet & grey, so I have lit the fire (although I don't know if I want to burn it every day now). The man whose garden I can see from the front bedroom window has taken all his hanging baskets and flowers in pots down, which makes me feel sad. Summer is definitely over. And I need to accept that the place that I live in will be cold and wet and overcast in the autumn and winter months. But, like my chronic pain, a bit easier said than done.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Awake at 03:05, so got up and took a Nurofen Plus. After about 20 minutes or so, checked the time on my phone and it was 05:00. Stayed in bed till about 09:15 and got up in the end. Did a big shop at Westgate and gave Sunny a Goosnargh biscuit.
Spent most of the day baking (bread & butter pudding; more Goosnargh biscuits), updating my iTunes library, listening to the Contemporary R'n'B Genius mix, and looking at a Twitter post on clinical depression.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, awake at 04:48 and up at about 07:15. Have washed, washed up, done some ironing, washed a sheet, baked some biscuits, ironed some hankies, repotted a plant, and now feel low & anxious at 09:30. It's a cold (11 C), dark, and wet day, which never suits me.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I ended up lying on my bed after Body Scan till bedtime. Took two Solpadeine Max.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake at just after 12, then again just after 3. Took a Nurofen Plus, but didn't go back to sleep. Got out of bed to bring my wheelie bin back, then spent the day in bed until 3. Took four extra codeine tablets. Oh dear. Still feel anxious and low at half 4, even though it's a bright day. Had the space heater on in the big bedroom most of the day and it's due to drop to 3 C overnight. Whatever happened to the season of mists and mellow fruitfulness? Straight from summer to winter with no discernible gap. My hanging basket is beginning to look rather bedraggled with all the wet & cold weather, although my other pot plants are doing fine. The osteo is covered with flower buds!

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake at just before 12, then again just before 3. Up at 07:30. out for a shop at the Co-op at 9 in my trousers, shirt & jumper. Popped into Age UK and had a chat with Lynn. My phone went whilst I was walking to the shop -- someone from MyWellbeing College calling about "relapse prevention". Do I want to talk to a therapist about what I found helpful in CBT and have a phone call once a month for three months after that? No thanks. Still waiting to hear about my Living With Pain referral, although it may still be early days yet.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Awake just before 2, then slept through till 5. Up at 07:30, done all the usual stuff, and now feeling low & anxious at 09:30. I'm missing my walks and going out to Shipley, I think. It's cold & grey & rainy. Had the space heater on in my bedroom this morning but couldn't get warm. My mood affects my feeling of cold and my pain both.
The tarmacers are back and are digging up the tarmac square they laid about a month ago. I wonder why?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went back to lie on my bed in the afternoon. Took two Nurofen Plus.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake at 2, then again properly at 4. Space heater on at 5 setting. Felt really low, stayed in bed till 3, took two Nurofen Plus and two Solpadeine Max, rang to cancel my volunteering shift at 09:30. Feeling grotty about that, although none of my cancels to date have led to the library being closed.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake just before 3, then again properly just before 6. Up at 07:15 to a dark, wet morning. Went out for a walk round the block in my shorts at about 08:30. Feeling low & anxious, but have managed a clothes wash, a me wash, and some plant care.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Awake just before 4, but didn't go back to sleep. Up at 07:15 to another dark, wet morning. Went out for a walk round the block in my shorts at about 8. Feeling low & anxious, but have managed a clothes wash, a me wash, and some plant care. And had a coffee and two biscuits. And an apple.
I got the plastic Christmas decorations box down from the attic. It is broken on one side (which for an anguished few minutes I thought I'd done) and isn't really big enough to put all my bedding in. Plus I'll have to dispose of the decorations somehow. Still, there may be a similar suitable plastic storage box and lid available somewhere.
This Wordpress installation had another "Can't connect to the database" error, which I eventually worked out how to fix. (I think these errors occur after a silent Windows update, as KeePass had quit this morning when I signed in.) Couldn't log in, which caused me some worry for about ten minutes, until I realised that you need to restart the SQL server after commenting out the innodb_force_recovery line.
I feel like going and lying on my bed now.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Which I did until bedtime.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Asleep at (I guess) 19:30 or so. Awake just after midnight. Half-asleep till 02:20. Got up and took a Nurofen Plus, and then later my codeine and two Solpadeine Max. That got rid of my abdominal pain, but didn't send me to sleep. I had a very unpleasant morning in bed feeling like the really bad depression had returned, worrying (a lot) about that and the possible effect on my life, feeling cold, putting the space heater on and then off, putting earplugs in and out, getting up for various things, and just being miserable. There is a gap in the back window frame in the big bedroom, which may be making the room cold. It should be easy to fix with some sealant. In the end, I got so fed up that I arose at about 12:30 (after taking two more Nurofen Plus and some Zopiclone pieces). I have done my usual morning things and been out for shopping to Westgate Stores and the Co-op in my shorts with no problems. Now eating Bombay Mix at 15:52 and enjoying some last-minute sunshine before putting the waste bin out.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep with no problems and slept through till 6. Up at 07:30. Feeling low & anxious at just before 10.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully till 01:12. Got up and took half a Z. Slept fitfully again till 04:48. Up at 07:15. Have been out for a walk round the block in my shorts and taped up the draughts in the back door.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took half a Z before going to sleep. Awake just after 1, so got up and took another half. Slept through till just before 5. Felt fairly good on waking up, went out in my trousers & jumper in the rain to the Co-op, and now feel utterly miserable at 11:30. Just anxious & low. Sarah & Jamie are visiting tomorrow. Have been trying to eat every day.
Have yet again snagged one of the long nails on my right hand. I have superglued it together and filed the rough edge down. Let's see if it works.
Eating Dirty Fries (chips with cheese & chili) and watching the Hawkwind documentary again. Lemmy is one of the best commentators. Thoughtful, articulate, and funny.
Despite feeling like shit and living from moment to moment (which in itself is probably no bad thing), occasionally I feel a tiny "Yes!" in the pit of my stomach.
When I feel low, I feel cold more and my ankle pain seems to increase. I also have pain in my abdomen (the long-standing one), in my wrists (osteoarthritis, I guess) and my back (from playing guitar and stretching my trapezius muscles).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Took half a Z before going to sleep. Slept through till just after 4, so rested & meditated until getting up at 07:45. It's proving to be a very long morning filled with anxiety. Sarah is delayed until 12:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: No Z, but slept through till just after 3. Dozed till 6, then spent the day in bed till just before 2. No extra meds. Ate fine.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: No Z, but awake just after 12, then again just before 5. Spent the day in bed again, up just before 2. Ate fine, but had two Solpadeine Max & two Nurofen Plus in the morning. Feeling low, no energy, no interest in anything, worrying about the future & playing the nostalgia game with my time in Birmingham and Jacci. Feeling a failure occasionally, although I know in my heart that I'm not the best person to judge my value. Little Lynn sent me a friend request today, which I've accepted.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake just after 2, then again just before 5. Spent the day in bed again, up just after 2. Ate fine, but had two Nurofen Plus in the morning. Feeling cold a lot of the time and my back aches. Too much rest? Easily upset and worried about all manner of things, most of them fairly trivial. Facebook has started issuing me notifications for posts that I've already viewed and for some that I haven't. Aren't notifications supposed to be for activity?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The notifications that I'm getting are as configured in the Facebook settings: https://www.facebook.com/settings?tab=notifications So I'm getting notifications about my friends' activities (such as when they update their status or share a photo), because these are enabled. If they're unexpected, perhaps the settings changed with a Facebook update.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept through till just before 5. Dozed till 6, then spent the day in bed till just after 1. No extra meds. Ate fine.
Back hurts, legs feel weak. I feel weak & weepy.
Was worried about ordering my repeat prescription for codeine phosphate too early. It's been issued, and the time limit is 14 days after the last request.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
As yesterday.
My getting up time of 1 o'clock is more accurately 11:30, as that's when I put my shorts & socks on and lie on my bed to do the Body Scan. Same with 2 o'clock getting-up time, which is more accurately 12:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Had a restless night, but slept through until 04:43. Up at about 08:15. Been shopping at the Co-op.
Feel pretty rough at 15:00. Anxious, dizzy, hot & cold, and my ankle and back both hurt. A lot.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept through until 04:30. Took my morning codeine at 5 and had a very restful shamatha for about three hours. Up at about 08:15. Been to Boots for my scrip and bought a cushion at Age UK. Feeling a lot less anxious this morning.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
A couple of those odd things:
* Was watching an interview with Tracey Emin about her Bed piece, where she said that she spent four days in bed having a kind of breakdown. Which is a bit like my days in bed. * Yet again, managed to get some cooking and some washing both finished within a minute of each other. Impressive, but a bit inconvenient :-)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awakened just before 4 by a loud crash from one of the neighbours' houses. Another shamatha till just before 8. Have cleaned, washed, made some Goosnargh biscuits, and been for a walk round the block, but at just before 10 feeling quite faint & dizzy and a bit anxious.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had a sit down and ate an apple and felt okay afterwards. Rushing around a bit may have triggered some tiredness. Feeling okay at just after 5.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake just after 12, then again just before 5. Done all the usual stuff, walked round the block, put a clothes wash on, and mopped the bathroom floor. Feeling a bit droopy & anxious occasionally, but nothing too serious. Changing passwords on a number of websites, as one of my (reused) passwords has been leaked. It's surprisingly difficult on some sites.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept through till just after 4. Spent the day in bed till just after 1. Had two Solpadeine Max & two Nurofen Plus in the morning.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake just after 2, then an usettled sleep. Awake again at about 05:30, up at 08:30. Full of fear & anxiety, some of it centred around lunch with Sarah today. Shaved & showered, out for a weekly shop at the Co-op, more shopping for vitamin D3 tablets, a curry from Westgate, and a chat to Rani. Felt quite faint & dizzy, with my left eye watering, in the period just before Sarah arrived. Took a Nurofen Plus in case it helped. Had a good lunch (welsh rarebit, salad, blood orange San Pellegrino, and rocky road to finish). Sarah paid, and gave me some presents as well. We tried to return an overdue library book of mine but the library was shut. Walked up to Hallcliffe Community Garden, and then met another volunteer Rosy on the way down. She has broken her wrist and has also had to take a break from volunteering. We walked back past Providence Row, then on to West Lane and back to Westgate. Did some present shopping in the gift shop, then Sarah had to dash off to collect Jamie from school.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept through till just before 6. Lay and rested until getting up in the twilight at 07:45. Been out for a bottle of milk but feel sad and empty and dispirited. My ankle hurts. Does it make it any better if you know what you need to do? In my case, I think to get out of the house and participate in outside activities, travelling and meeting people.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Ended up going back to bed at about 11:30 yesterday and spent the whole day in bed. No food or drink. Started trying to sleep at 19:00, awake at 23:16, took half a Z, woke again just after 2, then again just after 3, when I took another half a Z.
Spent today in bed as well, up at about 15:00. It's raining, grey and dank, and temperature is currently 9 C. Due to drop to 9 C tomorrow with more constant rain. I have to be honest and say that I hate this kind of weather. And always have, I think. And I'm probably not alone, either. But it seems exaggerated by my mood, which is lowered even more if it's already low. And I'm stressing about a possible visit letter from Liz on the 27th. Background: she said on April 27th that she would be doing three-monthly inspections, didn't do one July 27th, so I'm stress-guessing that she meant six-monthly, hence October 27th.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took me a while to drop off last night, so I took half a Z at about 9 or 10. Woke at 06:45, but spent the day in bed. Up at 2, no extras. Felt quite restful most of the time, but always that nagging worry wart at the edges and it gets loud enough for me to get up eventually. My bedroom is nice and cosy and warm though, as I moved into the small one yesterday.
Got a letter from the Living With Pain people, which I haven't opened yet.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The gnats that came with one of my plants are driving me a bit bonkers today. It (or they) come and hover around my head when I'm sat on the sofa or at the computer. I blatted one over the kitchen sink earlier, but I don't like doing it.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept through till just after 3 clock time (4 body time as the clocks went back overnight). Spent the day in bed till just after 12 clock time. Had two Solpadeine Max & two Nurofen Plus in the morning.
Tried doing a rebirth breathe today. It was a limited success.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went to bed at 6 to get used to the time shift, but was awake at 03:30. Drowsed till 6. Up just before 8 with no extras. Have washed up, washed, repotted a marguerite, put a wash on, had a coffee and cookies, but feel like a damp rag. Full of anxiety and resentment.
I haven't opened the letter from Living With Pain yet, but am resentful about them. There's a waiting list of four months, but they invite you to a two-hour session much earlier than that so that they can say they offered you treatment within the NHS six week target period.
It's freezing cold as well (although nice & bright). 8 C today.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had two Nurofen Plus in the afternoon after clearing my constipation with two glycerin suppositories.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went to bed at 18:30 to get used to the time shift, but awake at 02:30. Drowsed till 6. Up just after 9 with no extras. Have washed up, washed, put a wash on, had a coffee and cookies, but again feel like a damp rag. Full of anxiety mostly.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went to bed at 18:30 because I was feeling knackered, but woke at 02:30. Got up and took half a Z. Slept till just after 6. Up just after 9. Out to the Post Office for some cash, then took some books back to the library (had a brief chat). then bought some essentials (milk, eggs, curry) at Westgate Stores. Feeling a lot better than yesterday and considering booking a volunteer session.
All of my plants have now, I guess, got fungus gnats. There's no point in swatting them, as more will simply emerge from the larvae in the decaying roots.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept through till about 5. Up just after 8, have done the usual morning things, been to the Co-op, waved to Suni, but now my legs and feet hurt and I feel low & sad. It's quite cold (7 C, a bit chilly walking to the Co-op in my polo shirt), but bright. Strange, because I felt quite upful yesterday.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went to bed at 18:45, did 1.5 Body Scans (my foot hurt so I abandoned the second one early). Awakened at 02:37 by a noise from next door. Drowsed until 05:54. Up at 9. It's a foggy, cold day and I'm sort of restless, low & anxious. Who shall I follow on my brand new Twitter account. This is my third account since Twitter started. Listening to Mandy's Musical Minx on Radio Seagull and cooking spag bol and bread & butter pudding for luncheon. Halloween was very quiet, no callers, and the odd bang in the distance from people celebrating Bonfire Night early.
And once again I have subconsciously set my washing and cooking to finish within a few minutes of each other.
The house feels quite cold (although it's apparently 12 C outside), so I've got the big space heater on downstairs. It may be connected with hunger & anxiety as well, of course.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept through till about 4. Drowsed till 6, took my morning codeine and meditated. It was a nice restful one this time. Up at 8, have done the usual morning things. It's surprisingly warm (10 C forecast) although it was a bit chilly walking round the block in my blue tartan shorts. I'm going to have a bath and wash my hair this evening. It's nice to get little rituals in place.
Had another knock on the back door yesterday from someone looking for "Ellises". The door is taped up to block cold draughts, so I end up shouting through the door and waving my hands. It must look quite bonkers! It's going to be inevitable that I get callers like this, although I've only had about five of them in the fifteen months I've been here, so not too bad. About the same as the number I got at the Old School House looking for the vicarage.
Spent a little time tracking down Mike Bees on the net yesterday. He seems to be happily ensconsed in Essex (where he comes from? he did his degree there) and racing boats and cars, drinking beer, and pulling funny faces for the camera. Same old Mike. He was a good friend.
Oh and the letter frm Living With Pain turned out to be a letter confirming my 20 December appointment with Dr Higgins. Sent from the same office.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
An increasingly noisy evening, so I put my earplugs in. Fell asleep fine, slept through till about 5 at a guess, decided to have a lie-in just after 6, so went downstairs to get my morning meds. Opened the left-hand curtains and the whole rod came down. The rawlplug and screw on one of the brackets has worked itself loose. Just like upstairs. I guess the house is made of stone blocks and the fixtures go in the cracks. Got me well stressed. Spent the day in bed, took two Nurofen Plus and two codeine phosphate. Up at 13:30.
The Fold was formally opened this morning.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: No earplugs as it was quite subdued last night. Fell asleep fine, bit restless (no food yesterday), awakened briefly at 00:37 by noise from neighbour Bob. Slept through till 5. Up at 09:45, had two Solpadeine Max extra. Had a good lying meditation, quite peaceful and painless. I'm up now just before 11, drinking coffee and eating cookies. I'm clean & clothed, feel quite still but a bit flat. Oh well. My arthritic knees throb a bit in the cold & wet weather. The house is nice and warm, even with the boiler only set to 8 (it's forecast for 9 C today).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awakened briefly at 22:30 by noise from next door. Had half a Z at some point. Stayed in bed all day. No extras. I think this is diverticulitis.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awakened briefly at 22:30 by noise from next door. Stayed in bed all day again. Had two extra codeine sulphate in the afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awakened briefly at 22:00 by bangs, so earplugs in. Woke again at 12 and 2. Took half a Z at 3, no noticeable effect but drowsed till 6. Up at 08:30 and out in the cold and driving rain to collect my Amazon hankies from the Co-op, some milk from the Post Office, and my scrip from Boots. They said they only received my scrip from the surgery yesterday, which seems odd. I ordered it Friday or Saturday last week, as far as I can remember.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It was Saturday 02 Nov 19.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept through till just before 6, if a little fitfully. No bangs last night. Up at 09:30 or so after meditating to try and lift my mood. Not too successfully, I must admit. Dressed in trousers, shirt, and jumper for a weekly food shop at the Co-op. Wore my nice warm red woolly gloves on the way back. It's forecast for 6 C today. Saw a pair of walking boots in Age UK, but felt too knackered to go back out.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Feeling sore after shifting a three-day blockage with a glycerol.
Damned gnats everywhere in the house now. Just one or two, but flying around my head. I swat & squash them when I can. My persistent anxiety doesn't help either -- I tend to see them when they're maybe not there sometimes.
Uurgh. Discovered the virtually-intact glycerol in my pants when I went to change them. The loo is fairly well blocked as well.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Took me a while to get to sleep last night (lots of intermittent loud bangs, stomach pain & nausea), so took half a Z. Had my earplugs in at one point, then took them out before dropping off. Slept through till just before 6. Had a nice restful shamatha (is this due to the Zopiclone?) and was up at 9. Dressed and out for a short walk, then shopping and a chat with Suni at Westgate Stores.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took me a while to get to sleep last night, there were a few bangs, but I had a very restful pleasant time falling asleep. And a nice restful shamatha in bed this morning. I can feel this joy in my chest, almost like a suuppressed laugh, but I can't release it. Memories of that rebirth I had with Joan Black in Lancaster back in 2002. That feeling is a bird wanting to take flight and soar into the blue reaches of the sky. Up at 9.
No earplugs, no Z, no extra codeine. Still got twinges of diverticulitis.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep with no problems, awake just before 3, then awake just before 6. Up at 09:30, dressed, shaved, did the washing up, but felt so full of anxiety by about 10 that I went and lay on my bed.
I started taking a week's course of amoxicillin last night, as the diverticulitis wasn't clearing up naturally. Interesting to see that they were issued April 2016 as emergency supplies for a diverticular flare.
No earplugs, no Z.
Took two Solpadeine Max at about 12 as my knees were hurting.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I have a good appetite (although I tend to eat later in the day) and sleep fine without meds the vast majority of nights. So I don't think I'm depressed. I do suffer from a great deal of anxiety and sincerely believe that my chronic body pain isthe cause. Particularly with my ankle pain. It's like having a dog bite me all the time and I experience it as a constant threat.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: After agonising inwardly about, and putting off dealing with it, I finally tackled the curtain problem. It's now fixed and the rail and curtains are back up. Can't remember what prompted me to do it now, although it was only about 1.5 hours ago (just beginning to get dark). First, I got a chair and stood on it to check the secureness of the other curtain rail. (Ah yes, just before closing the curtains for the night.) Hammered the loose rawlplug & screw back in on the one that needed fixing, then made sure all the four fixing screws were tight on the brackets before loading the first curtain on the pole. It was a bit fiddly but I got it done in the end. Slight mismatch of curtain hooks & loops, but what the heck.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept through till 05:17 on my double mattress (!), although I was a bit unsettled in the latter part of the night. The double mattress is very soft and I tend to roll around, so that will take a bit of getting used to. Had a good shamatha this morning, although it's always a bit sad when I start to emerge and the body pain and negative thoughts begin to arrive. Got up at 9, had a bath, washed my hair, and got some groceries from Rani at Westgate Stores. Have planted two trailing ivies in my hanging basket and taken out the dead stalks.
I am listening to Johnny Lewis on Caroline, who is playing some good music. Funny, I normally can't stand him.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, still dreaming at 6. Woke at about 2, bright light in the bedroom (I'm not using curtains at the moment) and got up, went to the window, and there was a bright full moon in a clear night sky. Got up at 8 and fetched my bin (which I'd been a bit worried about: it either disappearing or me being told I'd shouldn't leave it outside the church). Had a bath, washed up, had my morning tea, watered the plants, and then nipped out in my trousers and polo shirt to the post office for some cash. Bought some Tunnocks then went and got my hair cut at Franco's. Feeling very blue, heating on and off, right knee hurting, left ankle feels quite painful & wobbly.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
It's just getting dark at 16:30 and my ankle and knees still hurt quite a lot. Just bad enough that I can't concentrate on anything else properly. Although I have eaten properly today and had a shave this afternoon.
And I've just worked out how to get at my paste history (having just overwritten my copy that comment with summat else).
Windows key + V

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awake briefly at 02:30, but stayed in bed all day again. Took tw0 Solpadeine Max in the morning.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awake briefly at 22:30 but woke up finally feeling low so stayed in bed all day. No extras. Still taking antibiotics. Had a hot, rather anxious, dream time in the mid-afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awake briefly at 00:30, then awake at just before 3. Got up and took half a Z. A restless morning, in and out of dreams, feeling more & more negative. Did my Body Scan at 12:00 and got up after that. Have drunk my usual two mugs of tea, washed up, and eaten a small portion of fish & chips.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awake just after 5 and up at 09:30. Have had a bath (and a shave yesterday), made a bread and butter pudding, but I feel knackered at 3 o'clock. Did some shopping at Westgate, was a bit short with Suni about endless questions about how I'm feeling, what did I do this morning, have I been anywhere interesting. I apologised immediately and he's just being sociable, but I feel rough and grumpy. Trying to work out when do my Co-op shop, collect my Amazon parcel, and collect two scrips. My ankle, knees, and stomach all hurt to varying degrees and I'm beginning to get fed up with the fungus gnats flying around my head whenever I sit down. They are attracted by the carbon dioxide, apparently. Swatting them seems to make no difference. They are all over the house now.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took me a while to get to sleep, felt hot, tummy hurting. Got up and took two Solpadeine Max. Which got rid of the tummy ache, and I fell asleep but woke at 22:00. Got up again and took half a Z. A restless night, to be honest. Awake properly just before 5, up at 07:30. Been to the Co-op, collected my Amazon parcel, did most of a weekly shop. Popped in to Westgate for some battered fish fillets and a quick chat with Suni.
Applied for the Bulb Warm Home Discount yeterday, worth £140 if approved. And my Winter Fuel Payment of £200 is paid tomorrow.
A fungus gnat landed in my nose while I was doing the Body Scan last night. Ugh.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
At the Co-op, you can request a member of staff to open a till for you to check out your shopping. And pay for at least some of it with your membership reward.
When I woke up at 10 o'clock last night, I didn't feel at all anxious. So, like the ankle pain, that evaporates with sleep.
And the reason I get hot in my little bedroom is because the bedroom gets hot, not because I'm feverish.
Had two Solpadeine Max in the afternoon whilst lying on my bed. Not sure if they had any effect, to be honest. Feeling pretty low today all in all.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, but awakened at 23:17 by some rhythmic thumping from next door and the intruder light on the office wall opposite my bedroom flashing on and off. Got up and put a packing case in the window frame to mask it, but felt so unnerved by this that I eventually got up and took half a Z. Slept through till just before 6, up at 11. The intruder light was still on when I woke up and didn't go off until 7. Tried phoning Liz about this, but her phone was unavailable, so sent a text. She might well want to know as it can't be working properly and it must use a fair bit of electricity being on all night.
Feeling not quite so desperately anxious today, as I also phoned Boots to check that my scrips are ready for collection tomorrow. Which they are. I did about an hour's sitting metta bhavana on the sofa yesterday afternoon from about 15:30 and I did feel somewhat rested afterwards. Lying on my back when I'm not going to sleep or doing a Body Scan tends to make me feel rather anxious, to be honest.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I was a little bit anxious about what Liz would say, but she's just texted me (from Spain, which is why her phone was unavailable) and thanked me twice for letting her know.
I was also a little bit anxious about her response time but she's dealt with all my queries so far very promptly, within the day.
And a little bit anxious about the central heating boiler going quiet whilst I was doing my metta bhavana on the sofa. I even got up to check :-) But the radiator thermostats must be telling it to go quiet by the end of the heating day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took me a little while to get to sleep, but I slept through till just before 4. Up at 08:30 after a restless shamatha to fetch my bin, then out to collect my scrips and do some food and Christmas shopping at the Co-op. Kath opened a till for me again and I thanked her. Popped into Age UK after to buy some candles and have a quick chat to Lynne. They now stock Ecover washing-up liquid.
The number of gnats around the house has dropped markedly. I just swatted one at 12 o'clock, but it was the first one I've seen all day. I've been letting the houseplants dry right out. I've now bottom-watered the ones downstairs and I'm going to try the neem oil treatment on the ones upstairs later. I suspect that the only surviving larvae are on the big ficus in the bathroom and the big monstera in the kitchen. They are both still drying out. No gnats have flown off the other plants when I've lifted them up and stoked the soil. There might still be plenty of unhatched larvae, of course.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Apparently, if the soil dries out, the larvae go into suspension. So I guess you put them into suspension, then drench with neem oil, and the larvae hatch but die of starvation.
Drying the soil out also reduces the number of gnats flying around the house, I guess.

"The most important strategy to minimize fungus gnat problems associated with houseplants is to allow the growing medium to dry between watering, especially the top 1 to 2 inches. The dry-growing medium will decrease survival of any eggs laid and/or larvae that hatch from the eggs as well as reduce the attractiveness of the growing medium to egg-laying adult females. " https://extension.colostate.edu/topic-areas/insects/fungus-gnats-as-houseplant-and-indoor-pests-5-584/

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Took me a little while to get to sleep, but I slept through again till just before 4. Had a long vivid magical-erotic dream, ending with an episode about being stuck in Radley with my credit cards & luggage lost. Put earplugs in from about 4, as there were persistent noises from next door. Had a good shamatha, no stomach or ankle pain. Up just before 9. The weather is that rather grim cold & cloud, so inside sorting out Christmas presents, wrapping & cards after a Badedas bath. I think my lifted mood this morning may be due to contact with other people.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, but woke just after midnight and again at just before 3. Had a brief, fairly restful shamatha, but got up at about 07:45 when I started worrying about Christmas cards.
It's a sepulchral morning, cold rain & fog, and the only people out are the church ladies doing the gardens. Lifting some plants (I wonder which? possibly dahlias) and cutting others back.
My neighbour Bob had his van broken into in the parking spaces at the top of the fold. I think he's started parking it in the church car park. Of course, I'm now fretting that he will move out and I will get some noisy neighbours.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: I had some success early this afternoon with doing some visualisation after the Body Scan, focussed on relieving the pain in my left ankle. I used the method suggested in the Body Scan, breathing in to the ankle, and then breathing out of the ankle. Did it for about an hour or so. It did reduce the intensity of the soreness. It seemed to me that there must be an important mental/emotional component to the neuropathic pain, as it can be ignored/reduced by distraction, feels worse when my spirits are low, and doesn't keep me awake at night. In fact, I tested last night, and it reduces while I'm lying on my side, relaxing and meditating into sleep.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awake just before 6. No lights, no Zopiclone, no earplugs. Had a very restful shamatha till getting up just before 9. Now I've had a bath, washed & conditioned my hair, bottom-watered the plants and am listening to Solar Radio, drinking coffee and eating oat & raisin cookies, but I feel dispirited and my arthritic right knee hurts.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
More of those tiny coincidences: Reading BBC News, I see an alarming photo of a car crashed into the side of a house in Lewis, then reading Andy Kershaw's autobiography in which he tells of seeing a car crashed through a hedge as a very small boy.
He also recounts an Ian Dury gig at Leeds Uni that he was involved in, and when I go to the computer, I hear a Dury track on Radio Seagull. It was even the same song (Wake Up) that he started the gig with.
Kershaw lived at 16 Norwood Terrace in Headingley, across the road from where Knopfler lived on Cardigan Road. He was there in 1978, by which time the guitarist had left for London, I think.

I have just made a bit of a waxy mess on my coffee table by leaving a couple of candles unattended. One of them, a ne one, tilted over and splashed a load of hot wax on the glass. None on the nylon carpet fortunately. Must remember be careful with candles. I also thought the room was hot and found that the space heater was still on. I'm usually quite careful about turning it off. Both things need to be checked before closing down for the night. And I think I left the front door unlocked the past couple of nights as well.
Eerily, I have just read that after Dury, Kershaw worked on a Dire Straits gig, so Mr Knopfler must have been in London by then.
And Chris Frantz has just posted a link to Wake Up on his Facebook wall (which I am following).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, but woke just after 1 and again at just before 3. Didn't really go back to sleep: keyed up about seeing Sarah today for a shopping trip. Got up at about 4 and took two Nurofen Plus, but they didn't help me sleep. Had a disturbed shamatha, as I felt physically quite relaxed with the extra codeine, but having endless fearful thoughts and dreamlets about being clumsy and making a mess. Up at 08:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, but very wakeful just before 2. Got up and took half a Z. Went back to sleep fine. Had a very restful shamatha till getting up at about 09:15.
Have 27 halves and 5 whole Zopiclone left.
Whenever I wake in the middle of the night, whatever the time, I can hear movement noises from the room directly next door. It's a bit unnerving sometimes.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, but very wakeful just before 2. Got up and took two Nurofen Plus. I didn't seem to go back to sleep, but I must have had one of my "blackouts" because it didn't seem like four hours when I heard the heating just after 6. Had a very restful & peaceful shamatha, though. Really feeling the breath travelling down into my body, soothing any pain in my feet and abdomen.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke briefly around 1, then awake just after 6. Had a very restful shamatha till getting up just after 9.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Woke just after midnight and didn't seem to go back to sleep properly. Must have slept though as I don't remember lying awake for six hours. Up at 8 after a restless meditation. Feeling cold & low.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, but very wakeful at 01:17. Got up and took half a Z. Slept through till 06:20. Had a restless meditation and got up in a low mood at 8. Realised in the late morning that I'd forgotten to take my morning codeine. I've saved the pills for waking in the night. Tummy and legs hurt more than usual, probably due to withdrawal symptoms. It's cold today (5 C) and forecast to drop to 3 C tomorrow.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went to bed at about 18:15, did a Body Scan as usual and fell asleep fine. Woke just before 11, noises from next door, felt quite wakeful so took the two codeine phosphate that I missed in the morning. Back to sleep okay, but awakened later at about 3 by the bright intruder flashing repeatedly on and off. Put some cardboard in the window, but didn't really go back to sleep. It was flashing until 7, so this is a worry for me again. Thinking of setting up a bed in the big bedroom for emergencies. Except that there is a problem with the old mattress, I think. A hole where a spring pokes through. Oh the worry. Up at 08:30, but feeling cold, tired, and low.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Tried some visualisation again during a second Body Scan, for about an hour or so. It did reduce the intensity of the soreness of my ankle and made feel very rested and somehow detached. The sound of the Body Scan voice sounded somehow distant. It occurred to me that in some way I have chosen a difficult and narrow path to tread. A path filled with mental and physical pain and one that I largely tread on my own. So be it.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awake just after 4 though. Took my morning codeine, but didn't go back to sleep. Stayed in bed all morning feeling quite overwhelmed with anxiety. Took two Nurofen Plus and an extra Mirtazapine. Up at 13:30. Have done a wash and eaten scrambled eggs on toast (wth relish, very tasty and buttery) and two rather sour apples. A bit like me, I'm afraid :-) No lights last night. Looking at my records, the light has only played up twice since 25th October.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Had abdominal discomfort last night, tossing & turning till just after 10, when I took the two codeine phosphate that I missed in the afternoon. Woke at 4, but managed to drowse till 6. Had a restless meditation (with some peaceful moments) and stayed in bed till about 09:15. Have been out to the Co-op, two pharmacies, and Age UK and posted my vote. Feeling low & anxious, especially when not active. Much rumination on my failings and the lack of meaning & activities in my life. Although I do spend my days in pretty much the same way that I always have, certainly in the winter months. There was an interesting article in the Guardian yesterday about chronic pain and the benefits of Pilates: https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2019/dec/01/pilates-took-me-from-crippling-back-pain-to-amazing-health#comment-136054912

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Bit of a restless night. Woke just after 10, then 1 and 3. At about 4 I took my morning codeine. Had a pleasant shamatha and up at 8.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The Labour party have just doorstepped me. They asked me who I'd voted for and I said not you. I hurt in several places and feel quite knackered so I've just had two Solpadeine Max.
Went and lay on my bed just before 6 and felt quite rested afterwards.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Put the cardboard in the window before going to sleep. Fell asleep fine, woke just after 1, then awake just before 5. Took my morning codeine and had a very restful shamatha from 6. Up at 08:30. My first Xmas card today (from Dennis on Aunty Muriel's behalf) and the third leaflet through the door from the Labour candidate. They are certainly making an effort and I hope it works. Feel quite anxious and my legs hurt and feel weak. Worrying about Xmas cards :-)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, awakened just after 10 by clattering from next door, put earplugs in, woke at 2, then awake just before 5. Had a restless meditation, full of negative thoughts, fear/guilt/shame/dislike, pain in my ankle. Up at 08:15, and on an impulse went out in my T-shirt and shorts to do some food shopping, post a card to Aunty Muriel, return a pack of Xmas cards to Age UK and find a gift bag (which I did!), then went to the gift shop opposite (Baildon Cards & Gifts) to buy a better pack of Xmas cards and some pink tissue paper. It's grey, rather cold, and windy. We are promised 40 mph winds this afternoon and evening.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: No cardboard in the window. Fell asleep fine, woke just after 2, then awake just before 5. It didn't feel like I'd gone back to sleep, which made me feel a little distressed, but when I checked the clock three hours had passed. Took my morning codeine and had a miserable meditation. Not in physical pain, but feeling very sad, hopeless, worthless. Up at 08:30. Out to the Co-op for a big shop. Warm, wet & windy today.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Signs of a creaky body -- up twice to pee in the night (and still wanted to go again) and wobbly weak legs today.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: No cardboard in the window again. Awakened at 03:20 by noises from next door, but fell asleep again until 06:20. Had a nice restful shamatha. Up at 8, have watered the plants. and now drinking coffee and eating one of the Goosnargh biscuits that I made yesterday. Very nice.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke just after 11 and again just after 3, then awake just before 5. A restless sleep, having one of those nightmares that aren't especially scary but just remain stuck. A restless meditation as well, just lots of strong negative thoughts. For example, I created a restore point on my PC to do some Windows 10 tweaking, and then emptied my Recycle Bin. I tried doing a restore, but it failed because the Recycle Bin couldn't be restored. Not a huge surprise, as the Recycle Bin had about 200 GB of data in it and the recommended size for the restore point was only 5 GB. I wasn't bothered about it yesterday and I'm not bothered by it now, but I had a fearful panicky thought about it during my meditation. It wasn't a useless meditation, though (they rarely are), as I had moments of feeling the very small and fine sensation of fluttering joy in my chest. And breathing long & slow into and out of that sensation.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I had a bath, washed my hair, cleaned half the bath, disinfected the loo and washbasin, and mopped the floor of the bathroom and the kitchen.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke just after 10 and 1, then awake just before 5. Took my morning codeine and had a very restful shamatha from 6. Up at 08:30.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am in good spirits, and have been for a few days now, but my body hurts & aches quite a bit. My back has started feeling sore again. my legs feel weak, my right knee hurts with arthritis, and my ankle pain is as bad as ever. Started doing the Bodhipaksha guided mindfulness of breathing practice at 13:00 about a week ago, but it doesn't help reduce the pain.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke a couple of times (can't recall exactly when -- 1 and 3?), then awake just before 4. Took my morning codeine at 04:30 and had a very restful shamatha from 6. Pain in my left breast area. Up at 8. It is wild, wet & windy (and cold with the wind) today but I have the hearing turned up, food in the fridge, and my guitar and maybe some painting to do. And a film to watch -- Cry Freedom, which I think I've already seen, but a long time ago.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had a very restful shamatha after doing my afternoon meditation, two hours in total with my ankle pain reduced and feeling very peaceful. I did wonder how long it could last at one point. Two hours is wonderful.
This was after doing the mindfulness of breathing practice, so they both work.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Neighbour Bob was drilling or something last night, so fell asleep fine after putting earplugs in. Woke at 00:30, took them out, and there were still noises of movement from next door. Fell asleep again and awake at 04:30. Took codeine, drowsed till 6, then meditated till 08:30. Had a Badedas bath and went out to post Xmas cards to Alan and Julia and get some groceries from Westgate. The house felt very warm when I came back in. Have cut my osteospermum right back to 3" as the flowers were getting very small and the stems becoming mouldy.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feel cold tired & sad. The news just gives me the blues. People squabbling on Twitter and lying on Facebook.
Played my guitar in the afternoon: Beeswing by Richard Thompson. One of the live versions. Also started fiddling with my paint by numbers set.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Neighbour Bob has a food mixer, I think. Fell asleep fine, though. Woke at 01:30 and awake at just before 6. Took codeine, then meditated till 10:30. Wasn't feeling particularly depressed or anything, just enjoying some pain-free peace.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took me a little while to get to sleep, as I had a sore tummy and left big toe. Woke once (at 1, I think) and awake at 4. Took my morning codeine at about 04:30 and drowsed/meditated until getting up at 08:30.
My new camera battery arrived through the letter box this morning. Eagerly fitted it and started transferring the 188 photos on the SD card in it. It kept failing and ultimately realised that the battery needed charging. Plugged it into the charger, but there is no charging light. So it looks like the previous battery was okay and the charger is knackered. Oh well. I'm feeling quite low and anxious, so this feels like a bit of a catastrophe. It's not. I've got a brand new battery and I can buy an SD card reader to get the photos off the camera.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. I have two medical appointments coming up next week, so feeling keyed up in advance. Fell asleep fine, but woke just after midnight. Felt quite wakeful, so got up and took a Nurofen Plus. Woke again just after 3. Awake just before 6. Feeling quite heavy and unrested, so stayed in bed till 13:00. Took two Nurofen Plus in the morning.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The hanging basket I bought from B&M for 10p is still very damp (despite being in the house for over a month, I think) and the plants are beginning to die, probably from root rot. It's probably also been infested with the fungus gnats, so I plan to dig up the surviving plants, pot them up, and then disinfect the compost in the oven.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Fell asleep fine, but woke at 2 and didn't properly go back to sleep, despite having several vivid and vaguely unpleasant dreams. Stayed in bed till 10. Full of anxiety, but have bathed and washed my hair, and am snacking at least. I have eczema on both hands, worse on the right, which seems to come and go. It's generally eased in the morning, but today is quite noticeable. Going to treat it with some Betnovate.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Took two Nurofen Plus in the morning. Noises from next door whilst doing my midday meditation. Inevitable, I suppose. And not *that* disturbing in reality.
Still swatting the midges -- three or four today. I wonder if they have proliferated in the damp hanging basket?

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Another restless night. Took half a Z at sleep time. Fell asleep fine, but woke at 2 and didn’t properly go back to sleep again. Up at 07:30 for my doctors appointment at 08:30. Dr Kennedy has advised staying on the present dosage of codeine and gave me some tips for dealing with the eczema on my hands (moisturise daily; treat flares with twice-daily Betnovate for a week). I have been Co-op shopping, collected scrips from Boots, washed up, washed a pair of trousers, and given the wet soil a second baking (160 F, no fan, for 30 minutes). I feel utterly knackered at 11:00.
Keep making small mistakes, such as putting my trousers in the wash with some coins in the pocket.
I have transferred the little plants from the wet hanging basket into pots, but I don't think they are going to survive. Oh well. I have a colourful (pink!) basket virtually for free to maybe put my argyranthemum cuttings in next spring.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I took two Solpadeine Max at about 13:30 and had a lie-down resting my very sore ankle on my side. Feeling quite ill, tired and nauseous. It was fairly effective for a couple of hours. Managed to eat fairly well today, although I don't feel that hungry. Better appetite later, eating snacks of Tunnocks Tea Cakes and bombay mix.
It occurred to me that I have just potted up plants with soil containing gnat eggs. Have ditched all of them except the healthiest, which I will bottom-water and treat with neem oil. The ones I ditched were dying anyway, to be honest.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 23:30, took half a Z. Awake just before 5, took my morning codeine and had a pleasant shamatha. Up at 08:30.
The weather is grotty. Even the normally jolly Johnny Lewis commented on how dark it was at 08:30. Cold (4 C today), overcast, although not windy or wet. Due to improve later in the week, but we shall see.
I am in a funny half and half mood, mostly sad & low but with these odd moments of an inner smile. When I am busy, I don't feel my ankle pain.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 23:30, took two Solpadeine Max. Slept and drowsed very pleasantly. Awake just before 5 and had a pleasant shamatha. Up at 08:00. Forgot my morning codeine, so took it at about 10. Feeling really grotty today and it's freezing fog. Have had a lie down already (at 11). And my Google calendar and tasks have stopped working after Thunderbird updated itself. The add-on doesn't work with the latest version 68.3.1.
Went back to bed at some point and spent the rest of the day lying on it in my shorts, t-shirt, and socks.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke at 23:30, took two Solpadeine Max. It felt as though I didn't go back to sleep, but I must have. Felt really rubbish when I woke up, so spent the whole day in bed. Took two Nurofen Plus in the morning and my midday codeine shortly thereafter.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 00:30, took half a Z. Slept through till just after 6. Meditated till 08:30, when my alarm went off for my appointment with Dr Higgins at 10:30. Made tea and started doing my morning activities when I started feeling really shaky, cold sweat, wobbly legs. Rang and cancelled, took two Solpadeine Max, and then went to lie on my bed. Noticed that I hadn't taken my morning codeine. Lay on my bed until about 11:30, when I got up and made a cup of coffee. Went to have a shave and noticed that I have fairly bad conjunctivitis in my right eye. Have eaten an apple today.
The problem with my Thunderbird add-on has resolved itself. Thank goodness for that.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: At just before 5, have been up since doing my midday meditation. And eaten a few bowlsful of Bombay mix. Baked some Goosnargh biscuits, but at the wrong temperature. They are a little brown. We shall have to see how they taste.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Felt very restless going to sleep, so took half a Z. Woke at 23:30 and 02:30. At some point, I put my earplugs in, then took them out. Can't remember when. I also forgot to put my gum shield in. Took my morning codeine and started drowsing/meditating at 5. Up just after 8, had a bath and washed my hair, then went out and did a Co-op shop. Was going to wait till my red eye had improved, but I thought blow it, it could be days. Feeling improved compared to the last few days.
The man who lives opposite me has got his windows open. Goodness me, but it's cold out today. Wet grey & a bit grim.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Put the cardboard in the window before going to sleep. Fell asleep fine, woke just after 12 and 4, then awake just after 6. Took my morning codeine and had a very restful shamatha. Up at 9. Feeling hot & cold, runny nose, getting energy drops. Codeine withdrawal, maybe? Took a Nurofen Plus this morning to even things out. Fretting about watering the plants and have decided to only water once a week in the winter.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feeling quite rough with anxiety this afternoon. Fretting about putting the bin out. Put a clean pair of shorts on and managed to leak into them, badly enough to warrant a rewash. Have worked my way through about three toothpicks this afternoon. (Picking my teeth is my anxiety obsessive activity. The toothpicks are made of wood, which slowly splits and pinches the lips. A split toothpick is also a bit of a home for bacteria, so they get binned.)

* The recycling bin is out for collection tomorrow. And my phone alarm is set for 08:30 to nip out and collect it early. * I can hear noises from next door in the bathroom, although no-one is home. I wonder if it is Charlie the dog? He must spend an awful lot of time in the house alone if it is. Just like me! He is also very well-behaved about barking/howling if it is him. * Some of the physical symptoms I have been suffering from recently are signs of acute anxiety.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, no meds, no cardboard. Awakened at 00:30 by noises from next door, so put earplugs in. Woke at about 04:30 and didn't go back to sleep. Took my morning codeine at 5 and got up for the bin at 08:30. It had been collected fine. When I got back, felt really tired, so had a lie-down for about an hour. It's 11:30 and I've done some plant care (trimmed the wild muehlenbeckia complexa back), put a big wash on, and had some coffee and cookies. I'm in good spirits, but feel absolutely knackered all the time. Oh and I've got partial blockage, in my left ear I think. Putting drops in, but surprised really at how quickly my ears get blocked using the foam bullet earplugs. I've only used them twice recently and have been cleaning my ears out with a cotton bud. They do block out most noise, though, so it's a bit of a quandary.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Took a Nurofen Plus this morning to even things out again. Quite blocked up at the moment, so need to stop taking extras.
And my red eye is beginning to clear.
I have yet again managed to time my washing to finish at the same time as my lunch is ready. To the minute. The wash time is variable depending on the load. Curious.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Took me a while to get to sleep, as I had a rumbling tummy and ankle pain. Got up and took a half Z. Slept through till 5, but woke full of anxiety. Spent the morning in bed (again!), trying to do the rebirthing breath. Up at about 12:30. Went out to get some shopping at Westgate and to post a redirected letter. Bit drizzly but didn't get too wet in my summer gear and had a lovely chat to Suni. Also had a chat to Bob, who was leaving the house as I got home.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke at 02:30, half-asleep till 04:30 or so. Took my morning codeine at 5, meditated/drowsed till 9. In good spirits, but a little anxious/excited as Sarah will be arriving 12-ish. Managed to focus on and maintain the peaceful restful sleep feeling in my chest pretty much until I got up.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My voice was really bad today. It would start okay, then get very weak and inaudible. Adam was shouting messages across the dinner table for me!

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Took me a while to get to sleep again, as I had a grumbling tummy, nasal congestion, and some ankle pain. Got up and took a half Z. Slept through till 6, but woke full of anxiety. Up at 9. The tummy and nasal symptoms are silent reflux, I think, as I ate a lot yesterday afternoon at Johanne's and then had a couple of cups of tea on top. Another of the intruder lights (the big carriage lamp) was going on and off at intervals, so I put some cardboard in the window. It wasn't flashing or anything, just coming on and then switching off about three minutes later. Not sure why, as there was a car parked underneath it and nobody moving about on Christmas night.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Ate quite a lot for lunch (cold turkey, roast potatoes & dirty fries; bread & butter pudding with cream & creme fraiche), so took a 150 mg ranitidine to counteract excess stomach acid. Bailed out early (17:30 or so) as I felt so grim & weary & in pain. Took two Solpadeine Max for my tummy pain and lay on my bed till 18:30, when I did the Body Scan. It took me a while to get to sleep again, and at about 9 I got up and took a half Z. Put the cardboard in the window as well earlier on. Slept through till 5, when I took my codeine. Meditated from 6 to 11, very peaceful & rested.
I have just looked at the Christmas Day photos wot I took and was mildly horrified at how old & ill I appear. Oh dear.
Fussing a bit today over a couple of things (my plants, folding the cardboard correctly), but have felt more peaceful than for a while. Getting out & meeting people lifts my spirits, I guess, although it did knacker me somewhat. Just not used to being in a room with 13 other people!
Have been listening to music (Suzanne Vega & one of my Spotify mixes, singing along as best I can and picking my guitar up to play along a couple of times. Wearing my new slipper socks and burning incense as well (both presents from Sarah). Later on I may look for books using the WH Smith token that Adam got me.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went to bed late for me (19:15 or so) and feeling good. Fell asleep fine, no meds, no cardboard. Woke just before 12 and just after 4. Felt quite wakeful, so took my morning codeine at 4. Slept till 6, then meditated till getting up just before 10. Feel really rough today, no energy, no appetite, knees & ankle hurting. Have done the basics, watered the plants, and had coffee & cookies, but at midday I now just want to go and lie down.
The hardest thing for me at the moment is the mood swings. But I still, despite everything, have hope. And always will. I know that this will pass... eventually.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: On the plus side, both my ear and my eye have returned to normal.

Had a lie down, listened to the Bodhipaksha meditation twice, then got up, made a pot of tea, and am now finishing a spag bol.
As always, somewhat disconcerted by hateful & sweary posts on the net about political issues and the preponderance of older white men posing for their Facebook portrait wearing a big pair of dark glasses.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, woke at 02:30, half-asleep till 05:30. Took my morning codeine, then meditated all morning in bed. Tried doing some rebirth-style breathing, with some success. My ankle/foot pain was reduced markedly at one point, and I also spent 30 minutes or so in a deep shamatha. I only realised I was in it when I "came to". Up at about 12:45 after getting dressed and doing a double Bodhipaksa.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, no meds, no cardboard. Woke just after 2 and just before 5. Up at 08:30. Out to the Co-op for my weekly shop. Chatted briefly to three women: the volunteer from Age UK in the street, one of the Co-op assistants, and Rani at Westgate Stores.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A bit of a restless night ahead of my appointment with Dr Higgins in the morning. Had tummy pain falling asleep, so took two Nurofen Plus, which eased it enough to drop off. Woke just before midnight to noises from next door, just after 2, then again just before 4. Took my codeine at 4 and rested till getting up at 8. Felt good in the morning, looking forward to the day. Did some shopping in Shipley for apples & Badedas in Boots, then some more at Browgate pharmacy (vitamin D3, Neutrogena & Murine Bright & Moist eye drops) and bought a shirt for £1.50 at Age UK.
Bloomin fungus gnats. Have swatted four already today and one has just flown off my lunch bowl of fish fingers & chips. Ugh.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, no meds, no cardboard. Woke just before midnight, put earplugs in, then woke just after 2 and just after 4. Wakeful at 4, so took my morning codeine and slumbered till just after 6. Up at 8 for tea and a Badedas soak.
Have treated the plants with a neem oil drench and batted three gnats this morning. Getting rid of them completely may take some continued effort. Even bottom watering plants leaves some with wet/damp soil, especially the succulents and other plants with small root balls, such as seedlings.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: And now four. Blow Buddhism, I'm fed up with little black beasties flying into my face whenever I sit down and sitting on my food.
Five. Or maybe six. I wonder if the neem oil drench is flushing them out?

Had a nice long afternoon shamatha. My ankle felt very sore at the end of the guided meditation, but I rested one foot on top of the other and the pain eased enough to have a restful meditation. Felt very peaceful, which was wonderful. Meditating in the midst of pain, as Eckhart Tolle has mentioned.

Grumpy, grumpy
* Those French apples I bought on Shipley Market. Lovely and shiny and a texture like cotton wool. * My left wrist hurts. Arthritis pain, I guess. * Max K commenting on the Starpoint Radio page like an idiot. Feels the need to add a comment to everything, sometimes twice, usually in bad English. * Presenters on Solar being "wacky" and "jokey".
Oh, and not really a grump, but I have a batch of photos (Radley 2007, 10 March) out of sequence. Can't renumber them in series as it creates conflicts (01 > 02 conflicts with exixting 02, and so on). Start from the top?

Started from the top of the series and renamed several using File Explorer, then going to do the rest with Photo Renamer. Which may be a challenge, as you can't sort on dates. At all. If you click on a date header, it sorts by filename, either up or down.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine and woke just before 12 and 2. Awake just after 4, took my morning codeine, meditated peacefully from 5. Up at 8. The past couple of mornings I have had a very restful morning meditation. It's now 10:30 and I've done a Co-op shop, but feel a bit low, anxious & fearful. It's cold & grey. I've just watered my marguerite, which was looking very droopy. We've got rain forecast for today, but it's been very dry for about a week now at a guess.
Still got gnats flitting around in the living room...
Updating my photo "database" at the moment.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My knees and ankle hurt and my legs feel sore and weak.

Wasn't able to "stretch" my afternoon meditation too much today. Ankle pain was too prominent, although I was dimly aware of the "beautiful breath", the feeling of breathing in itself being pleasurable, and wanting the breaths to be longer and deeper to enhance the sensation. And the anxious mind being less "loud" as a result.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine and woke just before 12 and just after 3. Awake just after 5, took my morning codeine, meditated. Up at 8. Have been to Boots, the plant shop on the hill (where I bought a conifer and a pot and had a long chat to Helen, the assistant), and Westgate (where I had a long chat to Rani). eating salmon linguine and watching little YouTube videos about Neem Karoli Baba. Some Goosnargh biscuits are chilling ready to be baked later. Feeling more positive and less anxious than yesterday.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
I have decided to not record a normal night. That's one where I wake up once or maybe twice, don't use any medication or put the cardboard in the window, and come awake at or after about 04:00.
Feeling generally quite good the past couple of days. Experiencing and enjoying sensations, not riddled with anxiety and/or exhaustion.
Have had a bath, hairwash, top-watered the plants, and done a towels wash today. Baked Goosnargh biscuits and a Basmati rice pudding over the past couple of days.
Swatted two gnats today.
Thinking that negative thoughts may still arise, but the secret is not to act on them or even to think about them, to "engage" with them like a gear engages. Slip the clutch...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night. Kept falling asleep and waking up. At 00:30, I got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 05:30. Took my codeine and had a very peaceful shamatha till getting up just after 8.
I have booked a library shift for Saturday PM.
No gnats so far today at just before 1.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Feeling quite peaceful & relaxed, although my legs, knees & ankles all hurt.
The eczema on my hands is just about gone after a week of applying Betnovate daily in the afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
It's a grey windy day, not particularly cold (10 C), but feel cold and somewhat anxious and tired. Slept fine, up just after 8, eating okay.
Grumping about marketing shenanigans from Kobo. You can't buy anything without an account. They ask for an email as part of the account, then send you an email to confirm the purchase (and the email address). Oh and they ask for your postcode "to calculate taxes on your purchases.". First marketing email today. You can choose to opt out of receiving marketing emails, but you have to enter your name and date of birth. I have now changed the real postcode that I gave them yesterday to a fake postcode (W1A 1AA). And marked the marketing email as junk.
Something in me is saying that this is too much fuss, it's pretty normal, and it's not the end of the world. Let go of my attachment to the way I think things should be. Don't get upset and angry. It's that wounded child voice again...
Update: the first email was a receipt, it contained useful information, and their help is very good. The links in it didn't contain any tracking information.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A fine night's sleep, woke at 4, took my codeine and drowsed till just before 6. Felt rested and not very motivated, so stayed in bed till about 10:15. Feeling okay now I'm up, had a Badedas bath, watered the plants. Will have a shave later.
My winter-flowering pansies are coming into flower.
Have blatted two gnats today, one upstairs and one downstairs. The upstairs one I think came from the succulent. Not sure about downstairs -- it was in the kitchen and came from the window.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Same as yesterday, so stayed in bed till 10. It's cold & grey and I feel vaguely anxious & somewhat uninspired.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Feeling lumpen just before 4 despite doing two Bodhipaksas. And my stomach hurts, so I've just taken two Solpadeine Max.
Have worked my way through three toothpicks a day the last few days. Obsessively picking to distract myself from a very sore ankle and mental/emotional discomfort.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night. Woke feeling awake just after midnight and took two Nurofen Plus. Drowsed till 04:40, when I took my morning codeine. Stayed in bed till 09:15 or so, feeling increasingly anxious. Excited/nervous about my library session. Had my earplugs in for a while. Had a brief odd experience, where my field of inner vision turned into the golden doughnut and I felt myself rising.
I have swatted one gnat today and seen another one.
Bulb have just given me £140. Funny, because I checked their email yesterday that said it might take a couple of months.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie down at 17:15. Body Scan at 18:45, but wakeful and very anxious afterwards. Sore ankle, dry lips, mind racing. Took half a Z, then some time later two Nurofen Plus. Also put the cardboard in the window. Slept through, though, till 05:22. Meditated quite peacefully until getting up with the alarm at 9 and going out shortly for a library volunteering session. Had a Badedas bath and top-watered all the plants except the two big ones, which I'll do tomorrow.
Haven't eaten at all this morning and haven't seen any gnats either.
Had a rest with Bodhipaksa after the session, then had a pot of tea, made scrambled eggs on toast, and listened to Radio Seagull. Chris Bent's show till 3, then Duncan Barkes from 4.
Worrying about buying a Nikon battery charger. Will it be the right one for the battery I recently bought?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: And worrying about the payment I made to MBNA. It's not showing up on either the first direct or the MBNA website.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A normal night, awake at 05:22 with tummy pain and anxiety. Codeine & a restless meditation till 08:30. Feeling mildly anxious about everything. With occasional glimpses of a sunny side. The funny thing is, it's raining & sepulchral, but I don't mind. I quite like the sound of rain when I'm wrapped up warm in bed and I don't mind it during the day. As long as I don't have to go out in it! Switching radio stations in search of a good vibe. Crackly old records on Solar, Marcus Bee chuckling away on Starpoint and playing shagging records, settled on Dancegroove. GnatWatch: Swatted one and spotted one. Both in the kitchen window.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: There was a Christmas present in the library kitchen from Baildon Town Council. A box of Thorntons Classic chocolates. I ate about half of them yesterday evening. The shift went fine. Siobhan, Rosy, and I spent a good deal of time chatting.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 01:20, then again at 02:22, so got up and took two Solpadeine Max. Had a restless meditation on waking up, moments of peace & rest, then anxious thoughts arising. Up just after 9, have had tea and now coffee and called MBNA to make the failed payment. That was successful and I challenged my fear by making the call. I do feel tired now, though. And still stressing that the payment has failed again. Despite the fact that I have a transaction ID given to me by a member of MBNA staff.
This is the nature of my anxiety. Everything can be a source of worry, stress & fear. So it's not the things themselves but the thoughts. My brain feels inflamed.
Just swatted a gnat. All of the recent ones have been downstairs, interestingly.
And early afternoon, just spotted another one.
Then swatted it later when it landed on my iPad.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night. Woke at around midnight to noises from next door, then again at 02:20, then again at 03:30, so took my codeine. Slumbered some, then meditated from about 05:30 to 9.
Had some success with breathing into my ankle pain and mentally spreading it out across the wide blue sky of my inner vision to accept it, and then let the pain go. I could feel it receding, but then coming back as anxious thoughts arose.
In the morning, went out shopping at Westgate, then the Co-op, then collected my scrips from Boots. It is now raining quite heavily.
The MBNA payment has been credited to my account. With a day to go on my interest-free period. It hasn't been taken from my bank account yet, though. Time to increase the Virgin DD to £75 a month.
Have been guitaring a little over the past few days.
The riff from Chic - Le Freak Seals & Crofts - Summer Breeze David Bowie - Rebel Rebel Spandau Ballet - Through The Barricades

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A normal night. Woke at 2-ish and awake at just before 6. Up at 8.
Feeling generally quite good the past couple of days. Woke in a good mood but feeling a bit droopy at 10:30. Why does it feel colder when it's overcast? Is it because grey skies are uninspiring?
Have had a Badedas bath, top-watered the plants, and done a clothes wash today. Baking Goosnargh biscuits at the moment and later negotiating the mysteries of registering the first direct app on my OnePlus.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A good night's sleep, but awake at 05:30 feeling cross because I wanted to go on sleeping. Had a restless meditation and got up at 9. Feeling quite bad this morning, full of aches & pain and anxiety.
Have got quite bloodshot eyes at the moment. My Murine eye drops don't seem to help, sadly.
Have swatted one gnat today. Upstairs in the bathroom.
Trying to resist the temptation to go and lie down. My left ankle and my right knee are both very sore.
Update: Had a lie-down from 11:22 to just before 12. Got up, had paella lunch and watched the rest of New Order - Play at Home, then went for my afternoon meditation at 13:22. Did a double Bodhipaksa and had a nice restful shamatha after till just before 3.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had to wash my shorts again due to leaking pee after a morning pooh. Ugh.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A slightly odd night. Woke at 01:07, quite wakeful, so took two Solpadeine Max. Drowsed half-asleep till 04:07, when I took my morning codeine. Didn't go back to sleep, bet rested/meditated on my back from 5. Not bad, quite restful, and at one point I thought "My problem is I'm bored". There may be a lot of truth in that. My legs feel stronger today and I was enjoying walking around and stretching them earlier. My mood is much better than yesterday and I even made a trip to the Co-op just before it started raining. No walking stick, but carried a brolly instead.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night, lots of noises from next door, so took two Nurofen Plus at about 9. Woke just after 1, then awake just after 4, so took my codeine. Slumbered some, then meditated restfully from 6 to 08:45.
Have had tea and a very small cup of coffee, and one apple. Anxious before my volunteering session. Have seen two gnats, one up and one downstairs.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: A slightly challenging session. The library database was out of action, so we had to write down the card and book numbers of all issues, returns, and renewals. I was doing the session with Marjorie, who told me at one point early on that she'd been "on a treadmill" living in Baildon for almost 50 years. She hates the moors especially and wants to move back to Bedfordshire, but hubby won't allow. Good grief.

My legs feel quite stiff and sore today and my ankle hurts again. Feeling fairly rested after my scrambled eggs on toast and tea, but still got that residual backround fear and worry about nothing in particular and everything.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A very restless night. Woke just after midnight and 2, both times hearing noises from the next-door bedroom. It feels as though I can hear my neighbour turning over in bed or something. Unsettling when I feel anxious. Put my earplugs in at 2. Awake at just before 4. Took my codeine and kind of slumbered till 6. Up at 09:30 after a fairly restful meditation. It's pleasurable to lie and meditate without nagging mental worries and physical pain.
GnatWatch: Swatted one this morning and spotted another. I may have to learn to live with a certain number of them.
Reading the news (BBC, Grauniad) and Longform last night before going to bed and was very struck by the amount of worry, disagreement/dislike, and suffering documented in all four sources. And that's in addition to the sad/angry posts on Facebook.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
