Fell asleep okay, no extras, no cardboard. Woke at just after 2 and just after 4. Put my earplugs in at some point, and they were still in when I awoke after 6. Up at 09:30 after a restless meditation.
Feeling pretty anxious about starting my painting course tomorrow morning.
Ain't seen no gnats yet today.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Saw a gnat earlier this afternoon flitting around the sofa.
Have just taken two Solpadeine Max. Hurting all over and hoping to calm my anxiety somewhat before bedtime.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep okay, woke at just after 2 and just before 5. Had a restless meditation till I got up at 8. The art class was a bit hard work. The heating went off at one point and my legs were really sore and stiff after sitting on a chair in the cold for two hours. I found the drawing quite difficult, using charcoal and feeling pretty anxious. I will keep going, though, as I suspect it will do me a lot of good. Got my camera battery charger today, a really fast delivery from Amazon and the kit came with two batteries. So well stocked now with three camera batteries. And it's now charging the other battery that I bought, so my old charger is definitely knackered. Spotted one gnat today, in the kitchen.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: We fixed our charcoal drawings with hair spray. My legs felt really weak when I was walking to the bus stop. I wonder if the hair spray clobbered my nervous system like smoking used to do?

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep okay, woke at just after 4. Got up for a pee, took my codeine, but didn't go back to sleep fully. Meditated fitfully from 6. Up at 08:30 to fetch the recycling bin (which hadn't been emptied). No worries. Got washed & dressed and went out shopping at the Co-op, then Westgate Stores (including a nice chat with Rani). It's warm today and intermittently sunny, but I feel pretty low with anxiety and pain in my legs.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Have a volunteering session booked for Friday, which is causing me some anxiety. I must keep on doing what I need (eating, resting, washing, outside activities).
Slightly disconcerting: I get up for a pee at 4 in the morning, go back to bed and, as I'm dropping off to sleep, hear noises from next door. Someone getting up, sound of a door closing, the silence. Is my neighbour such a light sleeper that me getting up wakes him? Don't know and shouldn't really be bothered, since there's nothing I can do about it. I do like sleeping in the small bedroom in the winter months as it gets cosy warm. Despite noises from next door and not having a curtain...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep okay, woke at 03:07, Feeling wakeful and there were noises from next door, so took my codeine and put my earplugs in. Awake at 06:33 and up at 09:30 after a restless and anxious meditation time. Why is it that I can sleep restfully for a good while (admittedly with some coaxing from codeine) and wake up feeling so anxious? I am up and have eaten and done my usual chores but feel rather wretched, to be honest. Mentally & physically tired, joyless, critical, grumpy.
Have swatted two gnats, one up and one downstairs.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Did a double Bodhipaksa at lunchtime and had a fairly restful shamatha until 14:30, with my left foot crossed over my right.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did my Body Scan at just before 7, but wakeful afterward (sore ankle, dry lips), so took two Nurofen Plus. Woke at 23:30, so got up for a pee and took half a Z. Slept through till 05:37. Meditated fairly peacefully until getting up with the alarm at 9 and am going out shortly for my library volunteering session. Feeling much less anxious than yesterday.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Woke at 00:00 (rather odd, but I'd been pondering during the day about when a day actually starts). Awake just before 4, so took my codeine. Didn't really go back to sleep. Meditated from 6 as usual, up at 08:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 23:37, then awake just before 5. Took my morning codeine and had a very restful shamatha till getting up at 9. Very peaceful, no anxious thoughts, no body pain. When the anxious thoughts started to arise, I accepted them into the pleasant restful feeling in my head, where they kind of dissolved. Up for a bath and a shave in the bath, both also very pleasant.
Feeling quite relaxed all morning, only getting anxious when I started to investigate some of the mysterious multiple options on my Nikon D70. Fearful of changing a setting and not knowing what it was or how to get it back. It's not an ideal camera for me in many ways: it's too heavy to carry around; I still don't understand most of the options; the battery seems to run out quite fast. It does take nice photos, though.
Hearing a lot of flat As on the radio in certain words (after, afternoon) even in otherwise-southern accents. Advertisers.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early at 17:45. Had difficulty falling asleep, so got up and took two Solpadeine Max. Slept fitfully till just after 2, then awake just after 4. Up at 8 after a mixed meditation. Very worried about the electric oven not working, then my painting class, and then a forthcoming letter from the Living With Pain service. Had a bath and went shopping at the Co-op (served by helpful Kath, who opened a till - I fancied being served by a human bean instead of the silly self-service female voice) and Westgate.
Funny... I had a small thought when I was stressing about all those things, "maybe it will be alright". The oven is working fine. And the Hive have just emailed to say that tomorrow's class is cancelled due to tutor Jane's ill-health.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I have been feeling a lot more upful today. Written at 17:20. Trying to go to bed later, but I do generally feel quite knackered by 7 in the evening. I have watched several videos on YouTube today about Neem Karoli Baba. Feeling drawn to the ineffable at the moment.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Had a good deal to eat yesterday, including about half a bag of balti mix from about 5 onwards, and slept through till about 5 after going to bed at 19:15. Up at 8, bath, hair wash, shave, out for a haircut. Franco's is closed Tuesdays, so went to the Co-op for a packet of tortillas and a primrose basket. A cold clear morning, didn't use a stick. I got in the house and almost immediately the sky started to darken, followed by a snow/sleet shower for about an hour. It hasn't settled at 11 and there was quite a high wind anyway, which tends to stop snow settling.
It's going to be a relatively cold day today (4 C or so), although the temperature is forecast to rise to 13 C in a couple of days. Mad, isn't it? But I'm smiling at the thought and feel content to be snug in my little house with warmth and candles and food and no need to go out for a couple of days. Well, apart from putting the waste bin out tonight. Got Ocado and M&S deliveries scheduled for tomorrow.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had another double Bodhipaksa and a very restful shamatha afterwards. Left ankle crossed over right. Feeling the beautiful breath and how resting my attention in that peaceful flow lets the pain fade into the background. My breaths were very slow during the Bodhipaksa Mindfulness Of Breathing practice.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Sat in the candlelight from about 6 last night listening to a Ram Dass talk. It was quite long (over two hours) so didn't listen to it all and may just start it from the beginning later on. Had a restful night, awake at 4, up at 08:30 for the bin, then deliveries from M&S (via Royal Mail) and Ocado (who didn't have about half of the items I'd ordered). I've had a busy few days catching up, including ordering stuff online and submitting my change of circumstances info to Bradford City Council. Including a friendly phone conversation with an Aviva rep. Their advisors are always friendly & patient, the call is free, and they'll even call you back if there's a long queue (which I did yesterday). Still feeling quite peaceful and upful, but I get twinges round the edges. I have, however, not felt panicky or fearful, and have been challenging worrisome thoughts. Like worrying about sending the letter from Aviva, which shows that my payments increased from £415 to £422 for quite a few months. But when I looked closer, that turned out to be a change in the amount of tax that I was paying. And they calculate Housing Benefit using the gross payment amount of £460, which doesn't change.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A normal night, woke at 01:22 and awake around 05:30. Didn't want to get up, so meditated till getting up at 09:30. Got up and drew the curtains and put my earplugs in at a couple of points -- signs of wanting a longer lie in. The meditation was fine, doing a modified Knowledge Meditation with the earplugs in (but no tongue position and saying Accept this, Let this go to my physical pain). Woke with tummy pain and slight soreness in my ankle. I don't normally wake with those, so part of the general overall feeling of pain?
Wanting to pee all the time. Can't empty my bladder fully, even standing up.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feeling quite low & anxious at just after 4 PM. Stressing about the fit of the T-shirts I just bought. They all seem to be different widths (I ordered regular fit) and there is no marking on the T-shirt (or on the order details) to show the fit that I actually bought.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night. Woke at 23:30, then again at 01:22. Awake at 05:17, took my codeine and had a restless meditation till getting up just after 8. Anxious, anxious, anxious. Went shopping at the Co-op, took it home, then went and got my hair cut. On the way back, popped into Westgate Stores to see if they had any white spirit (they did). They also do little light bulbs with bayonet fittings.
Everybody I met walking to the Co-op said good morning. I found myself with a big smile on my face at one point. Felt quite calm doing the checkout, which is not always the case.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did my Body Scan at just before 7, but wakeful afterward (sore ankle, dry lips), so took two Nurofen Plus and put earplugs in. Slept through till 04:07. Took my codeine and drowsed till after 6, although it didn't feel as though I'd gone back to sleep. Meditated fairly peacefully until getting up with the alarm at 9 and going out for my library volunteering session just before 12. Feeling less anxious than yesterday? Not sure.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A normal night, woke at 23:30 and awake just after 4. Took my morning codeine and rested not fully asleep till 6, when I started meditating. Up just after 8. It's wet, cold & grey.
Tried cleaning the sticky residue off the body of my Nikon D70 with white spirit with no result. Googled the problem and found out that it's the rubbery coating degrading. You can "fix" it by using isopropyl alcohol, but this apparently just strips a layer off the surface. There are various ideas about this, but nothing authoritative, so I'm not going to worry about it.
Fittonia stem cuttings take best with rooting powder. You can apparently also start them in water.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Did a double Bodhipaksa and lay in the bright sunshine until 14:30 with no real pain in my ankle. Mildly fearful, though -- didn't feel completely relaxed. Still, good progress.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night, woke at 00:00 to noises from next door. Woke again just after 3, slumbered till just after 4, when I took my codeine. Didn't really go back to sleep. Had a restless & anxious meditation from 6 till getting up at 9. Put my earplugs in from about 8. At just before 11, I've had a bath (as I do most days now), had a shave, put a clothes wash on and feeling full of anxiety. Principally about the art class tomorrow.
Cut my ear shaving. It's healed up quickly and nicely, but it caused me some anxiety, mostly because I was blaming myself. When we judge ourselves, who's doing the judging and who's in the dock?
Have spotted one or two gnats occasionally over the past week, but I ignore them or wave them away. Live and let live.
High winds forecast again for today and tomorrow (up to 47 mph). Have moved the recycling bin again. Another thing to get anxious about? Maybe.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My legs are slowly healing, I believe, but my knees, back & left ankle all hurt today.
It's 15:30 and I feel low, very anxious, ache all over, and have dry, gritty, bloodshot eyes. Ugh.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early at 4 after taking two Solpadeine Max. (They had absolutely no effect: note for future.) Did two Body Scans and put the light out at 19:15. Fell asleep okay, woke at 02:12 and awake at 04:07. Drowsed till 6, then meditated till getting up at 10. It was a fairly successful meditation, stayed focused on the breath throughout good and bad thoughts. Didn't get any anxiety rushes either, even when deliberately bringing to mind fearful thoughts. Nice.
After all that, the art class was cancelled. Tutor Jane is still poorly. I think I may cancel it. Maybe find something at Bradford Mind? The class didn't really feel right for one and there may be the Living With Pain course to fit in to my schedule for another.
And I found the little screw for the angel lights battery case. On the carpet right in front of the stove.
And we have been given an extra year's funding at the library. Until the end of March 2021.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept through till 04:02. Up before 8. My legs hurt and I feel quite tired, but I'm in fairly good spirits. Have been shopping at the Co-op, Westgate, and Age UK. Yesterday evening was spent reading Baildon Memories and looking at a book of old photos. I've refound the old map website that I used for Lancaster maps and it has a fairly good selection of high scale old maps, with the ability to use a present-day overlay.
https://maps.nls.uk/geo/explore/#zoom=15&lat=53.8533&lon=-1.7703&layers=1&b=1

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 00:30 and just after 3. Slumbered with waking dreams till 06:17, when I took my codeine. Had a strange taste in the back of my mouth, and my abdomen and ankle both hurt. Withdrawal symptoms? Had a restless meditation till getting up at 08:30. Feeling sad empty anxious... all the usual negative stuff. Am baking some Goosnargh biscuits today. It's very bright and sunny. My primroses look lovely, but the slugs think they are tasty. And I think my fuchsia may need pruning back.
Radio Mi Amigo is playing exactly the same tracks as yesterday.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 00:30 and again just after 2. Awake at 05:20. Had a mixed meditation from 6 till getting up at 9. Could feel some peace and joy somewhere inside me, but couldn't focus on it and let it grow. I feel very sad and low at the moment. With an incipient migraine.
Problems with my argyranthemum plants. The big one outside needs cutting back, I think, and the one in the kitchen is looking yellow, probably from lack of light. It's gone back upstairs. Trod mud in the house and overwatered the monstera in the kitchen.
It's forecast to be very windy for three days starting on Sunday. Wind speeds in the 40s.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A very restless night. Awake at just after 1, so took two Nurofen Plus. Still wakeful at 02:30, so took my morning codeine. Dreamed and drowsed fitfully till about half 5, when I started meditating. Had a retless meditation till getting up at half 8. Off out to my morning library session in my new green jumper. Stressing about the wind, the possibility of power cuts mostly.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 00:00 with abdominal pain and feeling hot, so took half a Z. Found the high winds and rain quite unsettling, too, so put earplugs in. Woke just before 7, up at 08:30 for a bath and washed hair.
Came downstairs to find a fair bit of rainwater coming in through the lintels above the kitchen window and the back door. The kitchen water is fairly easy to deal with using a baking pan and some dishcloths to catch the wet, but there is a fair bit of water coming through the back door and streaming down on to the carpet. Enough (with outside winds of 60 mph) to soak a large towel at the base of the door in about an hour. Damp had spread to one of my book boxes, too, which is a real worry. Have moved some of the magazines and book boxes away from the door and may move more later. Need to keep an eye on how damp the carpet is getting and maybe put the big space heater on overnight to keep the carpet dry.
Called Liz a couple of times, no reply, so sent a text. Also called Sarah for some support and left a message asking her to call. Liz called back within the hour and is visiting tomorrow. Sarah called back shortly after and we discussed possible plans of action. She and Jamie are both feeling unwell at the moment and travel is not advisable in the current conditions.
The wind speed is due to drop a bit later today (the 50s and then the 40s) and the rain is due to ease tomorrow and also turn to sleet. Fingers crossed.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A very restless night. Awake at half 11, feeling anxious and sleepless, so took two Solpadeine Max. Didn't really go back to sleep. Worrying about the storm and Liz coming round. Took my codeine at 4 and got up at half 8. Have done a number of things today (put a towel wash on, ironed some hankies, watered the plants and moved some around, had a Facebook chat to Sarah, and just had a shave) but still anxious at 12. But then Liz may well have other tenants with more serious storm problems. I saw her car in the yard and assumed she would be rushing round :-) Let me accept the world as it is and not how I think it should be or want it to be. The storm is abating gradually and there is no further rainwater coming into the house. The carpet is still damp, but it will dry. I had the big space heater on all night but I can't tell if it made any real difference. Now drying towels after soaking about three yesterday.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Did a double Bodhipaksa from 1 to 2. Didn't ease my ankle pain, but it has calmed me somewhat.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night. Went for a pee about 9 and found water dripping out of the bathroom radiator. Closed the valves off and took two Nurofen Plus feeling stressed with abdominal and ankle pain. Woke at 00:30, so took half a Z. Awake at 06:30, up just before 9. Washed, dressed, out to the chemists and Westgate Stores. Had a nice couple of chats in the shops and am feeling much improved.
Liz didn't come round and I'm not stressed about it. I've reported the rainwater incident and there's nothing further that I need doing. (Apart from replacing the draughty leaky door with a window.) If she wants more information, she will get in touch. I did wonder if she took the "thanks for the prompt reply" text that I sent her as an indication that I didn't need anything further (including a visit).

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The radiator leak seems to have been some excess water trapped in the valves. Or something. I opened them both out fully and waited for the excess water to drain out onto the floor. The radiator is hot, the pressure in the central heating boiler is fine (which I was worried out if there was a leak), and there is no further water on the floor under the valves after a couple of hours.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine (with earplugs in), but woke just after 1. Felt wakeful, so took two Nurofen Plus. Still wakeful at 2, so took my morning codeine. Slept till about 05:30, and started meditating shortly after. Up just after 8. Been to the Co-op and had a long chat to assistant Sue. Quite cold today (4-5 C), but bright sunshine at times. And sleet flurries.
Still quite anxious. Had a couple of fleeting moments of despair & doubt whilst meditating this morning.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine (with earplugs in), but woke at 02:30. Felt restless, so took my morning codeine. Still restless at 03:30, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Don't remember going to sleep, but woke at 06:30. Had a fairly good meditation till getting up at 9. Was able to breathe into my emotional and physical pain and release it. Feeling better than yesterday.
Had a bit of a jump yesterday when Sarah messaged me on Facebook to ask if I wanted "to come over to Leeds". Yes I do, but not for a couple of weeks.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Had a nice midday meditation lying on my bed in the sunshine. Spoilt rather by a very sore ankle, which didn't abate today. It's gone quite overcast now at half 2.
Exploring Ealing on Street View and trying to work out my walk to the tube station in the morning. I remember Ken taking me and Mum to a very nice curry house just to the side of the station entrance. That must have been in March 1976, as I was just back from Morocco and remember smoking Disque Bleu in the restaurant and feeling quite cosmopolitan.

Was Alan there? Can't remember.
Having mood swings today. I get glimpses of feeling free, calm, and content, then the clench and panic return, sometimes over quite trivial things.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine with no earplugs. Awake at 02:41, then just after 4, when I took my morning codeine. No extras. Up at 9, but at about 10:30 started to want to go to the loo. This is after 3-4 days not going and taking codeine at night.
Used one glycerol suppository, then another, and wasn't moving. so ended up using a third. Which is when I started leaking, at about 11:30. This went on till 3, when I just lay with pants. t-shirt, and no socks on the red towel on my bed. In the period before, leaking into the loo, washing my bot frequently, washing pants on a 30-minute cycle, drying them on my bedroom radiator, and cleaning up drops and splashes on the loo and bathroom floor.
Took two Solpadeine Max at about 16:00 to try and stop the squits and my bot feeling sore. No food all day apart from two apples. I was careful to wash my hands before eating.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Awake at 00:30, then again just after 2 feeling anxious, then at 4, when I took my morning codeine. Feeling really anxious and low by 6. Meditated in bed till getting up at 11. Called in sick for my volunteering session at 09:30. My voice sounded really croaky. Maybe it gets better as I get up and start moving around. No accidents in the night (and I finally had a big poo at about 22:00) and now at midday my bot feels a little bit sore, but nothing serious and I'm not leaking, thank goodness. Feeling hot and weary and sad, but have had morning tea, brushed my teeth, put a small clothes wash on, mopped the bathroom floor with bleach and shampoo, and am making scrambled eggs on toast for a quick light lunch.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My finances continue to be quite healthy, even after the small clothes & camera shopping spree. Forecast to be £1409 in the bank at the end of April (and two State Pension payments).

Two days of high winds forecast for the weekend. The wintry weather really does seem to go on for ever sometimes. At least they are south-westerly, so relatively warm and not blowing directly against the back of my house.

I am so sick and tired of feeling sick and tired all the time. It seems that I start to make progress, am eating and sleeping, getting out, and having a regular routine, then it all goes backwards again and I'm left feeling anxious all the time, missing out activities, and using more codeine to settle me, especially at night. And at the back of it all is the constant grinding pain in my ankle (and sometimes my arthritic knees as well).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Those south-westerly winds and heavy rain blew against the back door again, with a fair bit of rain coming through. Put a couple of big towels down, which got soaked within an hour. The forecast was for high winds and heavy rain all night, so before bedtime I moved as many boxes about six feet away as I could and put the big space heater on at 25 C.
Went to bed with earplugs in so that I couldn't hear the wind howling and get stressed by it. Still awake at 21:17, so got up and took half a Z. Slept through till just after 6, took my codeine and meditated till getting up at 9.
It wasn't as bad as I'd feared. The carpet was pretty damp up to about a couple of feet away, but dry round the right-hand corner. The water comes in through the door glass seals (worse on the right) and bounces off the letter box. The worst damage was in the kitchen, which I didn't think was leaking. It was, through the window recess and onto my washing pods on the left. They are all liquefied and I have moved the box away and will use my dosing ball to wash with the liquid.
The forecast is for 40+ mph winds today, but only light rain showers. Fingers crossed that the worst is over.
Sarah and Jamie are visiting for lunch on Tuesday, so out for some Co-op shopping tomorrow.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I was a little reluctant to eat any lunch, but the Co-op beef casserole with dumplings is excellent.

None of the stuff that I am dealing with is out of the ordinary. There are troops in Ilkley helping with flood defences. I had leaks and draughts at the Old School House and got panicked about water coming in after a June downpour.

Did a double Bodhipaksa after lunch and felt my ankle pain ease. And some moments of inner peace when I was able to let go of the fear and negative stories. And the sun came out. Very nice, all in all.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 22:30, then again just after 2. Awake just before 6. Meditated in bed till getting up at 08:30. Feeling really low & anxious today and the bathroom radiator has started leaking again.
Went out to do Co-op and Westgate shopping, then ate some cookies and two apples. Went for my midday meditation at 12:30, then stayed resting on my bed for the rest of the day. Took two Nurofen Plus at about 3.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Woke at 23:30, then again just after 2. Took half a Z at around midnight. Took my morning codeine just after 4 and rested and meditated till getting up at 8.
Feeling pretty anxious again. The bathroom radiator is leaking even when I don't turn the knobs or when the heating turns off and on. And the boiler is at 0 bar, although it increases when I run the bath. I have turned the radiator off completely now and guess I will have to tell Liz.
Had a pretty fretful visit from Sarah & Jamie. They arrived just after 12:30, and I felt quite shaky with anxiety by then. We didn't go out (the weather was wet & rubbish anyway), had a chat on the sofa while J played on the computer. We had sandwiches from Nine (the cafe) at about 2. Sarah encouraged me to message Liz about the central heating problems, describing the problems and asking her to phone to discuss. Which she did, very promptly, and said she would instruct Matt the plumber. It was well timed, as she is going to the States tomorrow teatime and will be out of touch. (Although, she's leaving her phone with her sister, who I think lives at 33 Westgate.)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took half a Z at 21:30. Woke just before 3, then slept through till 06:17. The heating was off. Took my morning codeine, messaged Matt, put the space heaters on, and got up at 08:30. Have lit the stove, watered the plants, and washed and washed up with kettles. Matt is coming to fix it all tomorrow afternoon.
Just after 14:00, turned the water and radiator temperature dials to their usual settings (water =0, radiator = 10; they'd been the other way round since this morning), turned the hot tap on to see if there was any hot water, and lo and behold the boiler fired up. I ran the hot water till the pressure gauge reached 0.5 bar just to see if there was pressure in the system. Have turned the space heaters off whilst it's working, but I guess I'll need to check the boiler periodically and be prepared for it to go off again.
It's a bit like my mood in a way...
Have eaten and drunk my normal amount today and not had any lie-downs so far.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, just before 6, I think.
Had a very restless night. Woke at 22:30, then at 01:47. At about 02:30, took my morning codeine. Still awake at 03:10, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Didn't really go back to sleep. Had earplugs in constantly till just before getting up at 08:30. Was quite anxious the whole night. I can't keep taking codeine and will have to start taking Zopiclone. I've been wary of doing that if I wake after midnight, though.
The heating is still on, at 0.5 bar. The radiator heat is fine (adding a bit from space heaters here and there), although the hot water isn't really hot enough. And the radiator in the big bedroom needs bleeding, I think.
Feeling a bit better today. The weather is due to get very windy and wet again at the weekend. Think I may have to pull out of my library shift. My arthritis is quite painful at the moment. Trying to keep things in the day, and in the hour today. Matt hasn't cancelled, so he is going to come. It may be earlier or later, but he will message me an hour in advance.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Matt didn't come in the end. I texted him to check at 16:30 and he replied at 20:30 last night to say that he was running late and would be coming "late morning". It's now just before 11 and no word yet. The boiler is still on (at reduced pressure), so that is good. And I turned the hot water dial up and had a nice hot bath this morning. But I'll be glad when it's all sorted out out. It's a bit of a lesson in patience and serenity. And maintaining goodwill.
Anyway, fell asleep about 9. Woke at 00:30 and took half a Z. Awake shortly after 6 (the heating had come on) feeling rather groggy. Took my morning codeine and rested as best I could until the postman came at 08:45.
Trying to eat as normally as possible and get my sleep, do my meditations, get exercise and rest.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep about 8. Woke at 00:47 and after about 20 minutes of wakefulness got up to take half a Z. Awake shortly before 6. Took my morning codeine and had a restful meditation till getting up at about 09:15. Have been to the Co-op, where Sue scanned my shopping for me (!). The house is nice and warm and I have just had an afternoon bath and shave. Feeling better than yesterday but a bit droopy just after 3.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
And bought a pillow-shaped feather cushion at Age UK for £2-99. Looking for a draught excluder for the back door.
This house used to have a back yard/garden. You can see it on the aerial photo of the centre of Baildon taken in 1947. In fact, all three of the houses in this little row used to have them. You can still see the back wall from upstairs.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, no earplugs. Woke at 02:47, after a bit took my codeine. At about half 3, I got up and took two Solpadeine Max. Didn't really go back to sleep, but rested and (after 6) meditated very peacefully. Up at 08:30. I don't like taking the codeine, and I'm not sure if my restfulness was entirely due to that, but it was a factor. But I don't like taking the Zopiclone either.
It's now 11, and I have spent the morning cleaning. The strong winds and rain are set to continue some more. My legs feel sore and my right knee hurts.
How am I feeling? Not bad, thanks. On the mend. My eczema is quite mild now, just flaky dry skin on my arms, legs & trunk.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Did a double Bodhipaksa and got the peaceful rested feeling, with my left ankle resting on my right during the second iteration. I found that I had forgotten to count quite early on, focussing on the feeling in the pit of my stomach instead. Which I was doing in my morning meditation earlier on today.
And I experienced something new whilst waiting endlessly for plumber Matt to arrive. The thought of "just let it go, don't fuss, don't do anything" and feeling a sensation of release and rest in the pit of my stomach. And I had one of those half-waking messages the other day to "stop trying".

And the weather forecast has modified to strong winds & light rain. Which is okay, it's the heavy rain that gets in the house. Including around the back window frame in the big bedroom. Only a little, though, where there is a crack in the plaster.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, no earplugs. Woke just after midnight, then again just after 2 (I think). Took a quarter Z. Slept till 05:30, when I took my codeine and meditated till getting up at about 08:15. Feeling quite peaceful today despite various bodily pains. My reflux was quite bad last night and I thought I was getting a cold. I've also bitten my tongue on the right-hand side, I think. That's a bit sore as well. Ah, the depressive's hypochondria.
It snowed overnight and it looks lovely, although it's gently raining and I think slush followed by just plain wet may be the order of the day. Had a bath and shave this morning, got dressed up, and went to Westgate Stores. Which was shut! Have put a clothes wash on, lit the stove, and am making Goosnargh biscuits.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Yep, it's plain wet at 14:38.
Did another double Bodhipaksa and got the peaceful rested feeling again. Lasted for about an hour. Very pleasant.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took a while to fall asleep, feeling catarrhal. A restless night, but no earplugs. Woke at 01:17, took a quarter Z. Slept till 04:37, when I took my codeine and meditated till getting up at about 07:45. After tea, washing up, a bath, and a quick shopping trip to Westgate Stores, spent the morning lying on my bed. Feeling a cold coming on? Quite catarrhal and snotty now I've got up. It was quite a painless time of rest and meditation, mind.
Coughing up some phlegm [the stuff in my chest] now. Have just taken two Nurofen Cold & Flu tablets (ibuprofen & phenylephrine).

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Having finished my scrambled eggs on toast and lemon tarte with creme fraiche, I decide to relax on the sofa with my iPad and read the news. The BBC news is full of the usual mixture of scare stories about coronavirus, black interest features, and pictures of menacing Greek riot police dressed up as Robocop. The Guardian isn't much better, to be honest. Indignities being visited on Julian Assange, not reported elsewhere. It all makes me feel sad and anxious and weary. My legs and my heart hurt.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, no earplugs. Woke at 01:27. Took a quarter Z. Slept till 04:30. At 6, I took my codeine and meditated till getting up for the bin at 08:30. Lay and rested on my bed until 11:00, when I got up for tea and a bath shave. Felt anxious during my bath about food shortages triggered by panic buying, so got dressed and went shopping at the Co-op. Which had everything I shopped for, no shortages at all. Don't trust Twitter.
I have a slightly runny nose and an audible cough, but my appetite and sense of taste are both fine. Just had a Rani Chicken Tikka Masala and tortillas. Very nice. Watching Servants: The True Story of Life Below Stairs on YouTube. Very interesting. A BBC documentary series from 2012, so properly researched, presented, and filmed.
Took two Nurofen Cold & Flu tablets this morning. They last for eight hours. Not sure if I should keep on taking them. I'll take some now (17:40) to see if they reduce my runny nose.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, no earplugs. Woke at 22:30 and again at 03:10. Awake at 5, took my morning codeine. Was quite snotty and phlegmy, so took two of the Nurofen Cold & Flu tablets, which seemed to do the trick. Up at 8, have had tea and washed up, but feel quite low & tired.
Took two Nurofen Cold & Flu tablets at 15:00.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feeling low. Can't rest. Felt pretty good yesterday, so what's brought this on? I even rocked myself to sleep singing Lady In Red in my head. Zopiclone withdrawals, mebbe?

In August 1972, I visited Amsterdam for the first time. I bought the book Living Guide To Amsterdam. After sleeping one night in a very cramped hotel room with two other people (it was cheap), then another night in a sleep-in (one guilder a night, I seem to recall), I camped at the Camping Vliegenbos just north of the city centre.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:00, to lie on my bed. Turned on my side to rest my sore ankle and fell asleep till about 18:40. Must have needed it, as it wasn't planned.
A fairly normal night. Woke at 22:30, then at 01:10, then again at 04:40, when I took my morning codeine. Didn’t really go back to sleep and had a restless meditation from 5 till getting up at 08:45.
Legs and knees feel pretty sore again today. Have been to Shipley Hospital to see Dr Higgins and am now eating scrambled eggs on grain toast. Met Ruth walking up Westgate and stopped for a quick chat. About the weather (endless winter) and the library.
Feeling a bit more up today, more relaxed and cheerful.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:45. It was still light.
Had a very restless night. Woke at 23:30, then at 01:27, when I took a quarter Zopiclone. Woke at 02:20, then at 03:30, when I took my morning codeine. Still awake at 04:21, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Didn’t really go back to sleep, but had a pleasant rest & meditation till getting up at 08:45.
Feeling very rested and anxiety-free today. Why? Dunno, wish I knew.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine. Woke at just after midnight and again just before 2, when I took a quarter Z. Awake at 5, took my morning codeine and had a very pleasant rest/meditation. Up at about 08:15.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Positivity: * My voice is fine nowadays. No hoarseness or loss of voice at all. * My lobelia has started to flower.
Feeling quite pleasantly peaceful today and things look lovely, full of light. It is a bright, clear day, mind, with lots of sunny spells and sleet showers forecast. But it's not just that...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine. Woke just after 2. Awake at 5, took my morning codeine and had a very pleasant rest/meditation. Up at about 08:30. Feeling slightly less wonderful than yesterday, but still in pretty good spirits.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:15, to lie on my bed. Constipated and wanted to be near the loo. Didn't eat a huge amount during the day.
Had a very restless night. Woke at 23:30, then at 01:27, then again at 02:20, when I took my morning codeine. Didn’t really go back to sleep and had a restless meditation from 5 till getting up at 07:45.
Cleared my constipation this morning, thank goodness.
Legs and knees feel sore today.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:45, to lie on my bed. Just exhausted from being in pain. Took two Nurofen Plus.
Had a very restless night. Woke at 23:30, then at 01:17, then again at 02:44. Took my morning codeine about an hour later. Drowsed and had a very pleasant rest/meditation. from 5 till getting up at 08:15. Did conscious connected breathing, but it's tricky get right. No forcing!
Had my earplugs in going to sleep and waking up, but I don't think neighbour Bob was at home. Could hear a voice (or two?) whilst doing my evening meditation.
Feeling in better spirits than yesterday and have successfully and serenely made some Goosnargh biscuits. My pain is lower as well and I think the vein in my face is healing.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine. Woke at just after midnight and took a quarter Z. Awake at 04:40, took my morning codeine and had a restless meditation. Up at 08:30. Done all the usual stuff but mid-morning I feel sad, hot & tired. My knees hurt.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine. Woke at 23:20 and again at 00:40, when I took a half Z. Awake at 05:40, took my morning codeine and had a restless meditation. Up at 08:00.
Have been to Boots, to the Co-op again stockpiling food (got 11 days worth now) and to Westgate Stores and a long chat with Rani. My legs felt very sore and stiff climbing up Binswell Fold. Is that the effect of standing chatting for half an hour, or walking today specifically, or not walking enough in general? Who knows.
My mood is better than yesterday. Felt quite low and anxious lying in bed trying to meditate.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine. Woke just after 1 and again at 03:22. Awake at 05:52, took my morning codeine and had a restless meditation. Up at 07:45.
Have had a Badedas bath and put my books and magazines back in place. Then at about 09:30, became engulfed by a wave of pain and fear. My legs hurt and feel weak. Went to lie down on my bed for 10 minutes, which has eased it somewhat. Ended yesterday feeling good, up, positive. And I wake after a good night's sleep full of worry, dislike of people like Dr Higgins and situations like coronavirus. Unable to calm the fear. Tired of constant pain and hassles with the house. Stopped reading the news a couple of days ago as it just made feel panicky and worried. Then yesterday I had the insight that if people in Baildon are stockpiling food from the Co-op, then that is a limited amount. They won't continue to stockpile once they've filled the freezer, will they?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
And I make a cup of coffee with granola bars and Goosnargh biscuits and Radio Seagull plays Blind Faith (Presence Of The Lord) followed by Tears For Fears (Woman In Chains) and my heart lifts. There is always relief and hope.
It's Seagull Nonstop, Friday 08:00-12:00. No track info displayed, but no idiot presenter or station idents either.
But feel physically cold when low and in pain. Have got the space heater on.
Now just after 2, I am hurting a lot and feel hot & tired and low. My right ankle is hurting now, along with both my knees, my left ankle, and both lower legs feeling sore.
Stockpiling seems to be happening, but only food like pasta, rice, and long-life milk. And cereal, eggs...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine with earplugs. Woke at 23:30 and again at 02:30. Took my morning codeine just before 4 and had an okay rest/meditation. Up at 07:45.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Managed to reduce the soreness in my ankle after one Bodhipaksa.
And have been reading news about coronavirus. It's better to know the truth, I think, than to stew in fearful imaginings.
And next door's dog started barking at one point during my midday meditation. Then stopped after about three minutes. He is very quiet normally considering. Or maybe he only visits now and then?

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 20:30 and again at 02:30, when I got up and took half a Z. Took my morning codeine just before 4, then meditated all morning in bed. Took two Nurofen Plus at some point. Up at 13:00.
It was quite a restful time, but I got quite hot towards the end. Slightly anxious about having COVID-19, but it's pretty unlikely. Got up and checked temperature in the bathroom, which felt cold, so I turned the bedroom radiator down.
I have had tea and strangled eggs and my temperature feels normal. Need to go out for a shop tomorrow. Not been out since last Thursday...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 23:30 and again at 02:30. Took my morning codeine just before 4, then meditated in bed for a couple of hours. Took two Solpadeine Max at some point. Up at 10:45.
Have been to Co-op and Boots in the wind and rain.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Bailed out a bit early, just after 6 last night and had a short joyful meditation. Celebrating the colours of blue flowers in bloom and the joys of friendship. Haven't felt joy for a long while now, it seems. And did some guitar playing yesterday afternoon -- the Oasis song Champagne Supernova.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:45, to lie on my bed. A fair bit of abdominal pain. Fell asleep fine with earplugs and took half a Z. Woke just before 4. Took my morning codeine just before 5 and had a restless meditation. Lots of fear and anxiety, including worrying about a dream I had had. Up at 07:45. Worrying about:
  • My new credit card application
  • Sarah messaging on Facebook
  • Applying for talking therapy
  • Library session on Saturday
  • Letter from Living With Pain

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Done all the usual stuff and been to Westgate Stores for a curry and milk and a chat with Suni, but mid-morning I feel cold & tired. My legs and my soul both hurt. Although somewhere deep inside me I can feel a glimmer of peace and release. What if all those worries above didn't matter? Could be...
Wherever I go on the net, I can't get away from stuff about the coronavirus. Even on YouTube.
And after waking at 4 in the morning, waiting to drowse or sleep, and hearing movement from next door. Just weird...
Did a double Bodhipaksa at lunchtime and had a very restful shamatha for about 1.5 hours.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:45, to lie on my bed. A fair bit of abdominal pain again.
Fell asleep fine with earplugs and took half a Z. Woke just after 3. Took my morning codeine just before 5 and had a restless meditation. Up at 11. Took two Nurofen Plus.
Feeling low, anxious & in pain.
The pillow I got as a doorstop got wet overnight in the wind & rain. I've turned it over to dry out but left it in place. It doesn't matter if it gets stained. It only cost £3.50 or so and I can wash the knitted cotton cover. It does a good job of keeping the cold draught out and I don't need to use it as a cushion.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Just had an afternoon bath & shave at 15:00. Feeling quite presentable :-)
Put a second load of clothes to dry, low heat, iron dry. After half an hour, it had gone from 1:20 to 2:08. I wonder if you need to let the drum cool down first?

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine with earplugs. Woke at 00:30 and took half a Z. Took my morning codeine just after 5 and had an okay rest/meditation. Up at 8.
It struck me that if I self-isolate to avoid catching or spreading the corona virus, a number of those worries disappear. The last three. Sarah messaged me this morning, but I was about to message her about the same subject (COVID-19) anyway. And even in the unlikely event that my credit card application is refused or runs into problems, I can do an MBNA balance transfer. More expensive, though, at a 4.5% fee compared to 2.9%.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Bailed out early, about 17:30, to lie on my bed. A fair bit of ankle pain, but it was very restful to lie on my side.
Fell asleep fine with earplugs. Woke at 10:30 and took half a Z. Took my morning codeine just before 5 and had a restless meditation. Up at 11:30. Took two Nurofen Plus.
Got up. and as I was coming down the stairs heard a familiar crash. The curtain rail has come down again. And I got a letter from the credit card company requesting documents (bank statements, pay slips). So that option is out.
Feeling a bit down, but problems can be sorted.
Stayed resting on my bed from 13:30 for the rest of the day. Took two Solpadeine Max.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, no earplugs. Woke at 10:30 and took half a Z. Woke at 02:50 and took my morning codeine at 04:20 and had a restless meditation. Been in bed all morning, up at 12:00 to have a brief wash, get dressed, do my meditation, and continue lying on my bed. Took two Nurofen Plus.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Got up after doing my midday meditation to have a cup of tea and a go at fixing the curtain. Had peanut butter on toast and my cheesecake & cream and a bath shave. Went to bed at normal time. Felt in good spirits by the end of the day. Had a good chat with Sarah on Facebook. And completed a very straightforward £1000 balance transfer on the MBNA website. Chose no fee, 3.9% pa interest as I plan to pay it off in 12 monthly instalments of £75 and it's cheaper than paying a 4.5% fee with no interest.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine, no earplugs, feeling unusually joyful and loving. Woke at 01:30. Felt wakeful after a time, so took my morning codeine. Woke again at 3, so took half a Z. Awake just before 6 and up at 08:30 for a bath, hairwash, and trip to the Co-op. Felt very weak and hot when I got in, no doubt somewhat undernourished and dehydrated. In middling spirits. The curtain pole may have to wait. My Muehlenbeckia was looking a bit droopy when I watered it this morning (a couple of days late). Have watered it thoroughly (tilting the pot to soak the root ball) and it seems to be recovering. Have also moved it away from the radiator in the big bedroom to the bright window sill. The weather is also brightening up, although it's a mixture of sun and cloud. I keep switching lights off and then back on again. You can buy a Russell Hobbs cheap £16 steam iron in Baildon Co-op.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: After eating lunch today, I have 10 days worth of food left in the fridge/freezer.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Bailed out early, about 17:45, to lie on my bed. In a fair bit of ankle and abdominal pain. It didn't ease and I took half a Z at 08:45. Woke just before 1, then awake at 5. Up at 8. Out to stockpile some food and have a chat to Suni, take my library books back, and try and buy some Murine eyedrops and a thermometer. The Northgate chemist didn't have either item and Boots had no thermometers either (they don't stock Murine). Time to try the net?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My bowels are finally moving, which is good. I suspect that some of my abdominal pain may have been down to constipation.

My legs feel sore and weak, and I found walking round the village quite hard work. Felt quite hot when I got in the house. My right foot has started to twitch as well. I wonder if that's anxiety rather than neuropathy? My eyelid tends to twitch when I get anxious and my lips get dry, so it can have some fairly noticeable physical side-effects.
Have some slight lower back pain as well. Another constipation side effect?
Someone up there likes me. My MBNA balance transfer completed yesterday, the day before the current Virgin 0% offer expires.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Bailed out early at 17:40 to lie on my bed. In a fair bit of ankle pain. It didn’t ease and I lay in bed feeling hot until I took half a Z at 08:40. Woke at 23:30, then awake at about half 4. Up at 07:45.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Did my usual double Bodhipaksa at lunchtime and got some relief from my sore ankle.
The world is feeling pretty anxious at the moment. It must be awful to be worried about losing your job and (God forbid) your home as a result of getting sick.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Bailed out at 17:50 to lie on my bed. Again, in a fair bit of ankle pain. It didn’t ease and I lay in bed feeling hot (with earplugs in) until I took half a Z at 20:30. Woke at some point (22:30, I think, when I took my earplugs out), then awake at about half 5. In bed all morning feeling hot and tired. Up for a while at about 14:00 to have some tea, water all the plants inside and out, read my email, do my banking, steam dry a couple of T-shirts, Facebook, do this blog. Got tummy pain, feels like diverticulitis. I shall rest and take liquids only for a couple of days.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: There is yet another source of bright light shining occasionally int my bedroom, from the intruder light on the top flat opposite. That makes five different intruder lights on that side of the house. Time to move my bed back into the big bedroom, methinks. They have put tables and chairs out at the Wesley Cafe in the church. It smells like spring when I poke my head outside, too.
One outside the back of 33 Westgate, two outside the builder's office, one outside the flat over the builder's office, and this new one.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: At midnight, took half a Z. Awake at half 4. At 09:33, been in bed and feel very low & anxious, may stay there the rest of the day. Took two Nurofen Plus in morning.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Up at 13:00 for some tea and a bath shave. Have also watered and repotted/top dressed my marguerites. The medium one is repotted upstairs and I've moved the big one downstairs and top dressed it.

I've had a few coronavirus emails from companies that I spend money with and I've been very impressed with their response to the situation. BT expanding bandwidth 10-fold, the Co-op looking at ways to help vulnerable shoppers, Barclaycard stopping some fees for the next 90 days.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went back to bed. At 22:00, took half a Z. Awake at 5. Spent all day in bed.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: In bed till about 12, then dressed and lying on it. There were periods where my left ankle and right knee pain were quite reduced, but it was a long day. It got very sunny towards the end of the afternoon. The sun shines directly on my bed, which got quite hot!

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed at 18:18. Still awake at 21:21, so took half a Z. Still awake at 23:30, so took another half a Z. Awake just after 6, up at 9. Had a bath and a hairwash, then went shopping for a few items at the Co-op. There were a couple of empty shelves, bread and sugar and none of my usual tortillas. I got everything on my shopping list, though, although I was told at the checkout that I could only buy one x6 multipack of Pink Lady apples. Bought some mini tortilla wraps and will get some bread from Suni's tomorrow. Had a chat to the woman who runs the taxi service at the back and she said that the Co-op had had three deliveries so far that day. It was just after 11 on a Sunday.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Met Sandra (Marshall), one of the library volunteers by the bread section. Funny, because the last sessions I booked (and then cancelled) were with her.
I wonder if the empty shelves had anything to do with the children being off school from Monday. Lots of hungry tummies to be filled at home.

Moved the bed. Got very hot doing it, but I think it's sorted.
Thought I'd book a future appointment with the good Dr Kennedy. The online booking system shows the coming week (and nothing else) and there are no available appointments. Crikey.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed at 18:15. Started dozing, but woke at 22:40, so took half a Z. Still awake at 23:00, so took two Nurofen Plus. Awake just before 6, had a restful meditation, up at 8.
Out at 09:10 to buy some milk and a couple of other things at Westgate Stores. Which was shut. Put my trousers on and went down to Martins. No milk at all. On to the Co-op. Lots of empty food shelves and no milk at all. Got some bread & apples. They are now doing a special hour for vulnerable shoppers (8-9 Monday to Saturday, 10-11 Sunday) and a very helpful assistant called Dan told me that being elderly with wobbly legs qualifies me. He also said that he would put some milk by for me when the next delivery arrived (at 10:00-10:30 or so).
Got back and Westgate was open, so bought some milk and another curry. Suni looked harrassed and is limiting purchases to one of each item. Thanked him, which made him happy. It will be okay, I can always use Coffeemate in an emergency, but it's quite unsettling. Called the Co-op at 11 to say that I didn't need the milk and Dan answered the phone. I asked him again about qualifying as vulnerable and he said not to worry, it would be obvious that I'm not trying it on.
It looks like the Co-op are getting a number of deliveries (including one overnight) but the shelves are getting emptied between.
The weather is really nice (13 C today and 16 C tomorrow, almost shorts weather) and it was nice to be out in the fresh air.
Checked the GP's website and there are no appointments available for this week. Good job I don't need one :-)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed at 18:15. Fell asleep, but woke at 22:20, so took a quarter Z. Awake just after 4, took my codeine, had a restless meditation, up at 08:30. Had a Badedas bath. Feeling low & anxious, so decided to get out in the sunshine. It's forecast for 17 C today.
Out in my trousers & T-shirt in to see if I could buy a plant for the front and a hard disk. Both shops were shut. Down to the Co-op to see if they had any plants, but nothing worth buying (only viola hanging baskets for £8). Checked the shelves, which had the usual empty fresh food sections (fruit/veg, meat/fish, dairy). Had a chat to Kath, who will put some items aside for me when the next delivery arrives (fish pie, paella, apples), to be collected Thursday morning. I went for a roundabout walk on the way back to stretch my legs. She says that people are stockpiling rather than feeding their school-age children. Hmm.
Martins stock Tunnocks Teacakes if the Co-op have run out.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went to lie on my bed at 17:15. Fell asleep till 19:00, which was very pleasant. Fell asleep again, but woke at 22:40, so took a quarter Z, then half a Z about half an hour later. Awake just after 5, took my codeine, had a pleasant meditation, up at 08:30. It does get a bit cold in that big bedroom. I had the space heater whilst lying on my bed.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed at 18:15. Fell asleep, but woke at 20:40, so took half a Z. Awake just after 4, took my codeine, had a restless meditation, up at 08:00. Had a bath and went to the Co-op. It was just before 9 when I got there, and there were very few shoppers (less than 10 people at a guess), but the usual shelves were almost completely empty. The chilled meals section had the items I wanted (although I collected the ones I reserved on Tuesday), plenty of cookies, but no Tunnocks. Martins had plenty of Tunnocks. Francos the barbers is closed until further notice.
Felt good falling asleep, but felt quite hungry when I woke just before 9. It was hard work getting up and I have rescheduled my Skype with Adam.
I was naughty and bought an extra pack of apples (in addition to the one that I'd reserved). They look a bit battered, though. I have now got so much food in the freezer that the door will only just shut. About 13 days worth including all the battered fish fillets, eight eggs, and two loaves of bread. Nine ready meals.
I feel cold & tired and my lower legs feel sore and my knees and left ankle all hurt. Still got that intermittent slight cough and runny nose. Wonder if it really is a mild form of COVID-19?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Three of my bulbs went last night. The big one in my bedside lamp started flashing at about 6, then went off with a pronounced electrical smell. When I came down this morning, two of the kitchen bulbs had gone as well. Odd, as they were turned off all night, so it can't have been a power surge. Luckily, I always have spare bulbs, although these are beginning to now run low.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went to lie on my bed at 6. Fell asleep till 8, which was very pleasant. Fell asleep again, but woke at 11 and then again at 01:30, when I took a quarter Z. Awake just after 5, took my codeine, had a reasonably pleasant meditation, up at 8.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine. Took a quarter Z at about 11. Awake at 4, took my codeine and had fitful half-dreams. Started meditating rather fitfully at 6 and up at 08:30. Skyped with Adam from 10 for almost an hour. Feel really shaky now, though. Need to go and lie down. No appetite, need to pee all the time, dry mouth, obsessing about buying light bulbs. I had occasional flashes of peace and ease earlier by focussing on the "letting go" thought and feeling in my tummy. But the anxiety comes back like a raging demon, overwhelming me.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Ordered my repeat prescription early yesterday, panicking about Boots being overrun by people buying self-testing kits. Worried about other stuff that is a fair way in the future, like my appointment in May with Dr Higgins. As for my hair, it will just have to grow. Eating less daily than is normal for me. Had some bombay mix yesterday evening for the first time in a couple of weeks, but haven't had any pudding & cream for a while now.

Had a lie down from 12:30-16:30. It did provide some relief, even from my ankle pain. Did a single Bodhipaksa at 13:00. Had my pyjama bottoms on and the space heater turned on at 5. It's a chilly 8 C today.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed at 18:45. Did Body Scan, but still awake at 20:45, so took half a Z. Awake just after 6. Lay in bed till 1 with the space heater on. It's 6 C today.
The heaters felt cold just after 6, so I went downstairs, looked at the pressure gauge. It seemed low, so I repressured the boiler up to 2 bar. Then noticed the clock said 05:14. Ah. Put it forward an hour, heating came on, checked on the net and the clocks went back last night.
Today and yesterday, have eaten apples, scrambled eggs on toast, three Tunnocks, and finishing up my rather out-of-date creme fraiche & extra-thick double cream.
Out to Westgate Stores at about 2 after a bath shave to get a big bottle of milk and some butter. Suni was there, no other shoppers, so I got what I needed and had a quick chat. About getting stressed over the current situation and not reading the news.
Have got a towel wash on and am listening to Ricky O on Stomp. "Yeah. The awesome..."
I remembered something that Mum told me once, that she used to feel low at about 11 in the morning and that depression always feels like it's never-ending. There could well be a strong genetic elelement in me feeling particularly low late morning. Lying in bed this morning, I had the uninvited thought "My life is meaningless". No, I don't believe that. My life may be pretty hard work and not exactly full of peak experiences, but it's not meaningless. Getting older, getting sick, and changing my work/life environment in a brief time have all contributed. But I appreciate music, food, and especially seeing and chatting to people, however fearful I get of that. I had that rebirthing experience back in May 2002 that I will be chasing for the rest of my life. Where did THAT come from?
I keep forgetting to wash my hands when I get in. Not all the time, but I've missed a few times.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Fell asleep fine. Took a quarter Z at about 10:30. Woke at 02:30, awake at 6, took my codeine. Up at 08:30. Feeling better on awaking and in the morning. Had a bath, washed my hair, and went out for my medium-length walk. Little lurches of anxiety now at 11:30, but nothing too overwhelming.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Until about 15:00, when I posted a comment about accessing BBC iPlayer content on Mark Dezzani's post. It's a complex matter in some ways (involving needing a licence, or at least declaring that you have one), and he responded fairly quickly. It felt a bit testy, though, and I got in a bit of a muddle with my responses. Started feeling quite panicky by about 16:30. I ended up deleting the comment and all the responses and went for a 30-minute lie down and some calm breathing, which seems to have helped.
Not helped by having two poohs this afternoon and leaking pee into my shorts both times. I have changed into clean shorts and put the others on a 30-minute wash. Which has taken about 50 minutes so far and is still going (stuck on that "1 minute left" message). Roger Davis is on Radio Seagull and smacking his lips at the end of every sentence. Ah, my critical watchful mind. Always finding fault, never at rest, never happy...
Feeling a bit panicky as I need to go out to the Co-op in the next couple of days for supplies. But it will be okay. Get up, make tea, have a bath, get dressed, go out. It will be fine.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed at 18:18. Still awake at 20:40, so took half a Z. Woke at 02:40, so took my codeine, followed by a quarter Z about half an hour later. Lay half awake till 6, then on my back mediatating as best I could. Up at 10. Had a cup of tea and a quick wash, then went shopping for a few items at the Co-op. Arrived about 10:45. Fairly full shelves once again They only allow 10 customers in at once, though I didn't have to queue.

item.dc:creator: phil

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: And I wore my pyjama bottoms to bed last night. Quite effective at keeping my whole body warm. Good when lying on my bed, too.

Had a restful second Bodhipaksa again today. Became so engrossed in the breath that I forgot to count (although my rate was low today, 31 for the first stage). Peaceful, pain lowered. How can I do this at other times? Lay resting until the sound of a drill or a saw came from the builders yard.
Tabbing Bread - Make It With You.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed at 18:45. Did Body Scan, and stayed half-awake till 21:45, so took half a Z. Woke just after 4 and took my codeine. Started meditating around 6. Up at 9. Feeling quite low even after a Badedas bath and a walk round the block. Suni shouted a greeting as I walked past, but a family with two children shrank into a corner until I had crossed the road and was well past. My finances are in good shape, but my gloves are going at the seams and my hat has a hole in it. Oh well.
Oddly, I have a good appetite and have developed a liking for salted peanuts. The ones Suni sells are a wee bit expensive at £1 fo a small bag, so I briefly considered a trip to the Co-op, but then realised that buying one or two items in one trip was probably not a good idea. It's windy today but sunny spells are forecast for the afternoon.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My gloves are almost eight years old. They've served me well. They cost £40 from Drakes back in November 2012.
It's not going to be Drakes, again, though. Not only do they not have any gloves in stock, they charge £30 these days for a single pair of socks, for example. £255.00 for an umbrella!
Got some mild eczema on the crooks of my arms and legs, mostly on the left. It itches very occasionally but I'll hold off on the Betnovate for now.
Had a pooh this afternoon. Slightly sore. Too many days since the last, I fear.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed at 18:45. Did Body Scan, and stayed half-awake till 21:30, so took two Nurofen Plus. Woke at 02:40 and took my codeine. Started meditating around 6. Up at 10. It was a very pleasant meditation, focussing my breath and directing it to areas of rising pain in my body and anxiety in my thinking mind. Saw that Big Phil is calming Little Phil. Pain in my right arm and wrist, possibly arthritis. Might also be from playing my guitar again recently. Had a pooh and a bath shave.
Repotted my snakeskin fittonia into a smaller pot. It was very loose in the 5" pot. Top dressed my dracaena and moved it into the living room and put the fittonia upstairs on my dresser.
Blew my nose just now and saw a load of blood in the paper tissue. Fortunately, that was it -- it hasn't continued to bleed. The fridge was turned up too high at 6. My spag bol was only half defrosted after a day in the fridge. Beans on toast for lunch.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feeling more peaceful today, although I do feel hot, a bit weary and a bit anxious.

Shaking with nerves :-( Popped out to Westgate for a Dr Pepper and noticed that next door has undergone a change. It seems to have a staircase where there wasn't one before. There was some drilling yesterday afternoon, intermittent for about an hour. Load of new furniture and curtains open. The daughter's belongings are still there, so maybe it won't be new neighbours.
Ah, that would explain all the banging & thumping the other evening at about six o'clock.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Ways that help me stay sane:
  • Keep it in the day
  • Assume positive outcomes
  • Don't chase or amplify negative and critical thoughts
  • Goodwill - Assume people have good intentions
  • Gratitude - Find one thing every day to be grateful for

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed as normal. Still awake with tummy and ankle pain at 21:00, so took half a Z. Woke at 02:00. Awake at 05:40, took my codeine and started meditating. Up at 09:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed as normal. Still awake with tummy and ankle pain at 20:45, so got up and took half a Z. Still awake at 22:15, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 06:40, took my codeine and started meditating. Up at 9. Woke up feeling cross, primarily for taking two types of sleep medication, although I did get a good night's rest.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I wonder if the reason I felt so crap the other day was Zopiclone withdrawal?

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed as normal. Woke at 01:30 and took my codeine. It felt quite strong for some reason, uncomfortably so. Awake at 06:40, and started meditating. Stayed in bed till 14:30. Just feeling absolutely kayoed, no energy. So quiet today, just the very occasional engine sound. It's warm as well (19 C according to the BBC), although it was cool in the "fridge" (as I think my big bedroom should be called).
My eczema isn't getting better and has spread to my chest and left groin. Have Betnovated lower legs and arms. Trying to find some music radio on the net that isn't playing dance music. Just not in the mood for repetitive beats at the moment. Have had a pot of tea, a bath shave, and eating an apple and drinking Dr Pepper. Trying not to get Betnovate on the sofa, the cushions, and my clothes :-)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie down at 16:30, full of anxiety & panic. Did my Body Scan and went to sleep at normal time. Woke at 22:30, took half a Z. Woke again at 02:30, took my codeine. Restless the whole night, half awake, but not unpleasant. Awake to the alarm at 07:30 and out to the Co-op. Arrived at 08:20 and it was very quiet, three cars in the car park and about five shoppers in the store. Got everything on my shopping list, too, which was a relief. Empty shelves had been an anxiety for me.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Deep inside me is a calm place. I get glimpses of it now and again, especially when I can let go of my worry, anxiety, and need to control.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed as normal. Fell asleep fine, woke at 02:15 and took my codeine. Didn't really go back to sleep, but it wasn't unpleasant. Started meditating at 6 as usual, up at 8. Been out for a short stroll this morning. It's a lovely spring day, but my legs felt quite weak & sore.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Been looking at my full medical record on the Airmid UK app on my phone, which is a little unnerving. Everything back to my operation in 1971, which they show as 1st January. I wonder what the real date was?
Had a very restful shamatha after my post-priandial double Bodhipaksa. From 13:00 to 14:30 in total. Pain and mental activity both much reduced. It can be achieved.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 00:30 and at 02:14, when I took my codeine. Still wakeful after a while, so got up and took half a Z. Awake at 05:40, so started meditating. Up at 9. Woke up with a feeling of mild panic.
Made Goosnargh biscuits but, lost in thought, forgot to put the caraway seeds in the mixture. I couldn't be bothered redoing the dough, so scattered the seeds on top of the biscuits in the baking tray. I suspect that I may have used about twice the recommended amount, but I like the taste, so we shall see. It was quite fiddly, so if it happens again, I might try rerolling the biscuits out.
Started read On The Road yesterday afternoon. Quite enjoyable. Have I read it before? Can't remember, but if I did it was a good while ago.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 00:15 and at 02:15, when I took my codeine. Still wakeful after a while, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 05:40, so started meditating. Up at 9. Had an experience on waking of profound pleasure and peace. Something to with Mum, with illness, and with forgiveness. Like the codeine calming sensation, but too long after for that to be the cause? The sensation continued throughout my meditation, although it started to fade by the end. Whatever, it was a great blessing.
My hard disk order from Scan will be delivered today, between 13:26 and 14:26. Odd how they can be so precise with the minutes. It comes in the middle of my meditation time, so I thought for a little while of nominating a safe place. On reflection, I'd rather get the delivery of something so important in person, so I'll wait. It's DPD, so you can track the order on a map in real time. Working on a Bank Holiday, wow.
Still got eczema on my legs, although it is fading. My arms and trunk are clear now.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie down at 16:30, full of anxiety & panic after taking a walk to the Co-op at about 3 o'clock. The DPD delivery driver asked if he could leave a package for number 18 with me and feeling a bit flustered by that I said "I don't know them". That made me feel anxious and I fancied some more fresh air. There was a queue at the Co-op, about eight people spaced six feet apart, so stretching down into the exit road. It took me a while to figure out what I was looking at.
Did my Body Scan. Still awake at 08:30, so got up and took half a Z. Still awake and experiencing a fair bit of tummy and ankle pain, so took my morning codeine at 21:30. Woke at 00:15 and again at 02:15 (I think). Awake just before 6, and up at 07:15. Out to the Co-op again, where I found most of what I wanted (no Kleenex tissues, but I've got a full box).

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Felt quite relaxed by the end of the day, reading the Danny Baker book on my iPad on the sofa.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie down at 18:15, pleasant resting in the evening sunshine. Felt very relaxed and content for the first time in ages. Turned over on my side to ease my left ankle and fell asleep till about 9. It was dark, but didn't bother to close the curtains as I wanted to see what it was like without. Still awake at 21:40, so took my morning codeine. Still awake at 22:16, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Woke at 00:30 and awake at 04:15. Rested half-asleep with no discomfort and turned over on my back at about 5. Had a very restful shamatha, feeling relaxed and content till getting up at 9.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It was okay without the curtains shut. There is some light comes in, but it's quite subdued. The bright lights on the Fold building go out at 10.
I do hope this improved mood isn't just due to taking extra codeine.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 02:30, when I took my morning codeine. Remained half asleep, but restful and dreaming. Awake just after 6, so started meditating on my back. Up at 08:30.
Feeling quite placid and content today, although it's a cold grey day, which usually tends to leave me feeling a bit meh. Had a bath shave, been out for a (chilly) walk, put a bedclothes wash on, and now had my coffee & cookies listening to The Royal Scam on iTunes, and fiddling with the lock screen slideshow on Windows 10.
Healthwise, my eczema has almost completely gone, just a couple of minor traces on my left leg. I do hurt rather a lot in various places, though. My knee arthritis is quite painful today and my right temple and tummy both feel sore.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I started practising mindfulness in April 2014. And had a tearful recovery on Palm Sunday back in the 80s (or possibly 90s).
It was actually March 2014.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Fell asleep fine, woke at 01:30, then again at 03:30, when I took my morning codeine. Remained half asleep, but rather restless and dreaming. Awake just before 6, so started meditating on my back. Up at 08:30.
Feeling a bit low today. Been out for a walk. No Tunnocks in the post office. Got that feeling of being at a loose end. Looking at my finance spreadsheets and almost trying to find something to worry about. Everybody having to wear masks? Don't think so. We've passed the peak and they couldn't find enough for NHS staff to wear.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Sneaker check. Bought my Vans Era Pro Checkers Navy in January 2015, so they've seen good service. They are beginning to fray, though, so need replacing soon. Bought my Vans Unisex Adults' Era Classic Canvas Low-Top Trainers in July 2016, so ditto.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Nice to go for a lie on my bed at about 6. Did the Body Scan. Fell asleep fine, woke at 03:30, when I took my morning codeine. Remained half asleep, but very restless and dreaming. Awake just before 6, so started meditating on my back. Up at 08:30. Feeling significantly anxious, low & hot compared to the past few days.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 5 after taking two Nurofen Plus. Did the Body Scan and fell asleep fine. Woke at 01:30 and took my morning codeine. Followed shortly by half a Z. Then followed again by another two Nurofen Plus. Remained half asleep, but quite restful and dreaming. Awake just before 6, so started meditating on my back. Up at 07:30. Feeling less anxious, low & hot compared to yesterday.
Arrived at the Co-op for my shopping at 08:10. Six cars in the car park and about five people in the store. Got everything except tissues and Tunnocks.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and fell asleep. Got into bed without doing the Body Scan. Woke at 23:20 and again at 00:30, when I took my morning codeine. Awake just before 6, so started meditating on my back. Up at 08:15. Feeling quite restless, low & anxious this morning. Fretting about money, both quite trivial things (I have incurred interest of just over £3 on my MBNA borrowing) and things that haven't happened yet (missing my first direct Visa card payment; the rent going up). Have been out for a rather chilly walk (11 C today), had a chat to one of the church gardeners, and made some Goosnargh biscuits.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Ah... I have just realised that my MBNA borrowing is for a small interest rate (3.95% annual, 0.3230 monthly) for a fixed period rather than a fee and a zero interest rate. So £3.19 is the expected interest for April 2020. Phew!
And CapitalOne have written to me again this morning reminding me about sending payslips etc. After some thought, I wrote on the bottom "Please close this application", signed and dated it and sent it back in the Freepost envelope they'd helpfully provided.

I won't miss my first direct Visa card payment, as I check that account daily.
