The rent will certainly increase at some point. My finances are healthy enough to tolerate a rent increase. And my income goes up every year. And the Housing Benefit would pay part of the increase.
All I need to do is look after myself (food, sleep, exercise) and to be kind and gentle with myself and others. And trust that I will be looked after.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:30 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 22:30 feeling hot with tummy pain, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Woke again at 02:30, when I took my morning codeine. Started meditating just before 6. Up at 07:45. Out for a chilly walk (12 C today) to Martins for Tunnocks. None in stock, so wandered round to the Co-op. None there either, so bought a pack of Jazz apples for cash. Feeling better today than yesterday.
There are direction signs on the floor of the Co-op. A bit pointless, really, as sometimes you need to turn around to avoid getting too close to someone ahead in a narrow aisle. It all feels a bit cold and sad. Three more weeks in "furlough" (as I believe the lockdown is formally known). It's not really a huge burden to me, but people are obviously anxious and it changes the atmosphere.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:30 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 22:00 feeling hot with tummy pain, so took my morning codeine. Started meditating just before 6. Up at 9. Feeling low & anxious this morning. My legs feel sore and weak too. Not feeling balanced really, both mentally & physically. Had a couple of odd replies on Facebook yesterday afternoon which freaked me out somewhat. Why? Just feeling vulnerable, I guess. Posted an unkind post about Duncan Barkes as well. I did set it to Me only after a few minutes, though.
Bill the Builder is moving his various vehicles around in the yard. I like him.
Today I am grateful for my warm house and living so close to Westgate.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It's time for the Jazz, Soul & Blues show on Radio Seagull. As usual, Dunkie plays one (or sometimes two) soul and blues tracks before filling up the rest of the two hours with saxophone-heavy "cool" jazz music. He's got a beard and likes real ale.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 5 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 01:30 and took my morning codeine. Got up and took two Nurofen Plus after a sleepless while. Didn't really go back to sleep, but it wasn't distressing. Started meditating just before 6. Up at 8. Out for a chilly walk (14 C today) round the backs and down to the Bedlam Steps. Feeling a bit better today than yesterday.
Today I am grateful for my loving daughter Sarah.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I was thinking last night that I haven't seen any fungus gnats for a while and one has just flitted across my computer monitor. Maybe they just haven't been bothering me.
The Lists To Do app on my iPhone is acting up. Immediately minimises on opening and on focus.

The Lists To Do app was updated yesterday (to version 2.3.4), so this may be a new bug. Hopefully, a fix will be released before too long. Although having two phones for shopping is a bit of a nuisance in the long term, so I'm transferring items over to Todoist.
I feel about the same as yesterday, maybe slightly worse as I had a lie down before lunch. Fretting about the usual worries -- Facebook, the house, going to the Co-op. The weather is rather fine, though: warm & sunny.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine. Got up and took half a Z after an hour. Awake at 05:40 and started meditating. Up at 2. Out for a windy walk (15 C and a fresh breeze today) round the backs and stopping for a chat to Suni. Feeling about the same as yesterday, maybe a bit better after getting up but wretched this morning.
Today I am grateful for having food in my house.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:18 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 00:30 and took my morning codeine. Got up and took two Nurofen Plus at 2. Awake at 05:40 and started meditating. Up at 08:30 for the bins. Out for a windy walk (15 C and a fresh breeze today) round the backs. It's another glorious day and I felt better on waking than yesterday.
Today I am grateful for the sunshine.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feeling pretty low and anxious. Sarah is calling at 15:30. Have only eaten snacks for two days now.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:18 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine. Got up and took half a Z at 01:40. Awake at 05:40 and started meditating. Up just before 3. Put a clothes wash on and went to Browgate Pharmacy for toothpaste and mouthwash. Stopped at Westgate for a bottle of Dr Pepper and a tin of beanz and a quick chat. Gorgeous warm weather, so decided to go down to Martins for some Tunnocks and to draw £20 cash. (I'm using a lot of cash at the moment buying odds and ends from Westgate.) It was shut, so decided to see what the Co-op was like. Surprised to see no queue, very few people in the store, shelves normally full. This was at about 4. Got just about everything except for PG Tips Gold teabags, Kleenex Ultra Soft, tortillas, and Tunnocks. All sold out as on previous visits.
Health notes.
My voice is hoarse after lying for so long on my back. I have a drippy nose from rhinitis. Legs a bit weak and sore, but that's to be expected after a few days of bed rest.
My phone rang at 4 yesterday afternoon just after I'd finished my Skype chat with Sarah. MyWellbeing College calling to arrange a phone appointment for Monday at 15:00. That was quick.
Got a letter from the Pain Management team to tell me that I was still on the waiting list (after six months!) and that they weren't seeing people at the moment (surprise, surprise). They included an info sheet with some useful-looking web addresses for online resources.
Bradford Council have just decided to deliver some COVID-19 advice via Whistl to every household. That's not exactly prompt, to be honest.
Boots have just texted to say that my scrip is ready. Good stuff. Shall collect tomorrow.
Feeling quite up and eating salted peanuts, apple, and Dr Pepper after a lousy day in bed. Had the earplugs in a couple of times (building work across the road fitting services for the Delph Hill site). More noises of angle grinders and pneumatic drills as they dig up the road.
Was worrying whilst slugabed about shopping, washing, and scrip. All sorted now and the sun is still shining.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 19:18 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 02:30 and took my morning codeine. Got up a bit later and took two Nurofen Plus. Remained half asleep, but quite restful and dreaming occasionally. Awake at dawn and started meditating. It was very pleasant being half asleep, although I was quite wakeful. Felt very peaceful and content and it lasted through my meditation. I don't honestly believe it was due to the extra codeine. Just grateful for it when it occurs. Up at 08:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 18:18 and did the Body Scan at 19:18. Woke at 00:40 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 05:40 and started meditating. Got up at 8 and promptly went back to bed. Feeling lousy, full of anxiety, principally about the phone appointment on Monday and the fact that I'm still registered with the Living With Pain service. Took my afternoon codeine a bit early, possibly at 11. It did calm the anxiety somewhat, so I wonder if I was having codeine withdrawals after all the recent extras I've been having. Up just after 1.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Just done a quick tally of feelings over the past two weeks and I have had six days or so of feeling okay. But some things tend to drive my mood down.
Was feeling shame quite keenly lying in bed this morning. For example, about the state of my house compared to the man opposite.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:18 and did the Body Scan at 19:18. Woke at 00:40 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 04:40 and lay half asleep. Started meditating just after 6. Up at 08:30. Feeling okay today. Pleased that I have managed two nights with no Zopiclone or extra codeine.
Have watered plants inside and out and had a long walk. Bathed and shaved self and put a towel wash on. My two apple seedlings have both got pests (whitefly and leaf curl) so I have tipped them and the soil in the church flower bed.
Got a drippy nose and a bit of a cough. Rhinitis and reflux.
Feeling a lot calmer than recently. I put a beef curry in the oven and thought it was taking a long while. When I checked the clock on my phone it was over time by 13 minutes and I hadn't heard it ring. Odd, but it didn't give me a panic lurch. Turns out I'd turned the volume off by picking the phone up by the middle and pressing the rocker button. That's a bit of a design glitch. I wonder if you can lock the volume?

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Curiously, I can't reproduce the problem. You have to have both the phone and the clock app open to adjust the alarm volume using the rocker button. Google seems to suggest that it's a bug triggered by an update.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:18 and did the Body Scan at 19:18. Lots of anxiety, hot, ankle & abdominal pain, so couldn't drop off. Took my morning codeine at 9 and half a Z about an hour later. Awake just before 6 and started meditating. Up at 08:30. Feeling okay today. Went to the Co-op at 09:20 and it was fine. Full shelves and only a few customers. Got everything apart from the Tunnocks.
Mid-morning, have had coffee & cookies and put a wash on, but shaky and anxious about the call this afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan just before 7. Woke just after 12 and took my morning codeine. Woke again just before 3 and went back to sleep. Awake just after 6 and started meditating very restfully. Up at 08:30. Feeling okay today.
Had a vivid dream about a song called "Mary's Baby". It was really nice, soulful and slow, with a riff, then the lyric "We're waiting for Mary's baby" (which I took to mean Jesus). I thought it was a Steve Miller track at first, but thinking about it half-asleep realised that it was original. Spent some time pondering how to remember or transcribe it before falling asleep again.
Had the call with David from MyWellbeing College yesterday. He rang promptly at 15:00 and it went very well. We spent nearly 40 minutes talking and he allayed my worries about being registered with the Living With Pain service. It's a different therapy, so there's no problem with being registered for both at the same time. I am registered for one-to-one talking therapy, a half-hour session every two weeks and there is a waiting time of up to 14 weeks (I think).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan just after 7. Woke at 01:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:48. Got up for a pee and got in bed feeling very peaceful and rested. Didn't go back to sleep, but rested half-dreaming very pleasantly. Started meditating very restfully just before 6. Up at 08:30. Feeling okay today.
Had another call from MyWellbeing Collage yesterday at 16:50 whilst I was playing my guitar. They have arranged my one-to-one therapy to start in two weeks time. Not 14 weeks after all! I am either nervous or excited about this, Or a bit of both. It's the same day as my appointment with Dr Higgins, so I shall have to rearrange.
It's a cold grey old day again (9 C) and my legs feel sore. Arthritis worse in the cold & wet, I guess. Have been to Westgate for milk, beanz, and Rani curry, but I don't feel much like going out for a walk. Sarah's phone is off, which is a bit worrying. She only does that in emergencies. Problem with Fluffy Buzz, perhaps?
Have made another batch of Goosnargh biscuits and fed my outside plants. We are also forecast for heavy rain today, so no watering needed. Neighbour Bob has bought two plants for by the front door, which look suspiciously like plastic. That's one way of dealing with the plant care problem.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: That experience this morning was the most peaceful and long-lasting shamatha I've had for a wgile. It was also another second night off the Zopiclone. I wonder if any wobbliness I feel is due to withdrawals?

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:20 and did the Body Scan just before 7. Woke at 01:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 04:22. Didn’t go back to sleep, but rested half-dreaming a bit restlessly. Started meditating before 6, maybe 05:30. Up at 08:30. Feeling okay today, maybe a bit less up than the past couple of days.
My maidenhair fern has got an infestation of some pest, little black flies. The leaves are sticky and there are lots of white bits on the soil. Eggs maybe? I have put three bug spikes in the compost and moved it downstairs as the black bits falling off the plant land on the bathroom windowsill and get in my toothbrush pot.
Black fern aphids?
My maidenhair fern is a southern maidenhair fern, adiantum capillus-veneris. I think.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I got a Facebook Like on my post in the Lancaster Past and Present group about Jean Slatter, which I posted in April 2017. It seems like an absolute age ago. https://www.facebook.com/groups/336409379770446/permalink/1339071629504211/
Did a double Bodhipaksa and had a nice restful shamatha after.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 03:44. Turned over and started meditating at 04:30. Had a really sad dreamlet about losing two people I loved (Terry and a young Sarah) in a strange town and not being able to find them. Couldn't shake the feeling and it made really anxious as well, disabled with it. Stayed in bed all day. Took two Nurofen Plus at 10:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at 00:15 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 03:15. Turned over and started meditating at 04:30. Up at 07:45, had tea and a quick wash, then went out shopping at the Co-op. Got everything on my list bar the Tunnocks. No crowds, no queues, no empty shelves. Have had my coffee and cookies, but feeling low this morning, very hot and tired, aching legs, nose running (which may be a result of the food). Messaged Sarah to keep our Skype at 11 today fairly brief, but she is not so well either, so we've taken a raincheck.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Got in a bit of a muddle about my spreadsheet, and thought that I had £400-odd more than I should. But it was the Aviva payment on the 1st, not part of the end-of-April balance. Oh well, no harm done.

Was feeling envious of something Krisna Barooah posted on his Facebook profile about being Very Happily Retired. He has creative and meaningful activities and a relationship. Then it occurred to me that I was in a similar position and mood when I first moved to Lancaster in 1978. So, each to his own...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did the Body Scan at 7. Woke at 00:16 and took half a Z hoping that a good night's sleep would lift my mood. Awake at 05:40, so started meditating fairly restlessly. Up at 09:15. Forgot my morning codeine, so took it at 10. Have done some polishing and cleaning, washed my hair in the bath, put a bed-clothes wash on, and been out for a walk. Pleasant in the morning sunshine. I wasn't sure whether it was shades weather, put them on anyway, and everybody I met or passed had them on. Feeling a bit better now than earlier. Don't even mind the house being a bit dark.
The eczema on my legs & arms has gone, still some dryness though. My legs feel weak & sore, but maybe they always will on the first walk of the day. My right knee and left ankle both hurt.
Have cleaned my air conditioner and partially polished my guitar.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Today I am grateful for not having any money worries. Spent some time at lunch watching a program about an unemployed Kentucky coal miner and his family in 1968.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did the Body Scan at 7. Woke at 00:33 and took my morning codeine. Woke at 03:15, awake at 04:30. Started meditating pleasantly at 6. Up at 8. Feeling better than the past few days. Neighbour Bob waved to me as he drove past at the top of the Fold.
The weather is rather changeable at the moment, but nice and warm and bright for at least some of the time. The thing with the BBC forecasts at the moment is that they're only approximate, especially for several days ahead.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan at 18:45. It took me a while to get to sleep as my empty stomach was rumbling. I also had to get up for a pee a few times in the night. Woke at 00:50 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:40. Awake at 05:20 and started meditating. Feeling worse than yesterday, quite hot & anxious. The slugs and snails have been trashing my primroses so I've moved the bowl to a hanging basket.
I've been out for a walk, collected my scrip from Boots, and had a chat and a shop with Suni.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan at 18:45. Woke at 01:10 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:44. Awake at 05:10 and started meditating. Very restless and anxious. Worrying about getting my wake times correct, of all things. Up at about 08:10. Feeling better than yesterday after getting up.
Out for a walk in the bright sunshine and took a route down Pennithorne Avenue, then down a public footpath past the old cottages on High Fold and Low Fold onto Northgate. Noticed that the Co-op was relatively quiet at about 09:20. Got back in, made a coffee, then decided on an impulse to get my Co-op shopping. Pretty straightforward, got just about everything on my list, didn't have to queue for a checkout, and drew some cash as well.
As I got back from my morning walk, Bob was just arriving back from the Co-op and offered to get any shopping I might need from Aldi. I thanked him and said it was a very kind gesture. A bit of human sunshine.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went for a lie on my bed from about 3 to half 4 and took two Nurofen Plus for abdominal and arthritis pain.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 6 and did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 23:45 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:55 and took two Nurofen Plus. Didn't really go back to sleep but rested very pleasantly half-dreaming. Awake at 05:30 and started meditating fairly pleasantly. Up at about 8. Feeling better than yesterday after getting up. Been out for a long walk same as yesterday and got some things in Browgate Chemists. They stock the Kleenex Ultra Soft that I like.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Still feeling pretty okay at 13:00, although going a bit stir crazy. I wonder if speaking to Sarah yesterday had a positive effect?
Updating my River Man tab. Again :-)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went to bed and did the Body Scan at 18:45. Woke at 01:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:30. Awake at 05:20 and started meditating quite pleasurably. Stayed resting in shamatha until getting up at 08:30. Had a bath shave and went out for a walk. Pondering how to recycle my marguerite, which was looking rather shrubby, and on the way out asked one of the Church Garden ladies if I could put it in their brown bin. She came up with a better solution, which was for them to plant it out in their long bed at the top of the Fold. Which they duly did and then I planted my two rather large cuttings in the now-empty pot.
Feeling about the same as yesterday. Little twinges of anxiety here and there but in good spirits overall. Enjoyed being out in the sunshine and wanted more of it. It's hard work for everybody having to be inside in nice Bank Holiday weather.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 5 and fell asleep. Woke at just before 8. Didn't do the Body Scan. Tried to go back to sleep, but felt quite hot and my ankle and abdomen both hurt, so took half a Z at 9. Awake at 03:35 and lay half-asleep resting quite pleasurably. Started meditating after 5. Up at half 8. Feeling in good spirits today.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 17:30 and did the Body Scan at 18:45. Woke at 00:53 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:20 and took two Solpadeine Max. Didn’t really go back to sleep but rested very pleasantly half-dreaming. Awake at 05:20 and started meditating fairly pleasantly. Up at about 09:30. Feeling the same as yesterday, maybe a bit more droopy due to the weather. It's a cold grey old day with a fair wind. It was quite chilly dead-heading my marigold pot. But I've caught myself humming along to the radio, so who knows?
Healthwise, my eczema is right down, just a bit of dry skin on my lower arms and legs. I have been feeling quite hot the past few mornings, sweating after taking a walk or a bath. I'm sweating now, although I haven't been doing anything particularly strenuous.
My half-asleep and meditation times were quite peaceful, restful and even euphoric. I do hope this wasn't just due to the extra codeine. It was the best I've felt for ages -- no anxiety, no physical pain -- and I didn't want it to stop. It did stop, though, once I'd got up to take my vitamins. It came after talking to Adam yesterday and I felt similarly lifted after talking to Sarah earlier in the week.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Keep getting intermittently quite hot (after climbing the stairs, for example), then cooling down. Is this anxiety? It makes me anxious. Scared of getting coronavirus, for sure.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 17:15 and did the Body Scan at 18:45. Still wakeful at 21:40, so took half a Z. Woke at 00:50 and took my morning codeine. Had a very restless night. Started meditating at 05:20. Up at 8 for my Co-op shop. Bought food and a fern. Watered my outside plants, which seem to dry out quite quickly in either the sun or the wind. Also repotted my primrose basket into the other hanging basket, put a clothes wash on, and mopped the bathroom floor.
Quite low & anxious today. Fearing my first therapy session tomorrow.
Today I am grateful for being able to breathe properly. And for being physically pretty fit and well.
Had that curious thing on my right palm where it becomes suddenly quite bruised and sore. And it's gone now at the end of the day. And the sun has been out in the late afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 18:00 and got into bed at 19:30. Didn't do the Body Scan. Woke at 00:25 feeling very peaceful and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:08 and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 04:30 and started meditating fairly restlessly at about 05:30. Up just before 08:30.
Have had a bath shave, had a walk round the block, got some groceries and a chat with Suni at Westgate. Checked and dead-headed my outdoor plants in the sunshine. Had a quick chat over the wall with one of the Church Garden ladies. Feeling hot and anxious about my call in 45 minutes. Coughing a bit more than usual, but that's probably nerves.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Spent some time yesterday afternoon trying to work out what the new COVID-19 guidelines were and realised this morning that most of it doesn't really affect me. Will be able to go out for more than one walk from Wednesday and will hopefully be able to get a haircut from July 1.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 18:20 and did the Body Scan at 18:50. Woke at 01:15 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 5 feeling very low & anxious and started meditating very restlessly. Felt so overcome by panic that I took two Nurofen Plus at 7. Had that experience of a bright white light in my head again at about 9. Not pleasant, strangely, more like feeling dizzy. Up at 13:00. Unsettling, especially after a pleasant afternoon yesterday spent tabbing Toto's I Won't Hold You Back, eating Wagon Wheels, and reading Robert Harris.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: And I can sometimes sense, as I can the stomach clench of anxiety, its opposite, the release and softening that comes with the thought or affirmation that "it will be all right".

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 18:25 and did the Body Scan at 18:50. Woke at 23:45 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:20. Awake at 05:40 feeling low & anxious again and started meditating fairly restlessly. Not so panic stricken this morning. Up at 11:30.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Quite shaky and anxious this afternoon. Not eating properly, can't sit still. Feeling fearful about my call tomorrow morning.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 16:20 and did the Body Scan at 18:35. Woke at 21:16 and took half a Z. Woke again at 02:05 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 05:00 feeling okay. Up at 08:30. Have been out for a walk and done some shopping at Browgate Pharmacy. Bought a pack of five surgical masks. And found a substitute for Tunnocks Teacakes in Martins -- Lees's Jam Teacakes. Also Scottish.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 15:00 and took two Nurofen Plus at 15:40. Sore bottom and pain in my abdomen. Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Woke at 21:18 and took half a Z. Woke again at 1 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 04:37 feeling restless. Didn't go back to sleep. Up at just before 8 to go to the Co-op.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Felt pretty ropey yesterday afternoon. Waited from 09:30 to 13:00 for a telephone appointment with Dr Higgins which never happened. Now I need to contact his secretary to report this (why?) and I'm dreading it. Left that till Monday.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 16:00 and fell asleep at some point. Woke at 19:16 and got into bed without doing the Body Scan. Woke at 11 and took my morning codeine. Took two Nurofen Plus at 23:30. Had a very restless night half-asleep for long periods. Woke at 03:30. Finally awake at 5 feeling pretty low. Stayed in bed till 2 meditating and doing breathwork, had a couple of periods of restfulness and even fell asleep briefly around 1. Feeling hot and anxious and worrying about contacts with family and health professionals.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: There is no reason why my Monday shouldn't be a fun day, filled with the things that I like and enjoy. Even with cloudy grey weather forecast and another one of those phone calls to make.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did the Body Scan at 19:00. Still wakeful at 20:50, so took half a Z. Still restless at 21:48, so took my morning codeine. Awake at 04:55 feeling okay. Meditated from about 05:30 till 08:30. Thought of some affirmations:
  • I am safe
  • I am well
  • I am protected
  • I feel peace
  • I feel joy
  • I feel happy
Feeling better than yesterday, but not out of the woods yet. Been out for a walk, bought some apples at the Co-op, and had a chat to Doris whilst watering my hanging baskets. Called Dr Higgins's secretary (Keser Hussain) who told me that the doctor called last Friday, but the call went unanswered. Odd. He's arranged another appointment for this coming Friday and said to call him if I don't receive a call by 13:00 and he will put me through to Dr Higgins.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Got a sore back from playing Clifford T Ward's "Gaye" on my guitar.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:45. Woke at 21:48 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:42. Awake at 05:49 and meditated restlessly till 08:15. Got up, but felt so crap that I went for a lie down at 09:15. Downloaded Ouchie and another pain app called Pathways. Tried a guided meditation on Pathways. This is dispiriting after a fairly good day yesterday and a night's sleep with no extras. All I can do is keep buggering on and keep eating and stay off my bed as best I can.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie down at 16:45. Drowsed until 18:30, when I did the Body Scan. Woke at 21:45 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 22:16 and took half a Z. Woke again at 00:30 and 02:52. Awake at 05:18 and meditated fine till getting up for the bin just before 08:30. Feeling better today, although a bit hot and tired, some of which may be due to the insanely hot weather (forecast for 26 C today from about 13 C yesterday).
This morning, I have had a bath shave, been out for a walk round the folds, watered my plants inside and out, shopped and chatted at Westgate, looked at the church flowers with Doris, and done a Pathways meditation. Eating beans on toast at 12:23 with no real appetite.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had a nice restful shamatha after doing a single Bodhipaksa after lunch.

Just been out for another walk in the sunsine, but could only manage a medium-length walk around the backs. It's too warm and my legs feel weak & sore to go any further. But it was nice. Everybody is out in their sun hats and shades.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 19:10. Woke at 00:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:50. Awake at 05:22 feeling low. Got up at 13:30. It's warm enough to have the heating off and I got up with a rather late-appearing sun, but I feel low and my legs hurt.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 23:15 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:00 and took half a Z. Awake at 05:05 feeling okay. Got up at 8 for my Co-op shop. Got back, put a wash on, had a bath shave, had some coffee and cookies and then decided to go out for a walk. Dr Higgins called and caught me in a bit of a gale at the top of Westgate. It was okay, it was nice to speak to him, and it didn't feel weird or threatening.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Enjoying my food more today. Thought for the day: I don't have to live up to anyone's expectations. Especially when I don't know what they are.
Been playing my guitar a bit today and yesterday.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Woke at 23:44 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:16. Awake at 05:36 feeling okay and meditated quite pleasantly till getting up at 08:30. Feeling a bit low this afternoon. My arthritis feels worse in the high winds we're having (up to 48 mph).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 16:00 and did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at 22:45 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:10. Awake at 05:30 feeling low. Up at 13:30.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It's been a sepulchral Sunday spent lying in bed trying now to feel too anxious or miserable. I got up with the sun, which is forecast to smile on us all day tomorrow.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at midnight and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 04:10. Awake at 05:20 feeling anxious. Got up at 12. It's a nice warm bright day, and I've been out for a walk, but I feel low & anxious ahead of my phone appointment tomorrow. Can't get it out of my mind. No appetite. Constantly curtain twitching and clearing my throat. Weak sore legs.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Potted up some succulent stem cuttings at 13:30. Made some scrambled eggs on toast at 14:30.

Looked at the table on page 22 of the GAD Workbook and it's not asking for what I thought. It's not behaviours following a thought, but just how GAD affects my thoughts, behaviours, and feelings, so typical examples of all three.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 17:00 and did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at 23:40 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:10 and took half a Z. Woke again at 04:30. Awake at just after 6 and up at 08:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 16:30 and fell asleep. Woke at 21:00 and got into bed. Woke again at 22:22 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:55 and again at 04:35. Started meditating at 6 and got up at 08:15. Had a very restless night, not really sleeping after 3. Have been out to the Co-op, but my legs feel very weak and sore and I feel the usual hot & tired. Have watered the indoor plants, but had to go for a lie down for about half an hour and took my afternoon codeine at 11. Neither made any real difference.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I did have a nice set of half-dreams after 3, though, and wished I could stay feeling in that state of peace.

Had a curry & tortillas for lunch. Although it was somewhat forced, I think it has made my pain easier. At any rate, my lunchtime meditation was quite restful. I have also been out for another walk in the lovely afternoon sunshine. My legs didn't feel so bad as this morning.
Bob and his daughter have been carrying furniture in and out today. This triggers fear in me of future noise, for some reason.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 16:00 hurting all over and did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 21:50 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 00:50 and took half a Z. Awake at 04:50 and up at 08:15 after a very pleasant restful meditation. Been out for a long walk this morning in the bright sunshine -- round to Low & High Folds, down Northgate, crossed to Browgate, down to Bedlam Steps, crossed the road, climbed the steep path from the car park to Hallcliffe, then up to Hallcliffe Community Garden and back home. Feeling in much better shape and spirits than much of late. Have watered the outdoor plants.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Have eaten well today and with good appetite. Tried for a second long walk up to the golf club and doing a figure of eight round the backs, but had to cut it short feeling quite hot and weak.
Bob is just going out to play golf. Nice!

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Woke at 23:45 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:26. Awake at 04:50 feeling okay and meditated quite pleasantly till getting up at 8. Have been out to the Community Gardens, bought a plant (lychnis), and had a further walk round the backs. Feeling okay, although my legs feel quite sore and weak. I wonder if eating helps with that? On the health side, my eczema has almost disappeared. Just some traces in the crook of my left arm.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I have been playing my guitar the past couple of days, with some pleasure. Spandau Ballet - Through The Barricades.

Out for the long walk again, as the plant I bought doesn't match any lychnis on the net. It definitely says lychnis on the label in the Community Gardens, though. Stopped by the Co-op for some apples, but they were stopping people going in till some had left the store. Fair enough. Quite hot and weak legs on getting in, though, which I suppose is also fair enough given the amount of exercise I haven't had for quite a while. However, I have some cold Dr Pepper and the house is always cool.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:45. Woke at 23:10 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 00:40 and took half a Z. Felt quite bad in the night, hot with an upset stomach. Woke again at 03:50 as it was getting light. Awake at 05:17 feeling okay and meditated quite pleasantly till getting up at about 08:15. Have been out to the Co-op for some apples and walked a loop from the golf club through the back streets home. Feeling quite calm today despite some mix-up with recording my times. It's not important to be absolutely correct with my waking times, just to get the general picture of my sleep patterns and mediacation use.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 22:00 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 04:20. Awake at 07:20 feeling okay and meditated fairly pleasantly till getting up at 9. Critical thoughts began to arise, though, and these have persisted to a certain extent. Went for a walk throught the Folds and back through the village, but people (especially men) seemed vaguely threatening. One of the cafes has put a table on the pavement and there isn't really room to leave two metres walking past and a man sitting there kept looking at me, probably nervously.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It was fairly hot in my bedroom last night and I could hear noises from outside. The Ellises were having drinks on their patio by the sound of it. Put my earplugs in and opened the far window (which had more of a breeze anyway).
Have been out for a couple of walks today, neither of them a long one. My legs feel quite sore & weak at 17:00, mostly from arthritis pain.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 18:20 and meditated very satisfactorily for two hours. Felt peaceful and pain-free. Got into bed at 20:20. Woke at midnight (on the dot!) and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 04:05. Started meditating restlessly just after 6 and got up at 07:30. Have been out to the Co-op and a further walk around the backs, but my legs feel very weak and sore. I think walking on them helps, though. Have made a batch of Goosnargh biscuits. Still feeling quite jumpy and anxious. Tried using some plant ID apps, but kept getting distracted and blocked by need to register email, free trials, and then inline ads. None of them could identify my new mystery plant in any case.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Have been out for a third walk, round the backs again. Now scoffing six Tunnocks while listening to multiple repeats on Radio Seagull and reading a Harpers article on the Kindle app on my iPad.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 18:20 and did the Body Scan at 18:40. Lay resting till 20:20, when I got in bed. Woke at 23:15 and took my morning codeine. Felt quite unwell and restless, so took half a Z at 23:45. Woke at 02:55. Awake just before 6 and up at 8 after a very restless meditation. Constant anxious thoughts and dreamlets. Have had a long walk up to the golf club and back through the folds. Bought some coffee in the Co-op and some Tunnocks in Martins. Got in and my phone bleeped with a "scrip ready" message from Boots. Back out and spoke to Avril on the way, who said that my new mystery plant is a lychnis. There are several varieties, apparently. White or pink flowers. Decided to have chicken curry and rice for lunch, noticed that I was short of flour, and popped out to Westgate, where Suni gave me a big 1.5 kg bag for £1.90. Feeling more or less okay now just after 11.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
A couple of thoughts about continuing to take Zopiclone.
* I was hurting in my ankle and abdomen whilst awake last night . Not conducive to restful sleep. * I have just started the second 14-pack. That's 28 halves. One every 2-3 nights makes a minimum of 56 nights, or nearly two months.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 7. Woke at midnight and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:45. Awake just before 6 and up at 9 after a peaceful meditation. Feeling quite calm today. Have been out to the Co-op in the wind and rain to draw some cash and buy some teabags and peanuts.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Woke feeling quite hot with tummy, knee, and ankle pain.

Odd things about night waking. Got up for a pee at about 4 this morning. Noises through the bathroom wall of someone moving about. And the BMW man's bedroom light was on, then off when I got back into bed. And last Saturday, I got up just before 10 to see the roof lights on the Fold building changing colour in a rainbow effect. The lights went off at 10, as they do every night.
Tried for a second walk this afternoon but could only make it round the block. Some rain, but very windy.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 11 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:25. Awake at 05:20, started meditating at 06:27, and up at 08:30 after a restless meditation. Feeling quite low this morning. Have been out for a long walk to the golf club and back through the folds.
Was looking at other people's gardens and patios on my walk and thinking that they all looked so nice, and walking up to my front door thought mine looked nice too.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It's grey and cold and my legs and tummy hurt. I've got the heater on in my bedroom and the central heating turned up to 6.
It's a full moon tomorrow. It used to make me feel a bit gonzo in the past. I wonder if it's still affecting my moods?

I was pretty restless last night, couldn't get back to sleep properly after waking at 01:25 and didn't want to take any Zopiclone. But I had a clear half-waking dream about being able to experience great serenity and satisfaction and it being very close to my normal anxious consciousness. But maybe not so easy to access?
Have been updating my Ouchie journeys this afternoon and posting about struggling on Twitter.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at midnight and took my morning codeine. Still wakeful at 00:30, so got up and took half a Z. Awake at 06:30, and meditated restlessly till getting up at 09:30. Funny, there was a knock as I was going downstairs to unlock the front door, and there was the postman with a parcel containing my bulbs. Feeling quite low and anxious this morning. Have been out for a walk round the backs and got some shopping from Westgate Stores, where I had a nice chat to Rani and thanked her for the coconut barfi.
I timed my walk well, as I went out in my shorts in intermittent sumshine. It was a bit chilly, but an hour later at just past 11 it's raining. Just a shower by the looks.
Health-wise, I'm almost entirely eczema free at the moment. I've been using pile cream on my sore botty at night, which seems to be working quite well. Onwards and upwards!

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Went for a lie on my bed at 16:30 feeling anxious about something I'd said to Sarah and did the Body Scan at 7. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:50 and took two Nurofen Plus. Didn't really go back to sleep and started meditating at about 05:30. Up at 8 after a very restless meditation and out to the Co-op.
Wakeful all night. Worried about having told Sarah that I didn't mind if we spoke less often. She seemed to have taken it badly by her response to my Facebook message about calling in the morning ("Yep, as long as you want to?") Some mind-reading (thinking that she was feeling overwhelmed by other demands on her time) and some people-pleasing (trying to please her possibly at my own expense). Anyway, I messaged her on Facebook to say that I needed to make an apology and a clarification. We had a long and honest Skype chat about that (she felt that I was pushing her away) and sundry other emotional matters.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 04:26, and meditated restlessly from about 05:30 till getting up at 9. It's grey, cold, and wet today and I feel low and anxious. Want to do some tabbing, but can't focus my attention properly.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Woke at 00:30 and took my morning codeine. Still awake at 02:30, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. It eased my physical pain, but I didn't go back to sleep. Meditated pretty restlessly from about 05:30 till getting up at about 11:45. Feeling mighty fed up today. But two things have arrived in the post today: my bug spikes from Germany and two hanging baskets from Sarah. Feeling quite shaky & tearful.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 7. Woke at midnight and took my morning codeine. Still wakeful at 00:40, so got up and took half a Z. Awake at 6, and meditated peacefully till getting up at 08:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at 23:43 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 6, and meditated peacefully till getting up at 08:30. Have been out for a walk round the Folds and collected the second bottle of slug pellets, but I feel quite hot, sweating and anxious. Fearful of small things, like the occasional water on the shelf under the sink. And they've painted one-way arrows on the pavements and put up distancing signs. Isn't all that stuff a bit late? And the nursery in the Fold building is back in business. All the children playing together quite happily while their parents stay distanced when they drop them off. Mad.
On the plus side, my telephone appointment with Counsellor Carl went well yesterday. I didn't feel anxious in the morning until about ten minutes before he called, which is good. I have also started doing Ouchie updates and commenting on and cheering other users. My arthritis is painful today and I have twinges in my right hand as well. Ugh. To be expected really, as I am coming up to 70 and have had had health issues all of my life.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I have discovered the source of the occasional water on the shelf under the sink. It happens if I run the hot tap straight down on to the plughole. There is a pipe under the sink that runs from the waste pipe and has no cap. It comes off on the right-hand side and points upward. As far as I can tell, it's a spigot branch for a washing machine or dish washer. There was probably a washing machine in the gap where my fridge is.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 11 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 01:25 and again at 04:30. Started meditating at about 5 as my stomach hurt lying on my side and I was very wakeful. Rested fairly peacefully till getting up at 08:45. Have been out for a walk round the block, but I feel quite low this morning. It's cold, wet, and overcast and my legs hurt. Feeling dissatisfied with everything.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: At midday, feeling grim, the worst for a while now.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie on my bed at 18:15 and got into bed at 19:15. Woke at 00:15 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:40. Awake just after 6 feeling very low & anxious and started meditating very restlessly. Took two Nurofen Plus at 10. Up at 13:30. It was a very dark, wet and windy morning and I felt similarly.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Got into bed at 19:05. Woke at 23:35 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:40. Awake at 04:45 feeling low & anxious again and started meditating quite restlessly. Up at 08:30. Have had a Skype chat with Sarah, who hasn't been well. She had a COVID-19 test, though, and tested negative (like Adam). I have been out to Westgate for some essentials and had a chat to Suni. He made me laugh, as did Sarah. This grim feeling seems to come from not sleeping well, which itself may come from not getting out enough and seeing other people. Mind you, Sarah has also been out for less walks in this crap weather, so a common problem maybe.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Got into bed at 7 and took my morning codeine at 8. Woke at 23:15 and took half a Z. Woke at 04:45 and awake at 06:25 feeling low. Stayed in bed all day till 3 feeling quite unwell. Have put a wash on, drunk a lot of tea, and bought some peanuts from Westgate. I have just noticed that it's 17:15. Struggling with really low mood and anxiety.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another restless night. Took two Nurofen Plus at some point. Stayed in bed till 13:00 feeling low and unwell. I need to go to the Co-op soon as I am running out of peanuts and apples. Have had a bath shave and put a clothes wash on. I am fretting about my big monstera in the kitchen window dying, so have just fed and watered it. Feeling hot and sweating, I guess from too much anxiety and too little exercise.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another very restless night. No extras. Stayed in bed till 13:30 feeling low and unwell. Feeling hot and anxious again. No appetite, but I need to eat something to sleep properly.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Have been to the Co-op, arriving at about 15:15. The store was very quiet and I got everything I wanted, mostly bakery stuff. Legs felt weak & painful on the way back, and I was quite hot by the time I got in. But I have challenged my fear.
And eaten a luxury fish pie at 4 o'clock!

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, with the help of half a Z. It was a warm night, so I put the summer duvet on my bed. Took me a while to get to sleep. Up at 08:30 to fetch the bin. I've been out to the Co-op, got all that I needed, and washed my duvet cover. My legs hurt and it's overcast. Feeling low, hot, and anxious.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went to lie on my bed yesterday afternoon at about three and stayed there till bedtime.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another very restless night. Didn't sleep properly at all after about 1. Took two Nurofen Plus at about 3, which made no appreciable difference. Stayed in bed till 1 feeling pretty low and unwell. Feeling anxious again, and fretting about upcoming visits by Sarah & Liz and my telephone appointment to some extent. No real appetite, but I am eating Vale of Mowbray pork pies and vine tomatoes with some relish.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I had another one of those random conversations with Doris on Tuesday. As I was walking back down the Fold from putting my bin out at the back of the Methodist Church, she opened the door and said "Thank you for putting my bin out". Well, someone put her bin out in the same place, and it wasn't Terry (who puts her bin out on Westgate). It quite freaked me out in my anxious state. Just chaos. Why would I suddenly start putting her bin out with no discussion? Anyway, I reckoned that whoever had done it would return the empty bin, probably at around the same time of day. And as I was lying on my bed yesterday afternoon at about half 3, there was the familiar rattling and when I got up to look, Doris's bin was back in place. Don't know who it was, though, and I don't need to know.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, with the help of half a Z. Up at 9. Feeling mostly okay today, although it's wet and quite cold. Shave day, made some biscuits, and have been out twice to Boots. Knees ache with the damp weather. No real appetite, but I am going to try eating my main food after my meditation. It's cold paella today with sliced vine tomato.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Feelin tired and listless at half 3. Can't concentrate on tabbing Clapton's Unplugged version of Hey Hey.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept fine, no extras. Awake at 04:45, up at 08:30. Have been out for a walk, put some washing on, and watered the plants, but I feel quite hot, sweating, and fatigued. My feet, legs, and pelvis all feel sore and/or painful. My mood is correspondingly droopy.
Had the insight (again) this morning that my anxiety/depression is like my addiction.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had a lie down all afternoon starting at about 12. The pain did start to ease eventually. Had two Nurofen Plus.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Slept fine, with the help of half a Z at about 3. Up at 9. Feeling droopy again today, fair amount of leg and foot pain. Shave day, and went out for a Fathers Day picnic and walk with Sarah. My second walk of the day. We came back via the folds and the backs, so I've done a good distance in the day. Had a lie down afterwards with added meditation. Took two Nurofen Plus at about 13:30.
My voice is quite hoarse today, and it was difficult chatting to Sarah. This is not being fixed by the Lansoprazole, so I wonder if this is rhinitis rather than gastric reflux. I get a very dry mouth sleeping, snore (so I have been told), and sleep a lot of the time with my mouth open and breathing through it.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: My marguerite has started to flower! Not sure if it's the Baby Bio or the fact that it's getting more of the right light being outside.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, no extras. Awake at 4, up just before 9. Had a pleasant meditation, but got increasingly anxious about the planned valuation visit at 1 by Liz and David from Your Move. Which didn't happen. Long story short, the visit was never booked as Liz didn't confirm. Your Move offered to reschedule for 09:45 tomorrow, just David Fisher from Your Move.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, with the help of half a Z. David Fisher came at 09:40 and was in and out very quickly (10 minutes). He didn't wear a mask or gloves, though. Liz hasn't replied to my message either. Not hugely surprised, but not that bothered either. She is quite "hands off", which suits me. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went out for two short walks this morning, have had my fortnightly session with Counsellor Carl, done two meditations, eaten a beef casserole with dumplings, and am now eating a dish of peanuts.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, no extras. Woke at 04:35, but drowsed and meditated quite pleasantly. Able to focus on the feeling of rest in my stomach. Up at 08:30 to fetch the bin. Went to the dentists to ask about the text message telling me I need a check-up. All locked and bolted, with a notice on the door saying no one-to-one appointments. Called them just out of curiosity when I got home and got a very brief "leave a message" recorded answer. I still have that persistent mysterious pain in the top of my tummy, just below my breast bone. Roughly where my heart is. And my legs and feet still feel quite weak and sore. On the spiritual front, I need to work on my persistent grumpiness, particularly my critical thoughts about other people. Is this anxiety at work? I was quite sceptical about CBT after last year's group sessions, which only seemed to help on the social side, but I'm beginning to see that it's a form of mindfulness. Watching and examining forensically my thought patterns, and then making the conscious effort to loosen the power of thought. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
It's forecast for a sunny 29 C, but the house is pleasantly cool.
It's 11:30 and I haven't looked at Facebook yet today.

Although it can get a bit noisy with the windows open. I went to lie down for my Bodhipaksa meditation and almost immediately, motors started left and right. Terry mowing the church lawn and Builder Bill in his digger. I rested in open-hearted non-reactive attentiveness and both noises stopped eventually.
Have been out for a walk round the folds. I wanted to go further but my legs weren't up to it. Never mind.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, no extras. Bit of a hot night, but not too bad under my summer duvet. Woke at 04:15, but drowsed and then meditated. Not as pleasantly as yesterday, though. Up at 09:30 rather unwillingly. But I have put a clothes wash on and spoken to both Suni and a woman who stopped on the footpath to chat while I was giving my outside plants a much-needed watering. We talked about the weather and she sounded like she had the same accent as me (although I didn't ask). I was out in my bare feet, which was quite pleasant (if a little prickly). My legs still feel sore and weak. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went out for a walk round the backs after my meditation. Played some guitar and watched some videos about the Lammas eco-village. Also looked up some old bookmarks for viewing artwork & paintings online, after being captivated by a painting of wine glasses by John Singer Sargent. https://www.nationalgallery.org.uk/paintings/john-singer-sargent-wineglasses

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, no extras. Woke in the night when it was still dark feeling unwell in the back of my throat and my tummy. Lay on my back for a while with both my hands on my tummy breathing into the discomfort. Awake at 06:15 feeling low and unwell. Stayed in bed till 13:15 feeling hot and nauseous. It got very noisy with the windows open. Neighbour Dave sounded like he was building some furniture. Lots of hammering. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Had an intermittent pain in my right wrist. From playing guitar? I tried stretching my hand and it seemed to calm down. I wish I could do the same thing with my anxious mind.
My PC is running painfully slowly. Getting lots of delay and "Not Responding" errors. It's Windows Defender, no doubt. Either I fit more RAM or I install another anti-virus. I have the installer for Kaspersky downloaded. I installed it late in the day on Wednesday and rapidly uninstalled as I realised that it was to going to need some configuring.
One piece of good news - my Bulb payments can be reduced from £105 to £83.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. I went for a lie down at about 5 and fell asleep. Got into bed without doing the Body Scan. Took two Nurofen Plus at some point. Meditated from 04:15 to 08:30, when I got up. Have had a bath shave, changed my duvet over (it's forecast 18 C today), and had coffee and cookies. I feel hot and tired, sweating and anxious. Fretting about making an appointment to get my hair cut, doing a Co-op shop, and doing my CBT homework. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went into shamatha during my second Bodhipaksa. Was quite uptight and anxious starting meditation, but my breathing started to slow during the second round, I lost track of the counting, then peace, ease from pain, and relaxation spread throughout my mind and body. If I start meditation at 13:00, this normally lasts till around 15:00, 14:51 today. I am hot and sweating on getting up, and my legs are sore and my knees & ankle hurt, but I am so glad for the relief. Because if it comes once, then it can come again.

Remained hot and sweating throughout the afternoon, unpleasantly so. Sweating whenever I moved. Worried about having a virus, but decided to wait and see. Talking to Sarah today (Sunday), she said that she'd felt really hot too. Humidity before the thunderstorm. And I feel okay today.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Another restless night. Awake in the dark. Went back to sleep, though. Awake at daybreak, so about 4. Up at 08:15, out for a walk with my brolly round the backs. Showery and windy, but not especially cold (although the forecast said 12 C). Sarah said that they've been having similar mad weather in Leeds. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:45. Another restless night. Awake at 3. Can't remember going back to sleep. Meditated restfully till about 5 or so, when my mood felt low. Up at 13:45 after a restless and somewhat wretched day in bed. Cold (14 C), gloomy, and wet. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully. Codeine at 23:15, then half a Z at 01:15. Awake at 05:15 and up at 08:15. Angle grinding noise from the building site on Delph Hill. Have had a shower and been to the Co-op and Boots, but I feel rather hot, low and droopy. Need to book a haircut at Franco's, but anxious about it. Uncertainty about how it will work. Will I need to stand outside? Will I need to wear a mask? A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Had a nice doorstep chat with neighbour Bob.
My tummy aches a lot at the moment and my ankle hurts when I walk. Got arthritis pain to top it off.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. Did the Body Scan at 18:45. Took my codeine early because of my tummy pain and later two Nurofen Plus at some point. Meditated from 5 to 11:30, when I got up. Have had a bath shave, been to Westgate (which is now fully open), and made a batch of biscuits. Woke feeling quite rested and peaceful (for a change!) and managed to sustain that through my long meditation. Didn't want to get up as there was no or little pain in my ankle and I felt peaceful. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Still feeling quite laid back at 3 in the afternoon.
Playing my guitar later on -- David Crosby's Traction In The Rain. Got the fingering finally worked out from the Stoney Evening live version.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, no extras. Awake at 05:30, up just before 9. It's a cold wet day (14 C) and my legs and knees hurt, but I've been to the Co-op for ingredients for Pane con le Olive e con la Salsiccia. Listening to Gary Van den Bussche on Starpoint Radio and joining in on the Facebook group. In good spirits today and eating with appetite. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully, no extras. Awake at about 1 and felt very low by the morning. Spent the day in bed. Had two Nurofen Plus at some point. No food, a little water. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully, but no extras. Awake feeling very low again. Spent the day in bed. Had two Nurofen Plus at some point. No food, a little water. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully. Took half a Z at 1, I think. Up at 08:30 for my Skype call with Sarah. Have done several chores (clothes wash, watered plants inside and out) and eaten snacks, but feeling rough, hot, anxious. My voice was hoarse on the Skype call. Eating a late cold lunch (pork pie & vine tomatoes) at 3 to keep my strength up. Listening to Ricky O on Stomp Radio. First radio all day. My legs feel weak. Not surprising, really, after so much bed rest. Left ankle and right knee hurt, but that's probably due to my low mood & anxiety. I have done the best I can today. The rest is up to the universe. Feeling ready for a lie-down at 4. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Age UK is to close. I popped down at about 10 with the aim in mind of dropping off a bag of goodies. The shop door was open and there were a man and woman in the shop. I asked if I could drop off a bag of items and the said that the shop was closing for good. Oh well. That's sad news, but I didn't want to leave a bag of items if it wasn't going to be collected.
Walked on down to the Gentlemans Quarter barber shop on the corner of Westgate and the sign says that they do online booking. Might be worth a try.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. Woke at 1 and drowsed from then on. Meditated from 6 to 9, when I got up. Felt quite rested and peaceful although not fully asleep. Is this a result of taking half a Z the night before? It happened 1st July as well. I hope not. I have 9 Zopiclone left. If I take half a Z every three days, that's 54 days before I have to ask for a refill. My current scrip was issued 5th March, so that's not bad going. Four months to date. Feeling a bit hot and low today. Could probably do with some exercise. Have washed my hair, changed and washed the bedding, and ironed some hankies. Time to do some online shopping, maybe? A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I did watch some YouTube videos of Birmingham and do some tabbing later on (Clapton's Bad Love).

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went for a lie down at about 5. Did the Body Scan at 18:30. Took two Nurofen Plus before it got dark as I was hurting all over. Woke at 01:35 and took my morning codeine. Up at 08:30 for my call with Carl. Had a quick bath and went out to the Co-op. Got everything I needed, apart from Tunnocks Teacakes, which have mysteriously disappeared again. Feeling very hot at midday, which is probably due to lack of exercise. No galloping appetite, though, so eating a cold lunch of pie and toms. It was a restful night and a largely peaceful meditation. It started to get painful and anxious towards the end, though. I have been having some erotic dreams recently, which were quite nice last night. A so-so day. Ended as a good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Did the Body Scan at 18:45. Slept fine, no extras. Awake at 06:30 and up at 07:45. Still in fairly good spirits. Have been out for a long walk round the folds and the backs and made an appointment for a haircut. Have made two Sicilian olive and salami loaves. On the health front, my arthritis is quite painful in this cold damp weather and my bot is sore. After 20 years, it's beginning to act up again. Anusol is good, but it does make your underclothes rather messy. Taking so much codeine can't help. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Spent some time tabbing and playing in the afternoon. Still doing Bad Love. Also finally got around to ordering a couple of things on Amazon (a replacement Wilkinson Sword razor and some cushion covers). They will be arriving at the lockers in the Co-op on Saturday, which is quite convenient.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine, no extras. Woke just after 3 and lay on my back calmly breathing. Awake at 07:30 and up at 07:45. Have been out for another long walk round the folds and the backs in the gentle rain and done some shopping at Browgate Chemists and Westgate Stores. Finally had a clearout after a few days being blocked up. Tried not to do any straining and washed bot gently, as it's inflamed. Hopefully, now the soreness will ease. Using the ointment two or three times a day at the moment. 14 C and wet, so arthritis still sore, but a little better than yesterday. Getting out for a reasonably long walk seems to help, not surprisingly. Feeling in good spirits and a lot calmer than of late. Noticing sensations more and enjoying them. Smell particularly. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Enjoying listening to Starpoint Radio (Gary Van den Bussche; Steve King) and bantering on the Facebook group. Also participating in the Chronic Pain Survivors UK group on Facebook. And have read two sections of the GAD Workbook on my iPad. About to eat two cake bars (Jaffa Cake; M & M).
And had a sink shave :-)

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night, but no extras. Awake at daylight and didn't really go back to sleep properly. Up at 8. Have been out for another long walk round the folds and the backs in the sunshine. Had a nice chat to church gardener Ruth, who complimented my pot garden. Had an accident just after getting up. Needed to go whilst making tea, but couldn't hold it in till I got to the loo. Bot is sore again today. Legs feel very weak and sore. Anxious about having another accident, but it's happened once before here in Baildon (while lying in bed) and my bowel was probably still overloaded after a week of constipation. Go in the morning, I guess. Anxious about my legs getting worse, too, but I can't do anything about that. Still feeling in good spirits overall. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Leg problems may be due ironically to more exercise recently. Mind you, I have also ascribed my leg weakness recently to lack of exercise.

My olive & salami bread is delicious. I ate about four slices yesterday. I also now have four bright new black & white cotton cushion covers. And a brand new bright blue razor. I got an email at about 11 saying that my Amazon order was in the lockers at the Co-op, so I put my outdoor shoes and walked down.
Decided to give the ointment a rest for a day. Just washed and dried and let some fresh air in. Might use some this evening if the soreness keeps me awake.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An odd, disturbed night. Did the Body Scan and went to sleep at the usual time. Woke in daylight and had two thoughts (1) I haven't taken my codeine (2) what time is it? It was 21:38 and I hadn't taken my codeine. Turned over and went back to sleep. Woke again at 03:50, just before sunrise. Didn't go back to sleep. Started lying on my back meditating early (before 6). Had a movement at some point. Abdominal pain nagging at me. Feeling around, it seems to be diverticulitis (lower down in the abdo, on the left more than the right). By about 07:45, I was ready to take some pain medication for some relief before getting up for shopping and Skype at 08:30. Went downstairs for two Nurofen Plus, got back to bed, then noticed two codeine in my egg cup. Ah. Been out for a Co-op shop in my shorts on a sunnyish morning and watered the plants. No Skype with Sarah as I guess her phone is still broken. By 11, feeling pain-tired. There are builders at work both sides. Making up for the wet day yesterday, I guess. To be fair, Bill only made a brief appearance and the builders working on one of the church rooms are very quiet. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I haven't used any ointment yet today, but am still a bit sore. My prolapse does seem to have shrunk, though. Anusol claims to shrink piles and I have always been a bit sceptical about that. It's not going to make them go away, which is maybe what I expected.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. Did the Body Scan and went to sleep at the usual time. Kept coming awake and going back to sleep. Awake at 05:30 and up at 08:30 for my Skype call with Sarah at 10. Out for a walk round the backs after a shower and putting a wash on. After our call, I felt suddenly low & anxious and went to lie down. Did my Bodhipaksa meditations early at 12. Encouraged myself to get up and have made tea, put my washing out to dry, eaten a cold lunch, and made some biscuits. I'm anxious about my haircut appointment on Tuesday. My computer is continuing to run impossibly slowly on occasions. This morning, it had gone into hibernation as well. Freaks me out sometimes. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It's not configured to hibernate. Maybe it turned itself off after an update.

Moved at about 11:30 and have a sore bot. Have put three lots of ointment on since going to bed last night. The prolapse feels bigger, too. Oh dearie me.
Went to lie on my bed at about 15:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. Did the Body Scan and went to sleep at the usual time. Wakeful at 02:30 so took two Nurofen Plus. Awake from about 04:30 feeling low. Spent the day in bed. It was very quiet in Baildon. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Did the Body Scan and went to sleep at the usual time. Awake from about 4. Meditated increasingly restlessly till getting up at 08:30 for my haircut with Nick at The Gentleman's Quarter. Only £13 and good service. The longest haircut I've had in ages, the full 30 minutes at a guess and he trimmed my eyebrows well. Got some groceries from Suni on the way back. My legs feel weak and sore today, my voice is hoarse, and I feel drained of energy. Quite hot as well. Bed rest doesn't do me any favours physically, although I do like the rest my mind gets. Determined not to retreat to my bed today if I can. It's a dull old day - 15 C and overcast all day. In the middle of July :-( A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Had coffee and cookies this morning and cold snackery in the afternoon (pork pie, tomatoes, salted peanuts).
The sun is occasionally popping its head round the clouds :-)
Bailed out early at about 5.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Did the Body Scan and went to sleep at the usual time. Awake from about 4.  Meditated pleasantly till getting up at 08:30 to fetch the bin. Also meditated successfully in the night, at about 1 or so. Focussed on the faint sensation of calm in my belly, breathing into it. I noticed that I wake at night with abdominal pain and a feeling of congestion in the back of my throat. Reflux, at a guess. But I now feel the old familiar low & anxious mood. No appetite, sore bot & legs. Want to buy some clothes (some Amazon shorts), but can't focus my mind properly. A bad day. Ended as a so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went to lie on my bed at about 5 with my ankle hurting a lot. Lay on my side and the pain started to disappear after about half an hour. I must have been dropping off to sleep, as I was having eidetic visions. Did the Body Scan and went to sleep at the usual time. Slept fine, no extras. Awake at 05:30. Felt low and stayed abed till about 12:30. Up for tea, washing up, bath, snacks, sink shave, and ending watching the 2003 Joni Mitchell documentary. Also did some light dusting and washed a silk cushion cover. No ointment today. May put some on this evening before retiring. Feeling tired. A bad day. Ended as a so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully, but no extras. Awake finally feeling low again. Up at 10:30. Finally moved after being stuffed up for a few days. Lack of exercise and hot food don't help. It took me several goes but I'm clear now. Very sore bot, understandably, so have applied ointment. Feeling quite hot and sweating when I move around. My ankle is very sore. Feeling quite fed up at the moment. A bit of a bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night, with the help of half a Z. Awake at about 5, meditated peacefully till getting up just before 08:30. Have done a Co-op shop, Skyped with Sarah, and feel cold & low. Masks will be required in all shops from 24th July. I had a letter from the dentists 5th July reminding me that I need a check-up. Moved this morning just after showering, conveniently. No ointment yet today just before midday. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It's almost bedtime and I still feel low. Been playing Guinnevere, although it took a while to focus on it. Had a quick look at Twitter, but it's just bad news week over there. Police up to no good in the USA, arresting demonstrators in unmarked vehicles and openly beating them up on the streets.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully, but no extras. Awake finally feeling low again. Up just before 12. Have (reluctantly) had a shower and washed my hair, put a wash on, and watered all the plants. Not feeling full of the joys of spring. Hurting in my body and mind. No appetite, no joy. Bummer in the summer. A bad day. Ended as a so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Ended the day playing my guitar, Twittering a little, and looking for photos. Went to bed at my usual time.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Went to lie on my bed at about 06:15 for a little while before doing the Body Scan. Rested very peacefully, although not asleep, until about 21:30. Awake from about 4. Meditated pleasantly till getting up at 09:30. Feeling crocked. Have been for a walk to the shops and round the backs, but I feel low & anxious, full of an unnamed dread. The library will be reopening fairly soon, but do I want to return to volunteering? Not today. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Today I have shown courage by going out for a walk. And I am grateful for apples.
However, I haven't had a bath or shower today. Yet.

I now own three packets of masks. One of surgical tie masks that I bought from Browgate Pharmacy a while back, a packet of loop tie masks that I bought in the Co-op about a week ago, and another packet of loop tie masks that I bought from Browgate Pharmacy today. Five masks in each.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fitfully, but no extras. Awake at about 05:30. Meditated with increasing anxiety until getting up at 08:45. Had a Badedas bath, then out for a walk round the shops and the backs before my final phone session with Carl. A bad day. Ended as a so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Moved this morning. Quite a solid lump. Not too sore today and yesterday.
Legs weak & sore this afternoon @ 14:00. Feels cold. Still feeling low & anxious. Dreading a number of phone calls (Dr Higgins, Rachel @ Baildon Library, Sarah, Wellbeing College).

Decided to let the phone calls come as the universe decides. And the first one came at 14:15. My first follow-up GAD talking therapy appointment with Wellbeing College, next Tuesday at 13:00 with Nicky.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Went to lie on my bed at about 17:30 for a little while before doing the Body Scan at 18:35. Slept through till 02:30, took my morning codeine. Still felt wakeful with various aches & pains after lying on my back trying to rest, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus at 03:00. Lay drowsing half-asleep till 05:30, when I started to meditate very pleasantly till getting up just before 08:30. Had a shower, put a mask on, and went to the Co-op. Got everything I needed, but my glasses kept misting up. May try one of the other types of mask that I've got, the ones with a fogfree strip and the ties. Went to Westgate Stores as well and chatted to Rani. She said it's up to me if I want to wear a mask in their shop. Feeling in good spirits. Rachel rang at about 10:30 and we had a nice chat for about 20 minutes. We have agreed to delay my return to active volunteering for a month. It could well take that long for the new reduced service to be set up. Sarah and J are coming to visit on Saturday, as expected. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went out for another walk after my midday meditation, but it started raining as I left the house, so walked round the block.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night's sleep. Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Slept through till 22:30, when I took my morning codeine. Woke at about 03:15, but went back to sleep. Awake at 05:30, when I started to meditate very pleasantly till getting up just after 08:30. Have had a Badedas bath, been out for a walk round the folds, watered my indoor plants, and done some outdoor gardening. My legs feel quite sore & weak. More sleeve-tugging on the net. A popup on the MBNA website asking me to review their Statements page. Is this just bean counting? Or box ticking? It's a bit like asking your users to micro-manage your website for you. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I suspect that getting agitated about engagement, prodding, prompting, and sleeve-tugging is something that I need to let go of. Like worrying about phone calls. Just let them come.
After calling the dentist to arrange a check-up yesterday, I expected them to call back this morning in response, probably between 9 and 10:30. So, as I was washing up and getting ready for my bath, moving up and downstairs, I took my phone with me. And I was just out of the bath, dried, with my pants on luckily, when the phone went (at 09:45). That made me smile.

And I decided to let go of my "dislike" of the Echo In The Canyon (2018) movie and just watch it. And it's fine. It has a lot of Jakob Dylan in it, but that provides an interesting slant on what would otherwise be a kind of bio-pic of Laurel Canyon circa 1965-1969. And it means that you get to see Fiona Apple perform. Which is pretty hypnotic.
Being critical all the time is a form of externalised anxiety for me. Addictive behaviour as well, that seeking of people's weak spots as a form of defence. So...
"Being critical all the time is a form of defence for me"
