Went out for another walk after my midday meditation. It started raining as I left the house, but it was just a few spots so I walked round the backs.
Moved again this morning, but only slight soreness after and none now mid-afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night’s sleep again. Rested on my bed for about an hour from 18:20. Woke at 21:30, when I took my morning codeine. Slept through, I think. Awake at 05:35, when I started to meditate very pleasantly till getting up just after 08:30. Kept my phone to hand as Dr Higgins was due to call this morning. Had a shower, washed up and put a clothes wash on. He rang just before 10. I was in the kitchen finishing my coffee & cookie preparations before going ou for a walk. A very brief, good call and he will see me in three months time. Out for a walk in the cloudy warm, up the hill and down again (up the Fold to The Grove, up to the top, left, then down Springfield Road, across the green and down Westgate). Legs still weak & sore, with arthritis pain as well. Still, it was a lovely walk looking at peoples houses and their gardens and saying good morning to three horse riders coming up Westgate. Have made a batch of biscuits and may have a cold lunch. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went out for a second walk straight after my midday meditation round the backs and then up round the folds via the golf club. It's fairly warm, the house is warm, and I feel quite hot after getting in. Still, I took it slowly and it was enjoyable. Lovely to see a bit of sunshine and there were lots of people out in their sunhats and shorts. Quite a crowd outside the Malt Shovel pub. No masks, I noticed. Nor in cafes. So why are they required in shops? Curious.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night. Rested on my bed for about an hour and a half from 6. Woke at 22:30, when I took my morning codeine, and again a couple of times. Awake at 5, and started to meditate very pleasantly from 05:30 till getting up just after 08:30. Out for a walk in the cloudy warm, up the hill and down again. Quite hot and sweating still, an hour or so afterwards. Sarah and Jamie are arriving at 1. It's going to be a bit of warm, wet day judging by the forecast. A so-so day. Ended as a good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
It was a bit of a tiring visit, although okay in total. I messaged to say I would be having lunch as they were arriving at 1. They arrived at 1 and I hadn't had any lunch. But they had, having just been to McDonalds. Which scuppered my plans for a visit to Jessies for some summer puds :-) Gave Jamie £4 to spend on sweets and maybe a comic, so we bought some sweets in Westgate Stores. Then down to the Co-op for some apples and salami. My legs started to feel quite weak by the time we got there, so I asked for a short visit. Which was okay. We got our shopping and went home for tea and a chat, Jamie playing on the computer. Jamie was as usual boisterous, a bit loud, a bit naughty, but just being a little boy I guess. They don't like kisses and cuddles and don't tend to say please and thank you without being prompted. But Sarah seemed to be okay with it all, and it's always nice to see her.
Bit hot in the Co-op with my surgical mask on and glasses over. Need to experiment.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Rested on my bed for about an hour from 6. Woke at 21:15, when I took my morning codeine, and again a couple of times. Awake at 05:30, and started to meditate restlessly, feeling low & anxious. Stayed in bed all day, getting up at 16:30 for some tea and olive & salami bread. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Woke at 21:30, when I took my morning codeine, and again a couple of times. Awake at 05:30, and started to meditate restlessly, feeling low & anxious. Stayed in bed all day. Took two Nurofen Plus mid-morning. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Woke at 22:30, when I took my morning codeine. Awake just before 5, and started to meditate fairly peacefully. Up at 08:30. Feeling a lot of leg pain and very keyed up about my first telephone appointment. Have had a bath shave, done some washing, and been to Westgate Stores. Not eating hot food yet, but moved today. No soreness, either, which is a relief. A bit of a bad day. Ended as a good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had my first session with Nicki. She is only able to do four sessions before she needs to hand me over to another therapist, but I said that would be okay. She gave me some interesting suggestions and we talked about my medical history and early childhood.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Took me ages to get to sleep. Did the Body Scan at about 18:40 and took my morning codeine, then half a Z, then two Nurofen Plus all before midnight, spaced evenly. Slept and woke peacefully in the end. Up at just before 10 after awakening at about 6. Have showered, washed my hair, been to the Post Office for some cash, Boots for my codeine and pregabalin scrips, and then The Secret Garden for a plant for outside. She didn't have anything, so I bought a maranta tricolor instead. Wore my surgical mask with the fogfree strip and didn't get any significant misting on my glasses. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Practising eating later so that I go for my "midday" meditation at 2. May start going to bed an hour later too.
In good spirits today. I may try to install Kaspersky later.

Had a quick look at the library rota and sessions restart 3rd August. But there are only two volunteers signed up and they both seem to have signed up for repeating sessions before the library closed.
My primrose basket has reflowered and unsurprisingly has some slugs. I'm in two minds about whether to use slug pellets, though. And I've been feeding the pot crysanthemum that I kept and it has a flower :-)
And I've showered two dusty houseplants.

I've used the slug pellets. Had a walk round the backs straight after my meditation and chatted to the woman at Rose Cottage and Rani & Dave in Westgate Stores. Dave assures me that you can get fit in six minutes. It's on YouTube, apparently. Something to do with mitochondria.
It's warming up this afternoon and forecast for 24 C by tomorrow afternoon.
And, finally, have eaten a proper day's grub, including a beef casserole with dumplings.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:45. Woke at some point and took my morning codeine. Woke again at some point but didn't note the time. Awake just before 5, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Up at 08:30 for my Co-op shop. Was playing Crosby's Triad last night and the Byrds version came on Radio Mi Amigo this morning. Making olive & salami bread again today. It's not easy making bread dough with rubber gloves. I gave up in the end and used my bare hands. It's warm and wet today and my arthritis is quite bad. Legs weak too. From standing making bread? Or the weather? Who knows. In good spirits. Was a bit anxious about Nicki possibly asking whether I got in touch with HALE as she suggested. I need to tell her, I think. And the session last Tuesday has left me feeling up, so next session something to look forward to rather than fear. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Eating paella with some relish. Or should that be gusto?
The dough stayed really sticky, too sticky. It stuck to the damp teatowel and took a little while to scrape off. The trick is just to add more flour.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:45 again. Woke just after 11 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 04:05 and lay half-awake and dreaming till just after 7, which was very pleasant. Up at 08:30 for a Badedas bath and a walk up to the golf club and back through the backs. Legs still sore & weak. Feeling quite still and peaceful today. It feels a bit odd after so much adrenaline hyper recently. Chatted to the the church gardening ladies and Doris. It's forecast for 31 C today, but the house feels cool, cold even. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Bot isn't sore at all now and the prolapse seems to have shrunk.
My primrose bowl is flowering again.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:40. Woke at 22:22 and took my morning codeine. Awake at 05:35 and meditated fairly peacefully till getting up just before 9. Have had a shower and been for a walk in lovely sunshine up the hill and down again. Put a clothes wash on, Skyped with Sarah, and will have a cold lunch (as I forgot to get anything out of the freezer). Legs weak & sore. It's overcast now at just before 12 and cool enough to have the heating back on. My mood is a bit lower than the past few days and I'm working on accepting it and carrying on. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Did a second walk round the backs straight after my midday meditation. I timed it at 10 minutes, which makes it the minimum recommended daily exercise. Lovely sunshine again and I think it was slightly better or easier than my morning walk. There is something happening in Baildon today - there were people gathered at the bottom of Bank Walk at about 1.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Went to lie on my bed at about 5 and listen to the Vidyamala Burch pain meditations that I'd copied onto my iPad. A bit mixed. The first one is an introduction and very quiet, too quiet for me to hear clearly. She also tends to talk quite quickly, which can be difficult to hear clearly sometimes. It also covers "back breathing", which sounded interesting, so I may look for others. The other three guided meditations all had music backgrounds, which I'm not generally keen on. All four last 62 minutes in total, so I had a rest, then got into bed. Felt hot and sweating, so changed my duvet and opened the window. The temperature wasn't particularly high, but it was humid. Took my codeine around 21:20, then woke at 01:30 needing a pee. Went back to sleep, but woke again at 04:30 or so. Dozed till about 6. Stayed in bed till 1 as I was comfortable and didn't relish the pain & weakness in my legs on getting up. There was a group of gnats on the back window in my bedroom when I woke at 01:30 and they'd all gone by the morning. The fern in my bedroom is now infested with the fungus gnats. Have spiked the maidenhair fern in the bathroom to try and get rid of the tiny black insects it's infested with. They drop onto the window sill and loo and make quite an unsightly mess. Have also had a sink shave, put a towel wash on, watered all the plants inside and out, and had a cold lunch. Very tasty, pork pie, tomatoes & salt, and a couple of buttered chunks of my olive & salami bread to finish. Funny weather. It's forecast 18 C, but I've got the heating on very low (at #2) and it doesn't feel cold. The sun keeps going in and coming out, but it's not a bother. A bit of a bad day. Ended as a good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:45. Woke at 22:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at some point but didn’t note the time. Awake at about 05:30, and started to meditate restlessly. Up at 11:30. Had tea, ran a Badedas bath, ironed a pillowcase and some hankies. Went to Westgate Stores and got a Rani curry. They didn't have any milk, so I walked down to Martins for some. They had plenty of milk at about 12:30, so worth remembering. Have eaten several bowls of peanuts and an apple, but not really hungry today. I need to move as well. Feeling droop and sad. Lying in bed in the morning comparing myself endlessly with other people and feeling a shameful failure. My plants are causing me sorrow. Black flies/gnats all over the bathroom shelf again, so moved the maidenhair fern downstairs and moved the Boston Fern upstairs. Both the ficus benjamina and the monstera deliciosa are getting yellowy foliage. I've tried feeding, but now I'm wondering if they have both been infested with fungus gnats and have root damage as a result. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Lay on my bed for about an hour from 4 doing the Bodhipaksa meditations. Rested, then got into bed at about 6. Woke at 21:30, when I took my morning codeine, and again a couple of times. Awake at 05:30, and started to meditate restlessly, feeling low & anxious. Up at just before 08:30. My shirt arrived at 09:37. Then out to the Co-op for some groceries. Put a sheet wash on. Anxious again about my upcoming telephone appointment at 13:00. A bit of a bad day. Ended as a good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
The appointment with Nicki went fine. I was anxious that would check up on whether I'd followed her recommendations and scold me if I hadn't. No such thing happened. We discussed my week, how I was feeling, my core beliefs, two insights that I had, some more of my life story, and she gave me loads of interesting suggestions to follow up.
I had a lie down afterwards for about an hour, then got up and made a pot of tea and strangled eggs on toast. Feeling quite up and calm now at just before 6.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Woke at 00:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke at 02:57. Awake at 04:38 and meditated fairly restlessly till getting up at about 08:15. Went to fetch the recycling bin, but it hadn't been emptied. Went back to bed feeling low, tired & anxious, but got up after about 20 minutes. Have done some morning stuff and been out for a walk around the backs, but I feel hot & tired and my legs hurt. Unwrapped my shirt and the sleeves are quite long. I can't be bothered returning it, to be honest. It fits fine otherwise and I usually wear a shirt with a jumper anyway. Can always fold the cuffs back if needed. It's a nice shirt. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Today I will live with my pain & sadness & anxiety. I will encourage myself to rest & eat appropriately, and maybe look at some recovery suggestions.

The shirt is a 39-40, so at least a size too big. Oh well. I put the returns stuff in the recycling bin (now emptied), so it's done now. And I already have a shirt from a charity shop whose sleeves are too short. Trying to find that middle way. And buying stuff on the internet unseen is always going to involve some risk.

Went to lie on my bed at 15:30 and lay for a couple of hours with my legs crossed to ease the pain both my knee and and my ankle. Got up, ate some teacakes, sent a Facebook friend request (rapidly accepted) and back to bed at 18:00. I have looked at some assertiveness and ACT mindfulness stuff today and eaten properly. I feel very sad and weary at the moment.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:20. It took me a while to get to sleep with a grumbling tummy and had to get up for a movement. Woke in the dark and took my morning codeine. Woke at 01:11 and again at 02:39, when I took two Nurofen Plus. Drowsed pleasantly till awakening at 06:15 and meditated peacefully till getting up at 14:30. It was a very quiet day and a remarkable meditation period. Very little or no pain in my knee & ankle. Slight pain in my heart region, indigestion probably, eased by lying on my side for about 30 minutes. No anxious thoughts at all, only beginning to arise around 14:00 at a guess. Still feeling good at 17:41 and contemplating a lateish night as I'm still eating. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Gashed my heel yet again on a sharp tack on the stair carpet gtting up for my meds at 7. A bit alarming to look down in the kitchen and see red blood on the floor. And drops on the living room carpet. Rushed around mopping it up as fast as possible with a dishcloth. It's healed really quickly and there are no stains on the carpet or my bed.
I've done a clothes wash and watered and fed all my plants inside and out.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Did the Body Scan at 19:30. Woke at 11, when I took my morning codeine. Awake at 05:45, and started to meditate peacefully till getting up at 09:30. Decided to have a lie in, as I felt like it. Realised that I'm getting anxious about accuracy, such as getting my waking times right. It may be enough to record a good/bad night, and maybe rising time. I also feel somewhat compelled to follow a "good" schedule. Not sure what's driving that. The anxiety about accuracy is part of my perfectionism. I'm sat here with my T-shirt off in the warmth. Heating is off, bedroom windows open, and summer duvet on the bed. 27 C forecast for today and very little wind. Ah. I was rewarded/praised for my academic achievements as a child. So my needs were only met when I "got it right". The basis for a continuing fruitless search for self-worth through making the world tidier? A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Woke at some point but didn’t note the time. Awake just after 5, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Up at 08:30 for my Co-op shop. Realised once I was up that I'd forgotten to take my morning codeine, so took it at about 9. Skyped with Sarah at 10. Feeling a bit lost & forlorn afterwards now, though. Wondering whether to message Stefan to see if he wants to buy my Gant shirt. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Took my codeine just after 2. Awake at 05:15, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Didn't feel like getting up, so rested in bed till 12. At one point, felt like I had a diverticular flare (nausea and some abdominal pain on my left side). Have had a Badedas bath, put a weekend was on, and watered the indoor plants. Time for another pork pie and some ice cream and peanuts after. Have been out for a walk round the backs. Put the heating on for a couple of hours, but the house doesn't need it. Temperatures in the high 20s are forecast for the next couple of days. Have got arthritis in my hands, mostly in the right. Oh dear. I have discovered good sites for both movies and book PDFs. Have been watching a number of Laurel Canyon movies (including the Croz biopic) and have a slew of new books on my iPad. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Am in good spirits still at 17:30, browsing the Radley Village website and the British Countryside 1850-1950 Facebook group. It strikes me that I left Radley at the right time, as building work on two of the development sites has started. Whites Lane and the south Kennington site. Sad.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:50. Took my codeine just after 1. Awake at 05:05, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Didn't feel like getting up, so rested in bed till 10:30. Feeling more anxious and fearful than of late. Can't work the weather out. The house was cool enough this morning to put the heating on for an hour, but it's warm outside. Sort of overcast, though, possibly heralding the arrival of thunderstorms overnight. Have decided to start tapering off the codeine, one 15 mg pill per week, starting Monday today. Morning first, then afternoon. Hmm. Wednesday might be a better day to start that. Tuesday brings a dental appointment and a couple of phone appointments. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Have messaged Stefan to ask if he wants to buy the Gant shirt, but am anxious on a number of scores. It's just a new thing for me, so a number of unknowns involved. It wil be okay.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Woke at 1 and took my morning codeine. Still wakeful at some point so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 5 and meditated increasingly restlessly till getting up at 08:30 for my dental appointment. Put a clothes wash on, had a shower, then went out to the dentists. Have also been to the Co-op and bought some groceries. Anxious about my phone appointment and life in general. After my chat with Nicki, I went to lie on my bed and practise the new "calming breath" I have learnt. Got up to put the bin out at 16:36 and then up for some food at 5. A bit of a bad day. Ended finally as a good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Stefan messaged at about 17:30. The shirt is probably too small for him (he's a 42 chest!), and there's no time to check as they're on holiday, so he suggested I return it. I will do that and have ordered the shirt I really wanted. It was only available in a S size, which I now know is my Gant size, not M.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:40. Took my codeine at 00:30. Woke at 03:22 to get up for a pee. The world seemed very peaceful and it was gently raining. Awake at just before 6, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Up at 08:30 to fetch the bin. Have done all my morning chores and it's quite warm. Got all the windows open a crack and am sitting with my T-shirt off. Feeling mildly anxious about keeping an anxiety diary, which is my CBT homework for the week. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I don't have to make a world-class production of my anxiety diary, just do my best. The calming breath seems to help. It's such a counter-intuitive way of breathing that you have to focus on it continually, which presumably reduces the anxiety, since nothing is feeding it.

Out for an afternoon stroll round the backs in the warmest part of the day. Started reducing today, so moved before I went out. Time to relax with Dr Pepper :-) Thundery showers forecast for later this afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Went to lie on my bed at about 6 with my ankle hurting. Lay on my side and fell asleep. Had a brief moment of great uplift at one point. It was dark when I finally got into bed. Took my codeine at 01:40. Spent about half an hour making notes for my anxiety diary. Awake at 05:35, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Didn’t feel like getting up, so rested in bed till 11:30. Up and eating cold food and doing stuff, but I feel grumpy and anxious. My scrip is ready to collect and my new shirt will be delivered shortly (probably tomorrow), but both feel like annoyances. The weather has gone back to being cold cloudy crap (20 C today), which doesn't help. I don't feel like going out or doing anything. Getting to grips with the new look Facebook. FBP is proving very useful. Also trying a couple of weather apps on my phone. The BBC one will stay, I think, as the Met Office is not only showing the weather as sunny today but also has ads. Talking of which, Radio Seagull have a new concept. Payola basically. The presenter of the UK Blues show said at one point that all the acts played on the show are currently on tour, so check their websites for details. They have also changed their station ident from "no ads" to "no weather or sports". Because they lard their shows now with ads for their T-shirts and mugs. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:40. Woke at 00:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:40. Awake at 04:30 and meditated fairly restlessly till getting up at 08:30. Expecting my Gant delivery today. The delivery message came at 08:48, an 8-12 slot. Had morning tea, then coffee and cookies, put a duvet cover wash on and had a shave. The delivery came at 10:30 and was posted through the door. Went out to post my other shirt back, collect my scrip, and buy some mail bags. Also went to the Co-op and bought some pork pies and bleach. Popped into Martins on the way back to see if they sold batteries. They do, and at a good price: four AA Duracell for £5. Met John and Sandra the library volunteers on Westgate and had a brief chat. Also spoke to Avril the church gardener this morning. Voice is quite normal today. Was dripping with sweat when I got in. Feeling rough today, low & anxious, no energy, constantly peeing. A mixture of anxiety and codeine withdrawals. Decided to abandon my attempt at coming off the codeine, took two codeine (my afternoon dose) and went to do my midday meditation at 11:30. Feeling a bit more rested at 13:30 and have eaten an apple. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Eventually had a couple of slices of Sicilian bread and another apple. The sun came out and in for about an hour as well.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Woke at 21:15 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 1. Still wakeful at 2, so took two Nurofen Plus. Drowsed half-asleep till just before 6 and meditated peacefully till getting up at 08:30. Feeling light, calm & happy today. Eating, reading, posting on Facebook, downloading books, watching the Laurel Canyon TV thingy. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at 18:20. Woke at 22:40 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at 04:52. Awake at 06:40, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Up at 08:40. Feeling a mixture of okay and anxious. Gardening thoughts. Can't seem to get the rosette succulents to survive. Just have three pots with straggly stems with weak roots. How do you get one plant to spread across the pot? Those little black flies are in the succulent pot in the kitchen. There's a few of them on the window sill and in my rosemary cutting glass in the morning. I noticed several black spots in my morning tea cup, which I think were flies. Have spiked the pot in the kitchen. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Woke at 12 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 2. Spent about 40 minutes doing my anxiety diary. Slept fitfully. Awake at 04:30? and meditated fairly peacefully till getting up at 1. It was quite good timing as the sun has been making sporadic appearances to brighten my dread. I have pains in various parts of my body and my legs feel sore & weak. And how time flies. Just finished my cold lunch and it's 4 in the afternoon. Funny how worries disappear. The mysterious blank reply by Nigel T to one of my Facebook posts was an error rather than a reprimand or some kind of weird comment. It had gone this morning and I deleted my post (which was a bit gnomic, to be honest). And Janet's comment about royalties for authors on my PDFdrive post. Well, downloading copies of books still in copyright is illegal, but no more so than making cassette copies of vinyl albums. An activity which was pretty widespread in the 80s and 90s. Oddly enough, a good day. I lay on my bed before going to sleep feeling quite positive and calm.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Lay on my bed resting from 7 till about 8, when I got into bed. Didn't do the Body Scan. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine. Woke again in the night but went back to sleep. Awake at 05:20, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Up at 08:30. Feeling okay. Have been out to the Co-op in the pouring rain. I overheard a few people grumbling about the weather. Have put a bedding wash on. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at 18:20. Woke at 21:05 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at 00:50. Awake at 05:05, and started to meditate quite restlessly till getting up 10:30. It's grey, cold, overcast and I feel low. Had a nice Badedas bath and put a clothes wash on. Watched the second episode of the Laurel Canyon TV mini-series whilst eating a very tasty fish pie. It's an odd series. This second episode seems to focus almost entirely on Gram Parsons, the Manson family, and Altamont. With more odd commentary from one Johnny Echolls about bad hygiene and its effect on his house. Health-wise, I have the usual array of aches and pains. Back pain from playing my guitar added in recently. That mysterious abdominal pain is still there. Found myself sweating quite a lot at a couple of points lying in bed. Not due to the temperature, which is in the low 20s at the moment. All things considered, a bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at about 18:30. Woke at 23:25 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 01:45 and 03:05, when I got up and took two Nurofen Plus.  Drowsed half-asleep till 05:35 and meditated fairly peacefully till getting up at 9. Heard a knock at the door, went down the stairs, realised I'd forgotten the key. When I finally got the door open, there was no-one there and no package on the doorstep. I assumed it was Gant returning my parcel with a rejection note. Decided to stay up as it was a bright sunny morning. Had tea, washed up, went out to Boots and Martins. Got back in, decided to do my internet chores before going back out to Browgate chemists and there were two emails from Gant telling me that my refund had been processed. My legs hurt, especially my knees, but I have eaten a proper day's food today. Including two lots of ice cream. Is my milk going sour? My afternoon tea had bits in it. Or is that just cream? A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The milk was definitely off, although it smelt alright. Chucked the rest of the 2 litre bottle after a couple of cups of tea with curds in them.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Got into bed at 19:30, no Body Scan. Woke at 23:30 and took my morning codeine.  Awake at 04:05. At 06:05, started to meditate increasingly restlessly till getting up at 11. Feeling fed up. Have been for a quick shop to Westgate Stores and tidied up my primrose pot, which was looking fairly bedraggled after a couple of days of wind and rain. Picked several snails off. Guess the slug pellets have all got washed away. My legs, feet, and back all hurt. Bot is sore again. Not surprising, given that I've had extra codeine recently. The Anusol is very good at fixing the soreness and itching. And my mouse is a bit broken. Left button click has stopped working. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Fixed the left button click problem (at least for now). It's surprisingly easy to take the Logitech M185 apart. Just uscrewed the cover, blew some dust out, then screwed it back on again. And the button is clicking fine. https://gadgetandotherstuff.blogspot.com/2014/05/diy-repair-clicking-problem-on-logitech.html

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Got into bed at 20:15, no Body Scan. Woke at 22:40 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:15 and 03:28. Awake at 06:03 and started to meditate increasingly restlessly till getting up 09:14. Tea, shower, then dressed and out to the Co-op. Skyped with Sarah at 11. Up and about and eating and drinking, but not feeling 100%. Moved twice today, quite sore. Wanting to pee all the time. And I have that mysterious pain under my left ribs, at the bottom. Is this a diverticular flare? A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Wanting to constantly pee is due to not being able to empty my bladder. This is very common in elderly men apparently and having neuropathy in the legs and pelvis doesn't help.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Did the Body Scan at 18:35. Woke at 00:13 and took my morning codeine.  Awake at 05:17, and started to meditate quite restlessly till getting up 09:30. It’s grey, cold, overcast and I feel low. Yet again. That familiar feeling of dread about a new counsellor and the library reopening. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at 21:36 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 02:36, when I got up and took two spare codeine. Slept till 06:45 and meditated increasingly restlessly till getting up at 09:30. Feeling low and anxious and afraid. Full of shame. The comparing and shaming voice loud and persistent. It's a sunny morning so have watered and photgraphed my outside plants and cleaned up the mat. The little black dots have almost gone on both the bathroom and kitchen window-sills. Showered and washed my hair. Watched a Beck/Clapton video and YouTube and noticed how people bicker over details. I do that. Something to let go of, my need for accuracy. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Liz came round just after 1 to tell me that they want to sell the house. I will have six months to find somewhere else to live.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Did the Body Scan at 18:40. Woke at 22:15 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 1, when I got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Slept till 05:37 and meditated fairly peacefully till getting up at 1. It's grey and raining and cold and windy and I feel lumpen. Have had a Badedas bath and steam dried a couple of T-shirts. Setting up my finances ahead of needing to borrow short term for moving expenses. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: An okay night. Got into bed at 19:30, no Body Scan. Woke at 21:40 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at 00:45. Awake at 04:37 and started to meditate increasingly restlessly till getting up at 10. Feeling hot, anxious and low-spirited. My legs and knees hurt. Bot is still sore but I moved properly this morning. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: At 4, feeling a little more human after finally eating my chicken curry & rice lunch and working out (and documenting) how to update Yahoo sign-in security properly.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Bailed out early at 17:20 feeling tired and low. Did the Body Scan at 18:30. Woke at 22:14 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at 02:57. Awake at 05:21 and didn't feel like getting up. Got up and took two Nurofen Plus at 06:50 and again at 13:48. Meditated increasingly restlessly till getting up at 2. It's grey wet and cold. Forecast for 14 C tomorrow. I've got Matt the plumber coming at 09:30 to do the gas safety check and I need to go out and pick my scrip up and visit the Co-op. Have eaten ice cream and peanuts, started another Crosby tab, and chatted to Adam on Facebook Messenger. Full of mounting anxiety and dread about having to find another home. This isn't quite the peaceful, relaxed retirement that I'd dreamt about. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Lay on my bed resting from 19:00 till 19:25, when I did the Body Scan. Woke at 00:58 and took my morning codeine. Woke again in the night but went back to sleep. Awake at 05:57, and started to meditate quite peacefully. Up at 08:30. A slightly mad morning. Computer was running painfully slowly this morning and it took me about 20 minutes to restart it. Phoned Matt at 10 to see if and when he was coming. Said he was running late and had sent me a message. No message received, but he said he would arrive at 11. Went to Westgate Stores in my shorts. Got all I needed and Rani mentioned that someone on the other part of Binswell Fold may be looking for a renter soonish. We shall see. Got back in and put my trousers on. It's cold today (12 C). Went to the Co-op and got a few items. Got back in, dropped my shopping off, and went to Boots to pick up my scrip. On the way back with my mask still on, a man across the road waved and asked me if I was okay. I didn't recognise him :-) Got in at 10:59 and Matt was just arriving. Bot is quite sore today. While coming out of sleep/meditation, I was able to focus on the restful & pleasurable sensation in the pit of my stomach. Between the bottom of my ribcage and my navel. This is a tan tien, I think. There is no chakra at that position. I can remember doing a couple of colour power projections from that point in the mid-80s. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Was just starting my midday meditation at 1 when there was a knock at the door. It was Kadie from YourMove with my tenancy letter. She said that they had a property coming up for rent in October. £600 a month rent; an apartment with its own entrance; in the centre of the village; maintenance done by the office. She also said that they would let me know about other similar properties as they became available, and that would be before they were advertised publicly. She also said something else that I didn't quite catch, and which she couldn't remember, but which sounded like "I'll cover you".

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: 18:30 23:10 codeine 03:29 06:03 08:47 Feeling low, anxious, and ratty. Have been to the Co-op for the rest of my groceries, had coffee and cookies, Skyped with Sarah. Eating fish & chips. Still got a sore bot, but moved properly this morning. Most of the flowers on my marguerite have gone brown. Saw Sandra Marshall the library volunteer outside the Co-op. We had a brief chat. A bit of a bad day. Ended as a good day, though.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Did my midday meditation at about 12, putting some ointment on first. That seemed to help quite a bit.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: 18:20 23:12 codeine 02:30 06:42 08:50 Woke late for a change and meditated quite pleasantly till getting up just before 9. Have moved again today , but have a sore bot. My legs feel very sore and weak this morning and I feel fairly low & anxious. Was hoping for some spiritual peace and regeneration over the Bank Holiday weekend, but just feel ill, tired, and dissatisfied still. I have arthritis in my right hand, I think. The joints in a couple of fingers are sore. Another bit of a bad day. Ended as a good day, though.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A good night. Lay on my bed resting from 18:00 till 18:30, when I did the Body Scan. Woke at 23:31 and took my morning codeine. Woke again at 03:57. Awake at 06:02, and started to meditate restlessly. Took two Nurofen Plus at 08:15. Up at 09:40. Feeling panicky again about moving. A good day all in all.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I need to keep letting go of my need to predict and control about moving. Sarah has just messaged again. She is helping, not hassling.
Have been out for two walks today, round the backs in the morning and round the folds in the afternoon. My legs feel quite sore but it's nice to have stretched them.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Lay on my bed resting from 18:10 till 19:42, when I got into bed. Woke at 21:32 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at ar 23:58 and then again at 02:04, when I got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 05:47 and didn’t feel like getting up.  Meditated peacefully till getting up at 10:15. Went out for a walk round the folds and the backs in the morning. Intermittent sunshine today, so quite pleasant. Legs weak and sore. Moved this morning before my Badedas bath. After moving around so much and sitting down, I had some leakage and had to change my pants before my midday meditation. Yuck to the max. Worried about it showing on my shorts. Shameful stuff. Went to Westgate Stores for curry & ice cream. No beef curry in stock, but I bought a tub of diabetic ice cream. Hmm... I wonder what it tastes like? I hope I haven't deprived someone with diabetes from a sweet treat. Chatted to Rani about the cottage coming up for rent on Binswell Fold and she has passed my name and phone number on to Jo Flecknoe, who owns number 5. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another restless night. Lay on my bed resting from 18:30 till 19:03, when I got into bed. Woke at 21:35 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at ar 00:44 and then again at 03:27. Awake at 06:01 and meditated restlessly till getting up at 08:45. Have moved twice this morning. Very sore bot and had to cancel the library training at the last minute as I felt I was going to need the loo at short notice. Have applied about three lots of cream this morning. Feeling anxious and weary and hot. My legs and foot hurt quite a lot as well. Oh woe is me :-( A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Had a good midday meditation and lay resting peacefully until almost 3. Having got up, though, I feel wiped out and have no appetite or interest in anything.
The cheap Chinese globe bulb that I put in a little while back has blown.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another restless night. Lay on my bed resting from 15:30 till 18:14, when I got into bed. Woke at 00:23 and took my morning codeine.  Woke again at 02:37. Awake at 04:59 and meditated restlessly till getting up at 12:30. A long painful morning full of anxiety and doubt. I want Kadie to phone with news of a property, but I don't want that to happen whilst I'm hiding in bed. Haven't eaten properly for two days now. My first phone appointment with Catherine tomorrow morning. My bot feels better today. I wonder if eating tomatoes makes the inflammation worse? A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Tomatoes are not noted for making piles worse, but ice cream is. It has no fibre. But eating it with peanuts may be okay. They're rich in fibre. Ibuprofen should be avoided apparently, so Nurofen Plus may make things worse (as well as causing extra constipation).
Went out in the sunshine at about 15:15 to do an impulse shop at the Co-op. Got everything on my list and didn't have to queue for long either.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: 18:00 18:41 00:13 codeine 02:03 05:22 08:32 Moved this morning. Still sore. Applying cream 3x day. Feeling low and hot and anxious. Had my telephone appointment with Catherine at 09:45 this morning. It went fine but my voice was very hoarse by the end. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had to have a lie-down from 2 till 4 this afternoon. Just exhausted with pain & worry. Now having a pork pie and toms without any mustard (which may have been causing my soreness - I was laying it on a bit thick).
And some more ice cream and peanuts.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: 18:00 18:30 22:22 codeine 23:38 0.5 Z 05:34 08:37 Had a restful sleep after taking half a Zopiclone and feel in better spirits today. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and asleep at the usual times. Awake at 05:35 and up at 10. Fairly peaceful morning meditation, but at half 2 I feel exhausted anxious and low. My legs feel really sore and tired. My bot is beginning to clear up, though. I haven't applied any cream today after my Badedas bath this morning. No appetite and haven't moved today either. Have done a clothes wash and made some biscuits. A bad day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and asleep at the usual times again. Took half a Z at half past midnight. Awake at 06:17 and up at 11:30. Fairly peaceful morning meditation, but at half 2 I feel exhausted anxious and low again. Have done my CBT howework and eaten an apple. It's raining and my legs hurt. Another bit of a bad day. Ended as a good day, though.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and asleep at the usual times again. Awake at 06:07 and up at 12. A mixed morning meditation. At one point, I suddenly felt very restful and it lasted for about an hour or so. I got up, made some tea, put my lunch in the oven, put a bedding wash on, and then ran a bath. I was just about to clean my teeth when I heard the phone ringing. Got downstairs just after it stopped. Rachel calling from the library. We had a nice chat for about 15 minutes. I am booked in for a session on the 19th, not the 26th as I thought. My monstera is growing several new leaves and my Co-op pot plant rose has five flowers coming into bloom. My prolapse has shrunk back and my bot is a little itchy. Haven't moved today yet, though. I made a £2000 cash transfer request on my Virgin credit card yesterday at 14:22. Was a little anxious overnight about it being declined, or getting a phone call asking me for my employment details, but it was in my first direct account this morning. That's one worry about moving dealt with. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed, Body Scan, and asleep at the usual times again. Awake at 06:00 and up at 08:45. A peaceful morning meditation. Out to get the bin, had a bath, then out shopping at Westgate Stores and the Co-op. My legs feel really weak and sore, probably due to a lack of exercise the last few days. Have that feeling of dread about upcoming tasks and appointments. Nervously checking my FB Messenger to see if S is checking up on me. Silly. On the good side of life, Gary Ziepe is playing some awesome tunes. And my bot isn't sore at all now. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Went for a lie down at about 3, then got up at 17:30 for ice cream and Twitter.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Awake several times, most strongly at 4. Stayed abed till 12:30. Feeling fed up. Can't seem to shake this tired, exhausted feeling. Having a fish pie at 14:37. A so-so day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had a late dream about doing a couple of things and really enjoying the activity. Fishing was one of them. Disappointed as always to awaken to cold painful reality and lie in bed trying to recapture that happy pain-free feeling.
Anxiety and arthritis...

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept fine. Awake at 5 and up at 9. Had an increasingly restless meditation ahead of my phone appointment. It went well, we got quite a lot done and it's hard to believe it was only my second session. A good sign. We have a good working relationship and I like the way she uses email and attachments. No appetite today, though. Windows managed to attempt an update whilst I was trying to log on this morning to do my CBT questionnaire online. In the end, I had to switch my PC off using the power button and then switch it back on again after waiting for a couple of minutes. This is after several prompts yesterday that the update would take place outside of my working hours. Absolute nuisance. May have to change my Windows update settings. Again. A very bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
My settings were not to install the update, but just to notify. So it was working as planned.
And the reason BLT sent me poor quality Chinese and Polish light bulbs may be that the wattages I requested aren't available in European bulbs.
I moved twice, quite substantially.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A bit of a restless night, but okay. Awake at 2 and took two Nurofen Plus, which I didn't really need. Lay on my back resting peacefully for quite a while. Images of writing topics and quite strong eidetic images as well. It was very pleasant, almost like the result of yesterday's phone discussion coming to flower. One writing topic was Between Oak And Ash, about my two saplings at the Old School House. Had a lovely chat to Sarah on Skype this morning and am eating fine. The sun keeps going in and out, and I keep switching lights on and off. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept well. Don't remember waking in the night, apart from turning over. I tend to lie in the same position for hours and get sore and aching in the part I've been lying on. My mouth gets very dry, too. My mouth falls open when I'm asleep as far as I can tell. Awake at 5 and up at 9. Feeling not so good physically, though. My bot is sore again and my legs feel weak and sore. Out for a double walk around the backs in the afternoon. Wondering if the apartment that Kadie was talking about is the ground-floor flat with the wooden fence in front of it. It had a rather battered looking three-seater sofa on the pavement outside today. Still in good spirits at 5 and doing bits of internet shopping. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another restless night, but okay. Got up for a pee and to put some cream on my sore bot at about 2. Awake just before 6 and up at 09:30. Had a very restful meditation which I wanted to enjoy as long as possible, hence the late rise. It's warm & sunny today and I've been to the Co-op, got everything I needed, asked Kath to open a till, and wore my mask without any glasses. Quite hot after walking back with heavy shopping, though. And had a nice second walk in the sunshine round the folds and the backs. My legs do feel weak, though, and my arthritic knees hurt. And my bot is still sore. Time for a shave and something to eat, methinks. Got the heating off and one of the downstairs windows open. May open the back window in the big bedroom a crack. It's always nice to smell fresh air while in bed. All in all, a good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Slept well. Awake at 5 and up at 9. Out for a walk up the hill and down again. Nice. Feeling in good spirits still. Yahoo sent me another email about using an app password. So I did that again, got it working and Thunderbird decided to upgrade itself. To a version that broke the Google calendar and tasks. Hmm... So I installed an older version, but it doesn't like my profile, which got modified during the upgrade or something. So now I can't view my profile at all. Oh dear. I'm not particularly fazed, though. There will be a solution. Out for another warm walk in the afternoon haze. Having a cup of tea and cooling down now. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Thunderbird all working fine now and software all up to date as well. I feel quite soft and springy.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another restless night, but okay. Woke at midnight feeling quite hot and lay doing the calming breath for awhile. Awake just before 6 and up at 08:30 for the bin. The weather is not so fine as the past few days and I feel a little droopy. Have watered my plants inside and out, been out for a walk round the block, gone to Westgate Stores for a shop and a chat with Rani, and put a clothes wash on. Listening to King Crimson's Lizard on Spotify and thinking of Pat. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Had a nice restful shamatha after my midday meditation, only slightly spoiled by Terry mowing the grass. Had a quick look at rental properties available and there was one house, on Bankside Terrace. Which is on Baildon Green, unfortunately. £595 pcm, maybe a bit big for me. Not sure if it's furnished or not.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Another restless night. Remember waking at just before 3. Awake just after 6 feeling low. Meditated fairly restlessly till getting up at 1. Fearful of uncertainty about coming events. Had a 4-bag pot of tea and a quick wash, then went out in the sunshine to collect my parcel from the Co-op and buy a couple of groceries. Got the heating off now (18 C today) and swigging Dr Pepper. Quite a sore bot today and some pain in my right temple. Like a mild migraine. A bad morning and a good afternoon.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Yet another restless night. Awake at 05:30 and up at 09:20. Had an increasingly restless meditation ahead of my phone appointment. Again, it went well, we got a lot done. Some questions about filling in the questionnaires on the IAPT website.
  • Do you have to fill out all six/seven of the questionnaires? Only the first two are relevant (PHQ- 9 and GAD-7).
  • The end notification is very misleading. (It refers to the self referral process.)
  • On at least one questionnaire, there are double check boxes and odd red asterisks.
Catherine will pass on any suggestions, although given that it's outsourced, I won't hold my breath about any improvements being implemented. [Just checked and it's produced by the University of York: "PCMIS Health Technologies Ltd is a subsidiary company, part of the University of York". It's a warm sunny afternoon and I've just finished a yummy fish pie and am exploring Fripp's online diaries. Haven't moved for a couple of days now. Concerned that I need to do so before going out for shopping or volunteering. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Restless again. Awake just after 6 and up at 09:24. Had an increasingly restless meditation ahead of shopping, flu jab, and library session. Tea and a wash. Moved last night and again this morning, to my relief. There was a certain amount of gentle pushing involved, but I'm not leaking and not sore at 15:27. Out to the Co-op in shorts at 10:20. Saw the Marshalls again outside. We discussed library volunteering and flu jabs. They said they weren't volunteering at present due to disliking wearing a mask for about 2.5 hours. I have to agree with that. Got back just before 11, had a cup of coffee and some cookies, had a quick exchange with Sarah on Messenger, put some trousers on, and went out to the surgery at 11:30. It was really quick, no queuing at all and must have taken less than 10 minutes in total. Saw Dr Kennedy there helping the clinician and asked her about appointments. She said to ask for a telephone appointment with chosen GP and she will call me in for a face-to-face encounter if she thinks it's necessary. Back again, packed some kleenex and a jumper, put my surgical mask on and walked up to the library. By the time I got there, I was feeling knackered. It was very quiet anyway, so Rachel sent me home. A so-so day. Good in parts but too tiring really. And I feel ill at ease.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: Restless again. Woke a couple of times in the night. Awake at 5 with self-critical and worrisome thoughts going through my mind. Lay abed till 13:30 and took two Nurofen Plus at 12:30. Got up feeling fed up and the sun came out at about the same time. Have bathed, washed and conditioned my hair, and put a clothes wash on. Having fish and chips just after 4 and going for a shave in a minute. A bad morning and a good afternoon.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Got quite agitated yesterday afternoon about having cut the straps on my surgical mask too short and taping them together. Realised this morning at some point that I could just staple the join to make it more durable. And feeling pestered by Chris Bent's tagging me and "questioning" my post. It was just a simple request for feedback. Listened to the podcast and he dedicated me. So I just wrote what I felt and it will be okay. Beginning now to actively question the usefulness or validity of some of the thoughts that drift through my mind and sometimes trouble me. The question is more "What does this thought or feeling trigger in me to upset me so?"

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed quite late last night, about 8. Slept fine. Awake at 06:30 and up at 10 after a pleasurable morning meditation. Feeling fine and eating well. A fair bit of pain and weakness in my legs and feet, though. Had a walk in the sunshine round the backs, but it did feel like hard work. Slightly sore bot today, but nothing troubling. Haven't moved for a couple of days. Had another walk round the backs in the afternoon. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I've also stopped listening to the radio. It's quite improved my mood :-)

It was lovely to wake at a good time this morning and rest peacefully knowing that I was up to date with all my shopping, washing, and cooking. Nothing to do except rest in shamatha until the sounds from outside prompted me to arise and take in the new day. Feeling soft, supple, simple, silent and serene.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed quite late last night, about 19:30. Slept through till 04:25 without taking my codeine. Took it, lay on my back, and promptly went back to sleep. Awake at 06:30 and up at 09:45 after a pleasurable morning meditation. Went out shopping to Boots, Westgate Stores, and Northgate Pharmacy, but didn't do any other walks. It's the equinox today and like clockwork the sun has gone in, the temperature is dropping, and it's dark enough to put the lights on. Had the oddest problem today. At some point, my monitor display turned upside down. Tested all the hardware connections with no result. Couldn't see anything in the ProLite settings. Decided to go for my afternoon meditation and worry about it afterwards. Got up, made some tea, turned the monitor to portrait, then on its side so that it was lying upside down and googled the problem. Found the fix in the first result -- press CTRL + ALT + Up Arrow. Hey presto. Feeling quite relaxed and in good spirits and appetite. A good day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Felt sweet, soothing, and safe in my morning meditation.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed quite late again last night at 19:20. Slept through till 04:30 and drowsed. Awake at just after 6 and up at 10 after a fairly pleasurable morning meditation. There was a clonking noise from the bedroom radiator at one point which I thought sounded like the central heating going off. Got up at about 09:30 for a pee and the heating was off. I tried a few things with the boiler and eventually noticed a button next to the "flame off" light. (The lock-out lamp and lock-out reset button respectively.) Pressed it and the heating came back on. I'm glad it's working, but that boiler will be one thing I'll be glad to leave behind. FFS A good day. Feeling light and happy despite my pain and the weather. And the new COVID rules :-)

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Checked some properties out on the net. Nothing of special interest, but I feel calmer knowing how things lie. Feeling calm and good today on the whole.
Went this morning. Not sure, but there's some leakage afterwards (yuck!) and I guess regular washing stops any bacterial infection, which may be what causes the soreness and irritation.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed quite late last night, about 19:00. Slept through till 3 without taking my codeine. Awake at just before 7 and up at 11:30 after a fairly pleasurable morning meditation. I was in the bath at about 12:30 when there was a knock on the door. Got up, put a towel on, went downstairs. No-one at the door, but Dave's door was just closing. Once I was dressed, I knocked on his door to see if he'd called. No, but he'd just received an Amazon delivery. Ah. So the driver sees number 20 and thinks I'm 18. When there's no answer he turns his head and sees the door number plate on number 18. I got an email from first direct today saying that "your latest credit card statement for account number ending 0731 is now available". Curious about that number and checked all three of my first direct accounts. None of them have those digits anywhere. Listening to the radio and station hopping. The sun keeps coming out and going in as well. Trying to resist the temptation to keep switching the lights on and off as well. Emptying my freezer by eating the contents. It needs defrosting. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed at about 18:20, but woke just after midnight and couldn't get back to sleep. Worrying about being homeless. Didn't take anything, though. Must have fallen half-asleep because I woke just before 6 and meditated till just before 9. Out to the Co-op, did my telephone appointment. Feeling quite low today. At 3, I haven't eaten apart from two apples. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A fairly good night. To bed later, at 18:40, did the Body Scan as usual. Woke a couple of times, but went back to sleep. Awake just after 6, and meditated quite restlessly till getting up at 08:40 in readiness for my Skype call with Sarah. My outdoor plants got trashed by the hailstorm (especially the primrose bowl). It's beginning to feel cold lying in bed in the morning and the house feels cold enough to have both space heaters on. It's very cold outside with 20 mph winds and 11 C today. Feeling a bit less than good at just after 11. Felt okay by the evening. Watching videos on YouTube and bookmarked a couple. Downloaded the Linda Ronstadt documentary as well. A so-so day all in all.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at 18:20. Woke just after midnight, couldn't get back to sleep, so took half a Z. Awake at 06:30, put the space heater on, and meditated till getting up at 11. Since waking have had a sad hopeless weary feeling in the pit of my stomach. Watching people outside. Low, no appetite, don't feel like doing anything. Anxious about the delivery of my gloves by Royal Mail tomorrow morning. And the sun came out at about two o'clock. Have had a shave, tidied up the tape on the windows, done a towel wash, and am now eating porkie pie and toms at just before 5. I have been taking ranitidine occasionally lately, so may need some tonight. A so-so day all in all.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at 7. Woke in the night, turned over, and got a bolt of stomach acid in my throat. Most unpleasant. Took several gulps of water and swallowed a lot. Also took a 150 mg ranitidine. Woke again just after 3, too. Took my codeine, drowsed for about an hour, but was awake from just before 5. Put the space heater on at 6, and meditated very restlessly till getting up at 10:30. Feeling the absolute pits, to be honest. It's grey, cold, and I feel low. The gloves came at about 08:45, by the way, posted through the door. They fit okay, maybe a little tight around the thumb joint.
Have got some eczema on my upper trunk. Started taking the lansoprazole again this morning.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: On an impulse, popped out at 2 to Westgate, where Suni helped me get the items I needed (milk, butter, battered fish fillets) and even counted out my change for me. Nice.
And the sun has just come out at 14:30.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at 18:40. Put my pyjama bottoms on as it feels cold in the big bedroom even after a day's heating. Woke just after midnight, couldn’t get back to sleep, so took my morning codeine, and a while later took half a Z. Awake just before 7, put the space heater on, and meditated till getting up at 12.
Woke feeling empty, low, and unrested, despite getting plenty of sleep. I had very little to eat yesterday. I am beginning to wonder if my anxiety and depression is connected to my eating. And thinking of being fed every four hours as an infant.
Got mild eczema on my arms, trunk, and upper legs. It comes up when I've been in a hot bath.
Tidied up my primrose bowl. It's got new flowers coming and new leaf growth.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at 6. Woke at 22:30 and took my morning codeine. Awake just after 5, put the space heater on, and meditated till getting up at 15:30. Took two Nurofen Plus at about 10.
Woke feeling empty, low, and unrested again, despite getting plenty of sleep. Had a period of peaceful rest from about 11 to about 2, although I wonder if that was the extra codeine more than anything else.
It's cold, wet, and grey today. Playing my guitar.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at 18:20. A bit of a restless night. Woke just after midnight. Awake just before 4, took my morning codeine and put the space heater on. Meditated fairly peacefully till getting up at 12, prompted by the sounds of a lorry being filled with hardcore underneath my bedroom window.
Have watered the indoor plants, put a bedding wash on, and eaten spag bol. Had a bath shave and managed to break my shaving mirror. It's served me well and it's a miracle it hasn't happened before (it dropped off the edge of the bath). As luck would have it, it broke on the side that I use. A replacement is £50 from John Lewis, so I've bought a much cheaper replacement from Debenhams.
Feeling pretty low and anxious. I need to go out and get some groceries, as I've run out of apples.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed at 6. Woke just before midnight and again at just before 4, when I took my codeine. Awake just after 6 and meditated till 08:45. Out to the Co-op, did my telephone appointment. Moved this morning. My prolapse has shrunk and my bot doesn't feel sore or itchy. My surgery wound has completely healed, although there is a patch of scaly skin between my shoulder blades. Making fish, chips & beans at 13:15. Looking at previous posts, I spent a lot of time staying in bed and taking extra codeine this time last year. So there is some cause to be optimistic. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed at 6. Woke at 03:57, when I took my codeine. Awake at 06:22 and meditated till getting up 08:47. Feeling okay today and have eaten plenty. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at 7. Woke at 23:50 and again at 02:26, when I took my morning codeine. Awake just after 6, and meditated peacefully till getting up at 09:30. It feels quite warm today. Gardening news: The bathroom sill has a fair few of those black flies again. Possibly time to use some more plant spikes. My outside plants are looking rather sad as well. The big hanging baskets haven't got any flowers. The pansies have stopped flowering and the primrose bowl is looking rather moth-eaten. It only had one small slug when I checked, but I can't be bothered using any slug pellets. A good day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at 7 again. Woke a couple of times, 9 o'clock and again at 2 o'clock, Can't remember when I took my morning codeine. Awake at 06:45 and meditated restlessly till getting up at 10:30. It feels quite warm again today. Lying in bed after awaking and thinking of the activities I had planned with no pleasure. Then thought of my bedraggled-looking hanging baskets and felt a jolt of shame. I went out for a walk to do some shopping (which was one of the activities I had planned) and had a good time. Then trimmed the hanging baskets back. They look better for the haircut and I'm due one myself. An odd experience. Lying in bed not wanting to get up, with building noises coming from the yard below. Put my earplugs in and then took them out a couple of times. Felt myself getting increasingly colder as the morning wore on, so got up to put the space heater on. Thought, oh blow it, and got up. I was just drinking my first cup of tea and contemplating running a bath when there was a knock at the door. It was Hermes with my Debenham's delivery of a shaving mirror. Sore again today. Eating finally at half past four. A good day on the whole.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: <iframe title="Jack Kerouac, King of the Beats (1985) - Complete Documentary" width="640" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Trw-Vvsn_nw?start=44&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: A restless night. Woke a couple of times, once at 2 and I went downstairs and took two Nurofen Plus. Awake at 06:50 in low spirits. Stayed in bed all morning with a sore bot. Got up at 12 to have a bot wash and get my medication to discover that my pants were soaking wet on the bottom with some slight dampness on the sheet. Very wet and sore bot. Googled it and it's mucus and I've got pruritis. Washed and creamed, put a towel on the bed, took two more Nurofen Plus to ease the soreness, and lay abed till 3. Something to mention to Dr Kennedy. I deferred putting my waste bin out as I want to get better before going out. A bit of a bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/itchy-anus/ Do not use scented soaps, bubble bath or bath oil. Do not eat spicy food.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at 7. Woke a couple of times, half 10 and again at 2 thirty, when I got up and took half a Zopiclone. Can’t remember when I took my morning codeine. Awake at 07:10 and meditated peacefully till getting up at 09:30. Have resumed eating today. Taking a towel around with me to sit on as the discharge has soaked through to my green shorts. Got some groceries from Rani early on. The freezer is almost empty now. The pruritis is, I think, getting better at just before 5. Not so wet now, although it's still sore and itchy. A so-so day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at half 6. Woke a couple of times again, at just before 1, when I took my morning codeine, and again at 02:20, when I got up and took half a Zopiclone. Awake at 07:15 or so. Spent the day in bed again,  getting up at 03:30. Haven't eaten apart from an apple. Low & anxious. The discharge has stopped, thank goodness. A bad day.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Yesterday I was playing with my Facebook friend settings to try and discover how they work to create my News Feed. As a test, I decided to follow everyone and see if the posts were limited successfully by my Friend Lists. Today I have a slew of posts from Terry Andrews, all of them shares of media and news pages. 12 of them.
Ah. I emptied my Acquaintances list. Have just re-added him and still have 9.
And it's down to 6 on a refresh. The trouble is, it's always the same subject: Brexit. Boring, time to unfollow again.
Lesson: don't use the Acquaintances list. Just unfollow.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at half 6 again. Woke a couple of times again, at half past midnight and at 04:40, when I took my morning codeine. Awake at 05:50. Meditated quite pleasantly till getting up at 09:39. Have had my telephone appointment and eaten properly today. Have run out of apples, so I went and scrumped two from one of the trees outside. Quite tasty, actually, if a little sharp. Still sore today but haven't creamed. I want to give my skin a rest. A bad morning and a good afternoon.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Despite feeling fairly grim today, little things give me the feeling that I'm being looked after. As long as I just keep doing what I need to do, I will be okay.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at half 6. It took me a good while to get to sleep, including getting up and moving. My ankle stayed quite sore for ages. I always know when I'm about to drop off as the pain starts to subside. Awake at 05:12 feeling lousy. Stayed in bed till 3. Have eaten a couple of apples, some Tunnocks, and defrosted the fridge.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at half 6. Fell asleep okay, but woke at 02:38 and didn't really go back to sleep properly. I put the space heater on at 6 (temperature), but still felt cold by the time I got up. I discovered then that I'd only put it on at half power.
Up at 09:30 to take tea, wash, clean my teeth, put a clothes wash on, and go out shopping to the Co-op. Which was fine, I got everything on my list, no queues at the checkouts. Back for coffee and a Skype with Sarah at 11. It felt a bit odd. Stefan was making a fair bit of noise in the background and I don't think she's that fond of me complaining about him. Oh well. They are preparing to sell their house and move and I know that she finds that process unsettling.
Afterwards, I had cookies and an apple and got more stuff for the freezer at Westgate. Again, I got everything on my list and had a chat to Suni. He is convinced that the Covid-19 figures are bogus and that there's nothing to worry about. He wasn't wearing a mask, although the other customers and me were. Eating paella with relish at 3.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at half 6. Fell asleep okay with my pyjama bottoms and socks on. Woke at 03:32 and awake at 06:45. Meditated peacefully till getting up at 9. Feeling hot and a bit low, but I think I may be constipated.
Fearful of getting the virus just before being invited for a viewing and mindful of the fact that I didn't sanitise my hands after shopping at Westgate Stores yesterday. I did have my mask on, though and wasn't in there for very long. It does seem that recent research shows that the risk from surface contact is less than previously thought.
Having major problems moving. Have been sat on the pot about six times now, nothing happening. Can't decide whether to wear my shorts (which hold hanky and phone) or my pyjama bottoms (which come off quickly in emergencies). Decided to go with the pyjama bottoms, candles lit on this grey and murky day, and sit on the sofa and read. Constantly needing to pee, which is the pressure from my bowel on my bladder, I guess.
Have had a bath, washed my hair, shaved, and done a towel wash. Not eaten properly yet at 14:22.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at half 6. Fell asleep okay with my pyjama bottoms and socks on. Woke at 23:30 and awake at 05:45, when I took my codeine. Up at 13:30 on a cold and wet day. Boots messaged me at 12:15 to say that my prescription was ready. The one I ordered 5th October.
Had a big movement at about midnight. It took several goes but had to come out. Have creamed a couple of times since but feel itchy. I hope I don't get pruritis again. If it's some consolation, I haven't got the virus. Have got persistent bad eczema on my left middle finger. Have used Betnovate for the past couple of days and some Neutrogena today, but it's taking a while to shift. Fed up with having health problems and trying to keep warm at night.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Took me ages to get to sleep last night. Bot very sore, from the Badedas bath I had yesterday? In the end, got up and took half a Z. As I was splitting it, one half rolled off the worktop into the gap between the oven. Oh well. Slept through, though. Awake at 05:45 and up at 09:17.
My bot is still very sore today. The Anusol cream doesn't seem to do anything to help, to be honest. Wet with discharge today, although not as bad as last week. Sitting on a towel just in case. I noticed some wet staining on my shorts today when I put them in the wash.
Have had a shower and been out to Boots and Westgate Stores. Had a nice chat to both Rani and Ruth the church gardener, who was struggling with the Hermes machine. I bought two more curries and another tub of ice-cream to fill the freezer. Feeling a little bit lighter in mood than yesterday. Time to make a GP's appointment, I think.
The last of the cheap-quality golfball bulbs from BLT has just blown, and the spot I bought went a couple of days ago. Absolutely appalling. Bulbs should last for months, not weeks. Seriously considering leaving a bad review to warn others.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The best way to keep warm is to wear long socks and tuck the pyjama bottoms into them. It also stops the trousers rucking up in bed.

Note to self: scratching my itchy bot makes the discharge worse. I washed today with warm water and a flannel, but couldn't resist rubbing the itchiness and it's now inflamed. The wetness can be alleviated by using a cotton wool plug. Need to see the doctor about getting some hydrocortisone cream.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at half 6. Took me a little while to get to sleep, but not so long as last night. Woke at 22:20, when I took my codeine, and again at 03:15. Still wakeful at 04:30, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Didn't really go back to sleep properly, but lay drowsing till 06:45, when I turned over and started meditating peacefully till getting up at 09:30. Felt okay when I got up, but am feeling progressively more tired as the day goes on. Bot is still sore but not weeping. My legs feel sore and weak.
Oh and I retrieved the half Z yesterday by pulling the stove to one side.
Went for my midday meditation at 12:30 and afterwards wrapped up in a jumper, slipper socks, and pyjama bottoms, turned the space heater on, and lay on my bed resting. When I got up (for a cup of tea and something to eat), I discovered it was 16:30. Oh well.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at 18:50. Woke at 22:50 and took half a Z. Awake around 5 and took my morning codeine. Up at 09:30 for my telephone appointment. Nicky from YourMove rang at 10:22 to arrange a viewing of the property that Kadie mentioned. This afternoon wasn't convenient as I'd like Sarah to accompany me. Waiting to hear about a rescheduled date for next week.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Was having a large movement at about 11, when I heard the letter box flap a couple of times. Thought it was an odd time for mail, maybe some flyers or something. I still hadn't finished when I heard it flap again. Pulled my pants up, went downstairs, and it was Ruth with four apples. How kind, even if I did feel a bit like the hero of Christopher Isherwood's The World In The Evening. I took it as a sign that I didn't need to go out this weekend, as I'd run out of apples.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
To bed and Body Scan at 18:50. Woke at 22:30 and took half a Z. Awake at 04:45 and took my morning codeine. Up at 9 for my Skype with Sarah, which she rescheduled till tomorrow at the last minute.
Got a sore bot today. Showered this morning to clear up the cream and crud. The weather is cold and grey and I feel the same. Only ate an apple yesterday. Have had coffee and cookies and an apple this morning.
And eating properly at 3 onwards. Beginning to feel vaguely human again and hopefully will sleep well tonight drug-free.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded: To bed and Body Scan at half 6. Woke at 22:50, when I took my codeine. Still wakeful at 00:30, so got up and took two Nurofen Plus. Didn’t really go back to sleep properly, but lay drowsing till about 5, when I turned over and started meditating peacefully till getting up at 9. Had my rescheduled Skype with Sarah. Went for my midday meditation at 12 and didn't get up again. So I just had cookies to eat for the whole day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
Did Body Scan at 18:45. Woke at 23:38, when I took my codeine, and again at 01:50. Didn’t really go back to sleep properly, but lay drowsing till 6, when I turned over and started meditating restlessly till getting up at 09:30.
Moved today, but I have pruritis although my prolapse is fine. Have made an appointment with Dr Kennedy for Thursday PM.
Did a bedding wash and washed my hair in the bath this morning. My left middle finger is still sore and was cracked and weeping this morning when I woke up. I put Betnovate on it, but I don't think that's the right treatment. May need to use some Savlon on it. It's the fnger I use to apply my cream, so I wonder if the cream and/or the discharge is affecting it?
Seem to have so many things to do. Need to order some bulbs, book a haircut, wash my clothes, and get some groceries. And a good night's sleep :-) And sort out something for Sarah's birthday. And do my behavioural experiment worksheet.
Still waiting to hear from YourMove... I tried calling this morning, but they were engaged. Monday morning must be a busy time.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
A restless night and a fractured day. Did Body Scan at 18:20. Woke at 22:13, when I took my codeine, and again at 04:58. Awake at 07:20, when I turned over and started meditating restlessly till getting up at 09:16. Went straight back to bed and got up at about 12:15. Tried doing the rebirthing breath, but can't seem to get the hang of it. Turned my voicemail on and silenced my phone whilst I was doing it. Still no word from YourMove.
Am eating at 15:30 and have sent Sarah a birthday card, chatted to Johanne on FB about Sarah's birthday list, put a clothes wash on, ordered some light-bulbs from Amazon, tidied up my primrose basket (which is now indoors), and had a bath.
Bot and finger not so sore now. It's turned out to be a lovely warm sunny day.

item.dc:creator: phil
item.content:encoded:
